Lines: Yes. She was smart, she was pretty, and she honestly cared about me. Janice is my last chance to have somebody.

Name: JANICE
Lines: Helloo!!

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Oh, my, god!

Name: JOEY
Lines: Geez, look how fat she got.

Name: JANICE
Lines: Hey, it's everybody.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Janice, you're--

Name: JANICE
Lines: Yes, I am.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Is it--?

Name: JANICE
Lines: Is it yours? Ha! You wish, Chandler Bing. You are looking at a married lady now.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Congratulations.

Name: JANICE
Lines: Oh, sweetie, I'm sorry.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: You couldn't have told me about this on the phone?

Name: JANICE
Lines: And what? Missed the expression on your face? Janice likes to have her fun.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Hey, Rache. You know what we haven't played in a while?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: What?

Name: MONICA
Lines: Hide the Lamp.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Monica, let it go.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Did you know I was allergic to shellfish?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Well, then, you'll just have to eat the other lamps.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Uh-oh. It's Scary Scientist Man.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Ok, Phoebe, this is it. In this briefcase I carry actual scientific facts. A briefcase of facts, if you will. Some of these fossils are over 200 million years old.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Ok, look, before you even start, I'm not denying evolution, ok, I'm just saying that it's one of the possibilities.

Name: ROSS
Lines: It's the only possibility, Phoebe.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Ok, Ross, could you just open your mind like this much, ok? Wasn't there a time when the brightest minds in the world believed that the world was flat? And, up until like what, 50 years ago, you all thought the atom was the smallest thing, until you split it open, and this like, whole mess of crap came out. Now, are you telling me that you are so unbelievably arrogant that you can't admit that there's a teeny tiny possibility that you could be wrong about this?

Name: ROSS
Lines: There might be, a teeny, tiny, possibility.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: I can't believe you caved.

Name: ROSS
Lines: What?

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: You just abandoned your whole belief system. I mean, before, I didn't agree with you, but at least I respected you. How, how, how are you going to go into work tomorrow? How, how are you going to face the other science guys? How, how are you going to face yourself? Oh! That was fun. So who's hungry?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: I am. Let me just get my coat.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Ok, all right. It was an accident, I swear, all right. I was putting on my jacket, and the thing, and the lamp, and it broke.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Oh, please, Monica. You've always hated my lamp, and then, all of a sudden, it's just magically broken?

Name: MONICA
Lines: Phoebe, tell her!

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Ok, I didn't see it, because I was putting on my jacket, but I uh want to believe you.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Hey Chandler. Monica just broke my seashell lamp.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Neat. I'm gonna die alone.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Ok, you win.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Chandler, you're not gonna die alone.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Janice was my safety net, ok? And now I have to get a snake.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Uh huh. Why is that?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: If I'm gonna be an old, lonely man, I'm gonna need a thing, you know, a hook, like that guy on the subway who eats his own face. So I figure I'll be Crazy Man with a Snake, y=know. Crazy Snake Man. And I'll get more snakes, call them my babies, kids will walk past my place, they will run. "Run away from Crazy Snake Man," they'll shout!

Name: MONICA
Lines: You have got to get over this. You're not gonna end up alone.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Of course I am. I reject anyone who's crazy enough to actually go out with me, and then I bitch about the fact that there aren't any great women out there.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Chandler, you have just described virtually every man that we have ever gone out with.

Name: MONICA
Lines: You are not a freak. You're a guy.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: She's right. She's right. You are no different than the rest of them.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Wait a minute, wait a minute. Yes he is. You are totally different.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: In a bad way?

Name: MONICA
Lines: No, honey, in a wonderful way. You know what you want now. Most guys don't even have a clue. You are ready to take risks, you are ready to be vulnerable, and intimate with someone.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Yeah. You're not gonna end up alone.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Chandler, you called Janice! That's how much you wanted to be with someone!

Name: MONICA
Lines: You made it!

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: You're there!

Name: RACHEL
Lines: You are ready to make a commitment!

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Whoa! Don't know about that.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: What you got there? Something else that's not yours that you can break?

Name: MONICA
Lines: No. Um, I know you like this, and I want you to have it. I think it'll look good in our apartment.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Thank you.

Name: MONICA
Lines: That's fine.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Hey. Well, you will all be pleased to know that I have a date tomorrow night. This woman, Alison, from work. She's great. She's pretty, she's smart. And uh, I've been holding off on asking her out in the past, because she has an unusually large head. But, I'm not gonna let that stuff hang me up anymore. Look at me. I'm growing.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Hey, uh, you can't recycle yearbooks, can you?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: I'll take that.

Name: JOEY
Lines: You want his yearbook?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Yeah, yeah. Some people said some nice things about him. I think somebody should have it.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Oh, gosh, this is so weird. I mean, his whole life was in this apartment, and now it's gone. You know, I think it would be nice if we just took a few moments, for Mr. Heckles. I mean, he was kind of a pain, he was, but, he was a person. You're all going to hell.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: It's really not that big!

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Takin' that with you, huh?

Name: JOEY
Lines: Oh, yeah.

Name: ROSS
Lines: You comin'?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Yeah, jus' second. Good-bye Mr. Heckles. We'll try to keep it down.

Name: ALISON
Lines: Oh, my major was totally useless. I mean, how often do you look in the classifieds and see "Philosopher wanted"?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Sure.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Man, I sure miss Julie.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Spanish midgets. Spanish midgets wrestling. Julie. Ok, yes, I see how you got there.

Name: ROSS
Lines: You ever figure out what that thing's for?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: No, see, I'm trying this new screening thing. You know, I figure if I'm always answering the phone, people'll think I don't have a life. My god, Rodrigo never gets pinned.
Here comes the beep, you know what to do.

Name: JADE
Lines: Hello, I'm looking for Bob. This is Jane. I don't know if you're still at this number, but I was just thinking about us, and how great it was, and, well, I know it's been three years, but, I was kinda hoping we could hook up again. I barely had t he nerve to make this call, so you know what I did?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: What?

Name: JADE
Lines: I got a little drunk...and naked.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Bob here.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: What've you been up to?

Name: JADE
Lines: Oh, you know, the usual, teaching aerobics, partying way too much. Oh, and in case you were wondering, those are my legs on the new James Bond poster.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Can you hold on a moment? I have another call.  I love her.

Name: ROSS
Lines: I know.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: I'm back.

Name: JADE
Lines: So, are we gonna get together or what?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Um, absolutely. Uh, how 'bout tomorrow afternoon? Do you know uh, Central Perk in the Village, say, five-ish?

Name: JADE
Lines: Great, I'll see you then.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Ok. Ok. Having a phone has finally paid off.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Even though you do do a good Bob impression, I'm thinkin' when she sees you tomorow, she's probably gonna realize, "hey, you're not Bob."

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: I'm hoping that when Bob doesn't show up, she will seek comfort in the open arms of the wry stranger at the next table.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Oh my god. You are pure evil.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Ok, pure evil, horny and alone. I've done this.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Yeah, yeah, everybody's here. Hey, everybody, say hi to Julie in New Mexico.

Name: ALL
Lines: Hi, Julie!

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Hi, Julie.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Ok, while Ross is on the phone, everybody owes me 62 bucks for his birthday.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Um, is, is there any chance that you're rounding up? You know, like from, like 20?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Hey, come on, we got the gift, the concert, and the cake.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Do we need a cake?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Look guys, I know it's a little steep.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Yeah, whoosh!

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: But it's Ross.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: It's Ross.

Name: JOEY
Lines: All right.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: I'll see you guys later, I gotta go...do a thing.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Ok, sweetheart, I'll call you later tonight. Whoa, whoa, whoa, hey, hey, hey, you're not really gonna go through with this, are you?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: You know, I think I might just.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: So uh, what are you guys doing for dinner tonight?

Name: JOEY
Lines: Well I guess I gotta start savin' up for Ross's birthday, so I guess I'll just stay home and eat dust bunnies.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Can you believe how much this is gonna cost?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Do you guys ever get the feeling that um, Chandler and those guys just don't get that we don't make as much money as they do?

Name: JOEY
Lines: Yes! Yeah, it's like they're always saying "let's go here, let's go there". Like we can afford to go here and there.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Yes, yes, and it's, and we always have to go to, you know, someplace nice, you know? God, and it's not like we can say anything about it, 'cause, like this birthday thing, it's for Ross.

Name: JOEY
Lines: For Ross.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: For Ross, Ross, Ross.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Oh my god.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Hey.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Hi.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: What?

Name: MONICA
Lines: I'm at work, ordinary day, you know, chop chop chop, sauti, sauti, sauti. All of a sudden, Leon, the manager, calls me into his office. It turns out they fired the head lunch chef, and guess who got the job.

Name: JOEY
Lines: If it's not you, this is a horrible story.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Fortunately, it is me. And, they made me head of purchasing, thank you very much. Anyway, I just ran into Ross and Chandler downstairs, and they think we should go out and celebrate. You know, someplace nice.

Name: ROSS
Lines: I'm tellin' you. You can't do this.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Oh, come on. I can never get a girl like that with conventional methods.

Name: ROSS
Lines: That doesn't matter. She wanted to call Bob. Hey, for all we know, Bob is who she was meant to be with. You may be destroying two people's chance for happiness.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: We don't know Bob, ok? We know me. We like me. Please let me be happy.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Go over there and tell that woman the truth.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: All right.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Go.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Hi.

Name: JADE
Lines: Hi.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Listen, I have to, uh, um, I have to, I have to confess something.

Name: JADE
Lines: Yes?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Whoever stood you up is a jerk.

Name: JADE
Lines: How did you--?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: I don't know. I just had this weird sense. You know, but that's me. I'm weird and sensitive. Tissue?

Name: JADE
Lines: Thanks.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: No, you keep the pack. I'm all cried out today.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Ok, ok, here is to my sister, the newly-appointed head lunch chef--

Name: MONICA
Lines: Who is also in charge of purchasing.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Newly appointed head lunch chef who is also in charge of purchasing--

Name: MONICA
Lines: Who has her own little desk when Roland's not there.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Uh, lunch chef, purchasing, own little desk when Roland's not there. Here's to my little sister--

Name: MONICA
Lines: Oh, wait, and I got a beeper!

Name: JOEY
Lines: Cool.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Let's see!

Name: ROSS
Lines: That's fine, I'll just wait!

Name: MONICA
Lines: Oh, sorry.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Sorry, sorry.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Monica!

Name: WAITER
Lines: Are we ready to order?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Oh, you know what, we haven't even looked yet.

Name: WAITER
Lines: Well, when you do, just let me know. I'll be right over there on the edge of my seat.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Wow, look at these prices.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Yeah, these are pretty ch-ching.

Name: JOEY
Lines: What are these, like famous chickens?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Hey, sorry I'm late. Congratulations, Mon.  I'm not sorry I'm late. How incredible was my afternoon with Jade?

Name: ROSS
Lines: Well, pretty incredible according to the message she left you on my machine. Hey, Chandler, why is this woman leaving a message for you on my machine?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Oh, see, I had to tell her that my number was your number, because I couldn't tell her that my number was my number because she thinks that my number is Bob's number.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Hey, tell me again, what do I do when Mr. Roper calls?

Name: WAITER
Lines: Do I dare ask?

Name: MONICA
Lines: Yes, I will start with the carpaccio, and then I'll have the grilled prawns.

Name: ROSS
Lines: That sounds great. Same for me.

Name: WAITER
Lines: And for the gentleman?

Name: JOEY
Lines: Yeah, I'll have the Thai chicken pizza. But, hey, look, if I get it without the nuts and leeks and stuff, is it cheaper?

Name: WAITER
Lines: You'd think, wouldn't you? Miss?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Ok, I will have the uh,  side salad.

Name: WAITER
Lines: And what will that be on the side of?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Uh, I don't know. Why don't you put it right here next to my water?

Name: WAITER
Lines: And for you?

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Um, I'm gonna have a cup of the cucumber soup, and, um, take care.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: I will have the uh, Cajun catfish.

Name: WAITER
Lines: Anything else?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Yes, how 'bout a verse of Killing Me Softly. You're gonna sneeze on my fish, aren't you?

Name: ROSS
Lines: Plus tip, divided by six. Ok, everyone owes 28 bucks.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Um, everyone?

Name: ROSS
Lines: Oh, you're right, I'm sorry.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Thank you.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Monica's big night, she shouldn't pay.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Oh, thank you!

Name: ROSS
Lines: So five of us is, $33.50 apiece.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: No, huh uh, no way, I'm sorry, not gonna happen.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Whoa, whoa, prom night flashback.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: I'm sorry, Monica, I'm really happy you got promoted, but cold cucumber mush for thirty-something bucks? No! Rachel just had that, that, that salad, and, and Joey with his like teeny pizza! It's just...

Name: ROSS
Lines: Ok, Pheebs! How 'bout we'll each just pay for what we had. It's no big deal.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Not for you.

Name: MONICA
Lines: All right, what's goin' on?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Ok, look you guys, I really don't want to get into this right now. I think it'll just make everyone uncomfortable.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Fine. All right, fine.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Yeah.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: You can tell us.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Hello, it's us, all right? It'll be fine.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Ok, um, uh, we three feel like, that uh, sometimes you guys don't get that uh, we don't have as much money as you.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Ok.

Name: ROSS
Lines: I hear ya.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: We can talk about that.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Well, then...Let's.

Name: ROSS
Lines: I, I just never think of money as an issue.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: That's 'cause you have it.

Name: ROSS
Lines: That's a good point.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: So um, how come you guys haven't talked about this before?

Name: JOEY
Lines: 'Cause it's always somethin', you know, like Monica's new job, or the whole Ross's birthday hoopla.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Wha--? Whoa, hey, I don't want my birthday to be the source of any kind of negative--there's gonna be a hoopla?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Basically, there's the thing, and then there's the stuff after the thing.

Name: MONICA
Lines: If it makes anybody feel better, then we can just forget the thing, and we'll just do the gift.

Name: ROSS
Lines: G-gift? The thing's not the gift?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: No, the thing was, we were gonna go see Hootie and the Blowfish.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Hootie and the--oh my. I, I can catch them on the radio.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: No, now I feel bad. You wanna go to the concert.

Name: ROSS
Lines: No, look, hey, it's my birthday, and the important thing is that we all be together.

Name: MONICA
Lines: All of us.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Together.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Not at the concert.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Ok.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Yeah.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Thank you.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Thanks.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Yeah.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: So, the ebola virus. That's gotta suck, huh?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Gee, Monica, what's in the bag?

Name: MONICA
Lines: I don't know, Chandler. Let's take a look.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Oh, it's like a skit.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Why, it's dinner for six. 5 steaks, and an eggplant for Phoebe.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Whoo!

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Cool.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Yeah, we switched meat suppliers at work, and the new guys gave me the steaks as sort of a thank-you.

Name: ROSS
Lines: But wait, there's more. Hey, Chandler, what is in the envelope?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: By the way, this didn't seem so dorky in the hall.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Come on.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Why, it's six tickets to Hootie and the Blowfish! The Blowfish!

Name: MONICA
Lines: It's on us, all right, so don't worry. It's our treat.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: So...Thank you.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Could you be less enthused?

Name: JOEY
Lines: Look, it's a nice gesture, it is. But it just feels like--

Name: MONICA
Lines: Like?

Name: JOEY
Lines: Charity.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Charity?

Name: ROSS
Lines: We're just tryin' to do a nice thing here.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Ross, you have to understand that your nice thing makes us feel this big.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Actually, it makes us feel that big.

Name: ROSS
Lines: I don't, I don't understand. I mean, you, it's like we can't win with you guys.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: If you guys feel this big, maybe that's not our fault. Maybe that's just how you feel.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Oh, now you're tellin' us how you feel.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Ok, we never shoulda talked about this.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: I'm just gonna pass on the concert, 'cause I'm just not in a very Hootie place right now.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Me neither.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Me too.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Guys, we bought the tickets.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Oh, well, then you'll have extra seats, you know, for all your tiaras and stuff.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Why did you look at me when you said that?

Name: MONICA
Lines: Well, I guess now we can't go.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: What? Come on, you do what you want to do. Do we always have to do everything together?

Name: MONICA
Lines: You know what? You're right.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Fine.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Fine.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Fine.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Fine.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Fine.

Name: MONICA
Lines: All right. We're gonna go. It's not for another six hours. We're gonna go then.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Chandler!

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Yeah?

Name: ROSS
Lines: Geez! Are you ready?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Yeah. Just let me grab my jacket and tell you I had sex today.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Whoa! You had sex today?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Wow, it sounds even cooler when somebody else says it. I was awesome, ok? She was biting her lip to stop from screaming.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Wow.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Now I know it's been awhile, but I took it as a good sign.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Still doing the screening thing?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: I had sex today. I never have to answer that phone again.

Name: MACHINE
Lines: Here comes the beep, you know what to do.

Name: JADE
Lines: Hey, Bob, it's Jade. Listen, I just wanted to tell you that I was really hurt when you didn't show up the other day, and just so you know, I ended up meeting a guy.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Bob here.

Name: JADE
Lines: Oh, hi.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: So, uh, you met someone, huh?

Name: JADE
Lines: Yes, yes, I did. In fact, I had sex with him 2 hours ago.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: So, uh, how was he?

Name: JADE
Lines: Eh.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Eh?

Name: JADE
Lines: Oh, Bob, he was nothing compared to you. I had to bite my lip to keep from screaming your name.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Well, that makes me feel so good.

Name: JADE
Lines: It was just so awkward and bumpy.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Bumpy?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Well, maybe he had some kind of uh, new, cool style, that you're not familiar with. And uh maybe you have to get used to it.

Name: JADE
Lines: Well there really wasn't much time to get used to it, you know what I mean?

Name: MONICA
Lines: You know what? I'm not gonna be able to enjoy this.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Yeah, I know, it's my birthday. We all should be here.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: So, let's go.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Well maybe, you know, maybe we should stay for one song.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Yeah, I mean, it would be rude to them for us to leave now.

Name: MONICA
Lines: You know, the guys are probably having a great time.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Come on you guys, one more time.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Ok. One.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Nooo.

Name: MONICA
Lines: That was amazing!

Name: ROSS
Lines: Excellent, that was excellent.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: I can't believe the guys missed this.

Name: ROSS
Lines: What guys? Oh, yeah.

Name: STEVE
Lines: Excuse me, you're Monica Geller aren't you?

Name: MONICA
Lines: Do I know you?

Name: STEVE
Lines: You used to be my babysitter.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Oh my god, little Stevie Fisher? How've you been?

Name: STEVE
Lines: Good, good, I'm a lawyer now.

Name: MONICA
Lines: You can't be a lawyer. You're eight.

Name: STEVE
Lines: Listen, it was nice to see you. I gotta run backstage.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Uh, wait, backstage?

Name: STEVE
Lines: Oh, yeah, my firm represents the band.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Ross.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Chandler.

Name: STEVE
Lines: How are you? Look, you guys wanna meet the group? Come on. So, are you one of the ones who fooled around with my dad?

Name: ROSS
Lines: Hey, you guys.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Happy birthday.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Oh, thank you, thanks. So uh, how was your night last night?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Oh, well, it pretty much sucked. How was yours?

Name: MONICA
Lines: Yeah, ours pretty much sucked, oh, but, I did run into little Stevie Fisher. Remember him?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Oh yeah. I used to babysit him. Hey, how's his dad?

Name: MONICA
Lines: Uh, good.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Uh, aside from that, the whole evening was pretty much a bust.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Yeah, we really missed you guys.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Yeah, look, we were just saying, this whole thing is really stupid.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: We just have to really, really, really, not let stuff like money get--is that a hickey?

Name: MONICA
Lines: No, I just, I fell down.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: On someone's lips? Where'd you get the hickey?

Name: MONICA
Lines: You know, a party, or--

Name: RACHEL
Lines: What party?

Name: ROSS
Lines: It wasn't so much a party as...a gathering of people, with food, and music, and, and the band.

Lines: Yes, yes I am. Are you a, uh, a friend of Rachel's?

Name: RUSS
Lines: Actually, I'm a... kind of a.... you know, a... date-type... thing... of Rachel's.

Name: ROSS
Lines: A date.

Name: RUSS
Lines: Yeah, I'm her date.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Oh, oh, you're... uh... you're, oh you're the date.

Name: CHAN
Lines: You know, this is actually good, because if we ever lose Ross, we have a spare.

Name: RUSS
Lines: Oh, you are the, uh... paleontologist.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Yes, yes I am. And you are a....

Name: RUSS
Lines: Periodontist.

Name: MNCA
Lines: See? They're as different as night and... later that night.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Well, I am going to, uh... get a beverage. It was nice, nice... uh... meeting you.

Name: RUSS
Lines: Ditto.

Name: ROSS
Lines: I, uh, well... I... I met Russ.

Name: RACH
Lines: Oh.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Hey, I didn't know we were, uh, seeing other people.

Name: RACH
Lines: Well, we're not seeing each other, so....

Name: ROSS
Lines: Well, uh, for your information, there's a woman at the museum, who's curator of moths and other... uh... winged things... who's, uh, let it be known that she is drawn to me much like a... well, you know. But so far I've been keeping her at bay, but, uh, if this is the deal...

Name: RACH
Lines: Well, yeah, this is the deal.

Name: ROSS
Lines: OK, well, um, have a nice evening.

Name: RACH
Lines: Um, Russ, you ready?

Name: RUSS
Lines: Yeah.

Name: RACH
Lines: Bye.

Name: MNCA
Lines: Bye.

Name: PHOE
Lines: Bye.

Name: CHAN
Lines: Yes, yes, but did you see who she was dating?

Name: ROSS
Lines: What do you mean?

Name: MNCA
Lines: Do you not see it?

Name: ROSS
Lines: See what? I don't know what she sees in... innn that goober. And it takes him, what? Like... like... I don't know, uhh... uhhh, hello.... a... week, to get out a sentence.

Name: CHAN
Lines: Yeah, it's annoying, isn't it?

Name: CHAN
Lines: Hey.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Hey.

Name: CHAN
Lines: Whoa, whoa, so I'm guessing you didn't get the part, or... uh, Italy called and said it was hungry.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Well, the part's mine if I want it.

Name: CHAN
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: JOEY
Lines: Yeah, if I'm willing to sleep with the casting lady.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Ten years I've been waiting for a break like this Chandler, ten years! I mean, Days of Our Lives. That's actually on television.

Name: CHAN
Lines: So, what're you gonna do?

Name: JOEY
Lines: Well, I guess I could sleep with her... I mean, how could I do that?

Name: CHAN
Lines: Well, I... I've got a pop-up book that told me everything I need to know.

Name: JOEY
Lines: I've never slept with someone for a part.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Sorry.

Name: CHAN
Lines: It's alright. Is she good-looking?

Name: CHAN
Lines: Y'know, maybe this isn't such a big deal. Y'know, I mean, the way that I see it is you get a great job and you get to have sex. Y'know, I mean, throw in a tree and a fat guy and you've got Christmas.

Name: JOEY
Lines: I just... I just don't think that I want it that way though, y'know? I mean, let's say I do make it, alright? I'm always gonna look back and wonder if it was because of my talent or because of.. y'know, the Little General.

Name: CHAN
Lines: Didn't you used to call it the Little Major?

Name: JOEY
Lines: Yeah, but after Denise DeMarco, I had to promote it.

Name: WAITER
Lines: Can I get you something from the bar?

Name: FBOB
Lines: If... if you want to drink, it's OK with me, I've got to get used to it.

Name: FBOB
Lines: So the light went out in my refrigerator...

Name: CHAN
Lines: Hey, we're having some fun now, huh, Ross? Wanna do another one, huh Russ? OK... eleven letters, atomic element number 101... ends in ium.

Name: RUSS
Lines: Dysprosium.

Name: CHAN
Lines: And weenie number two has it. Unless, of course, nine-down, Knights in White Satin was sung by the Doody Blues.

Name: PHOE
Lines: You don't see it? You actually don't see it?

Name: RACH
Lines: What?

Name: PHOE
Lines: OK honey, you're dating Ross.

Name: RACH
Lines: No, Phoebs. I'm dating Russ.

Name: PHOE
Lines: Russ is Ross. Russ... Ross!

Name: RACH
Lines: Steve... sleeve!

Name: PHOE
Lines: OK, noone is named Sleeve.

Name: RACH
Lines: Phoebe, what the hell are you talking about? Other than their names being similar, I'm sorry, I do not see what you're seeing.

Name: RUSS
Lines: You could not be more wrong. You could try... but you would not be successful.

Name: CHAN
Lines: OK, I'm gonna get some more coffee before the pinching and eye-poking begins.

Name: RUSS
Lines: I know what your problem is.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Oh you do, do you?

Name: RUSS
Lines: Um-hum, you're jealous.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Of... of what?

Name: RUSS
Lines: You're jealous because I'm a real doctor.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Hey, you're a doctor of gums. That's the smallest body part you can major in. It's like day one, floss. Day two, here's your diploma.

Name: RUSS
Lines: Hey, you listen.

Name: ROSS
Lines: No, no, let me finish.

Name: RUSS
Lines: No, let me finish.

Name: ROSS
Lines: No, you let me fini...

Name: ROSS
Lines: Hi.

Name: RUSS
Lines: Hi.

Name: RACH
Lines: Did Joey say what he was gonna go when he left?

Name: CHAN
Lines: No, I don't even think he knew. Hey, would you sleep with somebody to get a great job?

Name: RACH
Lines: I don't know. Who would I have to sleep with?

Name: CHAN
Lines: Me.

Name: RACH
Lines: Why would I have to sleep with you?

Name: CHAN
Lines: It's my game. You want the job or not?

Name: CHAN
Lines: Hey.

Name: MNCA
Lines: Morning.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Where ya goin'?

Name: MNCA
Lines: Bobby and I are going away for the weekend, remember?

Name: ROSS
Lines: Ooooohhhh.

Name: PHOE
Lines: What's with all the bottles of liquor?

Name: ROSS
Lines: What's going on, is... uh, Bobby drinking again?

Name: MNCA
Lines: Oh no no, this is not for him, this is for me. That way he's still sober but I find his stories about shoelaces much more amusing.

Name: RACH
Lines: Oh God, even his knock is boring.

Name: MNCA
Lines: Hi. I'll be ready in just a second.

Name: FBOB
Lines: Uh, can I talk to you a minute?

Name: MNCA
Lines: Sure.

Name: FBOB
Lines: This is really hard for me to say.

Name: MNCA
Lines: Oh God, you fell off the wagon.

Name: FBOB
Lines: Oh, no, no, it's about you.

Name: MNCA
Lines: What about me?

Name: FBOB
Lines: I think you may have a drinking problem.

Name: FBOB
Lines: Look, I am just not strong enough to be in a codependent relationship right now, OK?

Name: MNCA
Lines: Oh... shoot.

Name: FBOB
Lines: Well, anyway, I hope we can be friends.

Name: MNCA
Lines: OK.

Name: MNCA
Lines: Take care.

Name: FBOB
Lines: You too.

Name: RACH
Lines: What happened?

Name: MNCA
Lines: Well we... we kinda broke up.

Name: GANG
Lines: Awwwwwwww.

Name: CHAN
Lines: I'll take one. Sometimes I like to hold stuff like this and pretend I'm a giant.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Hey.

Name: GANG
Lines: Hey!

Name: ROSS
Lines: How'd the callback go?

Name: JOEY
Lines: It was unbelievable! I walked in there and she was all over me.

Name: CHAN
Lines: So what'd you do?

Name: JOEY
Lines: Well, I couldn't do it. I told her I didn't want to get the part that way.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Good for you.

Name: JOEY
Lines: But wait, wait, wait. Then, after I left her office, she caught up with me at the elevator and offered me an even bigger part.

Name: PHOE
Lines: So... and?

Name: JOEY
Lines: Soooooo... you are now looking at Dr. Drake Ramore, neurosurgeon, recurring in at least four episodes!

Name: GANG
Lines: Allright!

Name: RUSS
Lines: Hi.

Name: CHAN
Lines: Oh, hey.

Name: PHOE
Lines: Hi.

Name: RUSS
Lines: I guess you guys heard, Rachel dumped me.

Name: CHAN
Lines: Yeah, I'm sorry man.

Name: RUSS
Lines: Oh, all she said was that I remind her too much of somebody. You have any idea who she's talking about?

Name: PHOE
Lines: Oh I do, it's.... it's Bob Saget. She hates him.

Name: RUSS
Lines: Oh.

Name: JULIE
Lines: Hey.

Name: CHAN
Lines: Hey!

Name: PHOE
Lines: Hey, Julie! Hey, how are you doing?

Name: JULIE
Lines: Um, oh, I don't know. I mean, it's definitely weird not being with Ross, but I guess I'm doing OK. Actually I've got some of his stuff that he, um....

Name: ROSS
Lines: Ok. Here's his diaper bag, and his uh, Mr. Winky, and uh...oh, him. Hi!

Name: CAROL
Lines: So how did everything go?

Name: ROSS
Lines: Oh, great. Great. There was a projectile, uh, throwing up incident, but he started it.

Name: CAROL
Lines: Well, we've gotta go.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Ok.

Name: CAROL
Lines: Oh, right. Um, I've got some news. It's about us.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Oh, you and me?

Name: CAROL
Lines: Uh, no, Susan and me.

Name: SUSAN
Lines: The other us.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Ok.

Name: CAROL
Lines: We're uh, we're getting married.

Name: ROSS
Lines: As in, "I now pronounce you wife and wife" married?

Name: CAROL
Lines: Anyway, we'd like you to come, but we totally understand if you don't want to.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Why wouldn't I want to come? I had fun at the first wedding.

Name: CAROL
Lines: Look I just thought that...

Name: ROSS
Lines: No no no, I mean, hey, why shouldn't I be happy for you? What would it say about me if I couldn't revel in your joy? I'm revelling baby, believe me!

Name: SUSAN
Lines: Is your finger caught in that chair?

Name: ROSS
Lines: Mmm hmmm.

Name: CAROL
Lines: Want us to go?

Name: ROSS
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: ROSS
Lines: This is so cool. You're actually gonna be on television.

Name: JOEY
Lines: It really hit me last night. I'm gonna be on Days of our Lives. And then I started thinkin' about all of u, and how these are the days of our lives..

Name: MONICA
Lines: Yes! Carol and Susan's caterer had a mountain bike accident this weekend, and she's in a full body cast.

Name: ROSS, CHANDLER & JOEY
Lines: Yes!

Name: MONICA
Lines: They want me to do it, which is really cool, seeing as I've never catered before, and I really need the money, and this isn't a problem for you, is it?

Name: ROSS
Lines: Would it matter?

Name: JOEY
Lines: Are you really not going?

Name: ROSS
Lines: I am really not going. I don't get it. They already live together, why do they need to get married?

Name: MONICA
Lines: They love each other, and they wanna celebrate that love with the people that are close with them.

Name: ROSS
Lines: If you wanna call that a reason.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Ross, I thought you were over this.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Look, that has nothing to do with this, ok? She's my ex-wife. If she were marrying a guy, none of you'd expect me to be there.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Hey, if she were marrying a guy, she'd be like the worst lesbian ever.

Name: JOEY
Lines: No, I'm on right after this guy shoots himself.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Whoa, she's pretty.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Yeah, and she's really nice too. She taught me all about how to work the cameras, and smell-the-fart acting.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: I'm sorry, what?

Name: MONICA
Lines: What?

Name: JOEY
Lines: It's like, you got so many lines to learn so fast, that sometimes you need a minute to remember your next one. So while you're thinkin' of it, you take this big pause where you look all intense, you know, like this.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Oh, ok.

Name: MRS. WALLACE
Lines: Is she gonna be all right?

Name: JOEY
Lines: I'm afraid the situation is much worse than we expected. Your sister is suffering from a..subcranial hematoma. Perhaps we can discuss this over coffee.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Nice!

Name: RACHEL
Lines: That's great!

Name: ROSS
Lines: Excellent!

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: For a minute there I thought you were actually tryin' to smell something.

Name: ROSS
Lines: That is so good! Do it again!

Name: JOEY
Lines: All right, all right. "Damnit Braverman, it's right there on the chart!"

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: That's great. All right, I gotta get to work, I got a big dinosaur bone to inspect.

Name: ROSS
Lines: No no, that's me.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Oh, yeah.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Oh, hello.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Oh, thanks. I couldn't uh...

Name: ROSS
Lines: Is everything ok?

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Um, no, huh-uh. One of my clients died on the massage table today.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Oh my god.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: That's a little more relaxed than you want them to get.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Yeah, um, she was 82 years old. Her name was um, Mrs. Adelman.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Oh, honey.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Yeah, it's just so strange. I mean, she probably woke up today and thought, "ok, I'll have some breakfast, and then I'll take a little walk, and then I'll have my massage." Little did she know God was thinking, "Ok, but that's it." Oh, but the weirdest thing was, ok, I was cleansing her aura when she died, and when the spirit left her body, I don't think it went very far.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: What do you mean?

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: I think it went into me.

Name: MONICA
Lines: God, this is so hard. I can't decide between lamb or duck.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Well, of course, lambs are scarier. Otherwise the movie would've been called Silence of the Ducks.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Ok, who ordered what?

Name: ROSS
Lines: Oh, I believe I had the half-drunk cappuccino with the lipstick on the rim.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Yes, and this with the cigarette butt in it, is that decaf?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Oh god.

Name: JOEY
Lines: I can't believe you're so uptight about your mom comin'.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: I know, but it's just it's the first time, and I just don't want her to think that because I didn't marry Barry, that my life is total crap, you know?

Name: JOEY
Lines: Uh, Pheebs, how long do you think this lady'll be with us?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Mom!

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: Sweetie! So this is where you work? Oh, it's wonderful! Is it a living room? Is it a restaurant? Who can tell? But I guess that's the fun.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Pretty much.

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: Monica! You look gorgeous! Last time I saw you, it was eat or be eaten.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: This is Joey, and Phoebe, and this is Chandler, and you remember Ross.

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: Oh hello, Ross.

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: So, what do you think of my daughter in the apron with the big job?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Oh Mom!

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: If you didn't pour the coffee, no one would have anything to drink.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Believe me, sometimes that happens.

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: This is just so exciting. You know, I never worked. I went straight from my father's house to the sorority house to my husband's house. I am just so proud of you.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Really?

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: Yes.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: I know who it is you remind me of. Evelyn Dermer. 'Course, that's before she got the lousy face lift. Now she looks like Soupy Sales.

Name: JOEY
Lines: Pheebs, who's Evelyn Dermer?

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: I don't know. Who's Soupy Sales?

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: Oh my god, there's an unattractive nude man playing the cello.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Yeah, well just be glad he's not playing a smaller instrument.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: I know. And Mom, I realize you and Daddy were upset when I didn't marry Barry and get the big house in the suburbs with all the security and everything, but this is just so much better for me, you know?

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: I do. You didn't love Barry. And I've never seen you this happy. I look at you and I think, oh, this is what I want.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: For...me.

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: Well, not just for you.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Well, what do you mean?

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: I'm uh, considering leaving your father.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Oh god. I think I'm gonna be sick.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Why? It's not like I'm putting little nipples on them.

Name: ROSS
Lines: And you had no idea they weren't getting along?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: None.

Name: JOEY
Lines: They didn't fight a lot?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: No! They didn't even talk to each other. God, how was I supposed to know they were having problems?

Name: JOEY
Lines: Hey, look who's up.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: I just can't believe this is happening. I mean, when I was little, everybody's parents were getting divorced. I just figured as a grownup I wouldn't have to worry about this.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Is there any chance that you can look at this as flattering? I mean, she's doing it because she wants to be more like you.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Well, then, you know, couldn't she have just copied my haircut?

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: You know, it's funny when my parents got divorced, they sent me to this shrink, and she told me that all kids have a tendency to blame themselves. But in your case it's actually kinda true.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: That's him.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Damn. My mail order grandfather hasn't come yet.

Name: MR A
Lines: Phoebe?

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Yes, hi, Mr. Adelman. Thanks for meeting me.

Name: MR A
Lines: Oh, that's all right, although you did cut into my busy day of sitting.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Um, do you wanna sit?

Name: MR A
Lines: Oh, no, please, I spent most of mid-morning trying to stand up. Now uh, what can I do for you, my dear?

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: I don't know how to say this, but I think when your wife's spirit left her body, it um, kind of stuck around in me.

Name: MR A
Lines: You're saying, my wife is in you?

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Yeah. Ok, you don't have to believe me but um, can you think of any unfinished business she might have had, like any reason she'd be hanging around?

Name: MR A
Lines: Well, I don't know what to tell you dear. The only thing I can think of is that she always used to say that before she died, she wanted to see everything.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Everything?

Name: MR A
Lines: Everything.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Whoa, that's a lot of stuff.

Name: MR A
Lines: Oh, wait, I remember, she also said she wanted to sleep with me one last time.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: I'm sorry, there's laughing in my head.

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: Look at this.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: These are from Halloween three years ago.

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: Oh, look, here's Barry. Did he have to come straight from the office?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: No, that was his costume. See, he's actually an orthodontist, but he came as a regular dentist.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Um, you guys, you know when I said before, "thank you, but I don't really need your help"?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Actually, what I think you said was, "don't touch that, and get the hell out of my kitchen."

Name: MONICA
Lines: Really? Weird. Anyway, see, I planned everything really well. I planned and I planned and I planned. It just turns out, I don't think I planned enough time to actually do it.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Hey, Mon, you want some help?

Name: MONICA
Lines: If you want.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: She's still with you?

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: This is so much fun, just the girls. You know what we should do? Does anybody have any marijuana?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: God!

Name: MONICA
Lines: All right, look, nobody's smoking pot around all this food.

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: That's fine. I never did it. I just thought I might. So, what's new in sex?

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Oh! What's new in sex?

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: The only man I've ever been with is your father.

Name: MONICA
Lines: I'm dicing, I'm dicing, I don't hear anything.

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: I mean, this is no offense to your dad, sweetie, but I was thinking there might be more.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Oh, I'm sorry. You know what? I cannot have this conversation with you. I mean, god, you just come in here, and drop this bomb on me, before you even tell Daddy. What? What do you want? Do you want my blessing?

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: No.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: You want me to talk you out of it?

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: No.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Then what? What do you want?

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: I guess I just figured of all people you would understand this.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Why on earth would I understand this?

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: You didn't marry your Barry. I did.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Oh.

Name: MONICA
Lines: All right people, we're in trouble here. We've only got 12 hours and 36 minutes left. Move, move, move!

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Monica, I feel like you should have German subtitles.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Joey, speed it up!

Name: JOEY
Lines: I'm sorry, it's the pigs. they're reluctant to get in the blankets!

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Monica, how did this happen? I thought you had this all planned out.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Do you want me to cry? Is that what you want? Do you wanna see me cry?

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Sir! No sir!

Name: ROSS
Lines: No. Look, I told you I am not a part of this thing.

Name: MONICA
Lines: All right, look, Ross. I realize that you have issues with Carol and Susan, and I feel for you, I do. But if you don't help me cook, I'm gonna take a bunch of those little hot dogs, and I'm gonna create a new appetizer called "pigs in Ross". All right, ball the melon.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Hey! How come I'm stuck dicing, when he gets to ball the melon.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Hi.

Name: CAROL
Lines: How's it going?

Name: CAROL
Lines: Fine, whatever.

Name: ROSS
Lines: What's the matter?

Name: CAROL
Lines: Nothing. Ok, everything. I think we're calling off the wedding.

Name: ROSS
Lines: What?

Name: MONICA
Lines: You're still gonna pay me, right? Or something a little less selfish.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Carol, what's the matter? What happened?

Name: CAROL
Lines: My parents called this afternoon to say they weren't coming.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Oh my god.

Name: CAROL
Lines: I mean, I knew they were having trouble with this whole thing, but they're my parents. They're supposed to give me away and everything.

Name: ROSS
Lines: It's ok. I'm sorry.

Name: CAROL
Lines: And then Susan and I got in this big fight because I said maybe we should call off the wedding, and she said we weren't doing it for them, we were doing it for us, and if I couldn't see that, then maybe we should call off the wedding. I don't know what to do.

Name: ROSS
Lines: I uh can't believe I'm gonna say this, but I think Susan's right.

Name: CAROL
Lines: You do?

Name: ROSS
Lines: Look, do you love her? And you don't have to be too emphatic about this.

Name: CAROL
Lines: Of course I do.

Name: ROSS
Lines: Well then that's it. And if George and Adelaide can't accept that, then the hell with them. Look, if my parents didn't want me to marry you, no way that would have stopped me. Look, this is your wedding. Do it.

Name: CAROL
Lines: You're right. Of course you're right.

Name: MONICA
Lines: So we're back on?

Name: CAROL
Lines: We're back on.

Name: MONICA
Lines: You heard the woman. Peel, chop, devil! I can't believe I lost 2 minutes.

Name: JOEY
Lines: It just seems so futile, you know ? All these women, and nothing. I feel like Superman without my powers, you know? I have the cape, and yet I cannot fly.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Well now you understand how I feel every single day, ok? The world is my lesbian wedding.

Name: CAROL
Lines: Thank you.

Name: MINISTER
Lines: You know, nothing makes God happier than when two people, any two people, come together in love. Friends, family, we're gathered here today to join Carol and Susan in holy matrimony.

Name: MONICA
Lines: Would you look at them?

Name: ROSS
Lines: Yeah, can't help but.

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: I miss Rose.

Name: CHANDLER
Lines: Oh, yeah?

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: I know it's kind of weird, but I mean, she was a big part of my life there, you know, and now I just feel kind of alone.

Name: WOMAN
Lines: You know, I uh, I couldn't help but overhear what you just said, and I think it's time for you to forget about Rose, move on with your life...how 'bout we go get you a drink?

Name: PHOEBE
Lines: Ok, that's so nice.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: Hey, Mom? Having fun?

Name: MRS GREEN
Lines: Oh, am I! I just danced with a wonderfully large woman. And three other girls made eyes at me over the buffet. Oh, I'm not saying it's something I wanna pursue, but it's nice to know I have options.

Name: RACHEL
Lines: There's more alcohol, right?

Name: SUSAN
Lines: How you doin'?

Name: Pete
Lines: Monica, I want to become  the Ultimate Fighting Champion.

Name: Monica
Lines: You wanna what?!

Name: Pete
Lines: I want to become the Ultimate Fighting Champion! Its the most intense physical competition in the world, its banned in 49 states!

Name: Monica
Lines: What are you talking about?

Name: Pete
Lines: Okay, my trainer, Ho Chi, is teaching me a combination of Gee Koon Doe and Brazilian street fighting, Ive even had my own octagon training ring designed.

Name: Monica
Lines: And I suppose you used a ring designer for that.

Name: Pete
Lines: Yeah. Monica, I want you there in the front row when I win. I want you close enough to smell the blood. What do you think?

Name: Monica
Lines: My parents will be so happy.

Name: Jason
Lines: Hey. I was

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: Jason
Lines: I was passin by and I saw that you were playing tonight, its kinda cool seeing you up there.

Name: Vince
Lines: Whoa! Hey-hey! Whats going on here? Who is this guy?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I dont know, he just started kissing me. Get him! Get him, Vince!

Name: Vince
Lines: What?!

Name: Jason
Lines: What?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, okay, Ive-Ive been dating both of you, and its been really horrible. Cause y'know its been a lot of fun, for me. Umm, but I-I like you both, and I, and I didnt know how to chose, so... Im sorry, Im just, Im terrible, Im a terrible person. Im terrible.

Name: Vince
Lines: Phoebe, Phoebe relax, its okay. I mean we never said this was exclusive.

Name: Jason
Lines: Yeah, and neither did we. Give yourself a break.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Really?!

Name: Jason
Lines: Yeah. I mean y'know, we havent been going out that long. Come on, we havent even slept together yet. Huh.

Name: Vince
Lines: You havent?

Name: Jason
Lines: You have?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, this is none of my business.

Name: Jason
Lines: I-I cant believe this! You-youve slept with him?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, I made you a candle light dinner in the park.

Name: Jason
Lines: Y'know Phoebe, Im gonna make this real easy for you.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, that couldve been really awkward.

Name: Vince
Lines: You made him a candle light dinner in the park?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, but I-I-I-I can do that for you, Im gonna do that for you.

Name: Vince
Lines: Uh yeah, I cant believe I ever went out with somebody who would actually have an open flame in the middle of a wooden area.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Everythings gonna be all right. Okay, Dick?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, yeah. Hes got a, hes got a really bad cough, and our vet, he cant do anything about it. Is there something you can do?

Name: Guru Saj
Lines: Hmm, let me see. Let me see. Do you think you could get him to eat a bat?

Name: Story by
Lines: Mark J. Kunerth & Pang-ni Landrum Teleplay by: Scott Silveri & Shana Goldberg-Meehan Transcribed by: Eric Aasen

Name: Chandler
Lines: Do you think that theres a town in Missouri or some place called Sample? And ah, as youre driving into town theres-theres like a sign, and it says Youre in Sample.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey.

Name: All
Lines: Hey!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Howd it go with Pete?!

Name: Joey
Lines: Tell us!

Name: Monica
Lines: Youre not gonna believe this. Okay, so I go over...

Name: Billy Crystal
Lines: Im sorry. Ex-excuse us. Im sorry, its a little crowded. Do you mind if we...

Name: Robin Williams
Lines: Yeah, could you scooch?

Name: Billy
Lines: Yeah, move over just a little bit.

Name: Robin
Lines: Keep on scooching.

Name: Monica
Lines: So guys, listen, I go over there, and umm...

Name: Robin
Lines: Why? Why?! Whats wrong with me?!

Name: Billy
Lines: Whats the matter?

Name: Robin
Lines: I have a feelin... I, my wife is sleeping with her gynaecologist.

Name: Billy
Lines: How do you know?

Name: Robin
Lines: Well y'know, hes got access.

Name: Billy
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Robin
Lines: Y'know its that feeling you get, y'know?

Name: Billy
Lines: Like when you go bowling and you know youre in somebody elses shoes?

Name: Robin
Lines: Thats the one.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: All right, so, so you went to Petes...

Name: Ross
Lines: What happened?

Name: Robin
Lines: Why is this happening to me?! I dont know, maybe its my wound.

Name: Monica
Lines: Forget it.

Name: Billy
Lines: So its-its not heeled yet?

Name: Robin
Lines: No-no, its ooozing, oozing.  Could you pass me the cream? Is there anyOh, theres the cream.

Name: Billy
Lines: Thomas, this is gonna be hard, but I wanted it to come from me, and nobody else.

Name: Robin
Lines: What is it, Tim?

Name: Billy
Lines: Its me, Ive been sleeping with your wife.

Name: Joey
Lines: So youre the gynaecologist?

Name: Billy
Lines: Hey, Im trying to have a private conversation! Is that okay?!

Name: Billy
Lines: Thomas, come back here!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So Monica, what were you gonna tell us?

Name: Monica
Lines: I have no idea.

Name: Rachel
Lines: So, come on, what was the big news Pete wanted to tell you Mon?! Or should I say Mrs. Monica Becker?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No-no-no oh, keep your name, dont take his name.

Name: Monica
Lines: He didnt ask me to marry him.

Name: All
Lines: Ohh.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well then definately dont take his name.

Name: Monica
Lines: He wanted to tell me hes gonna compete is some ultimate fighting competition thingy.

Name: The Guys
Lines: Pete?!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Why?! What is it?

Name: Monica
Lines: I dont know exactly. Its-its sorta like wrestling.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh?!

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, but without the costumes.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh.

Name: Joey
Lines: And its not fake, its totally brutal.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah, its two guys in a ring, and the rules are: Theyre are no rules.

Name: Monica
Lines: So you can like, bite, and pull peoples hair and stuff?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, anything goes, except ah, eye gouging and fish hooking.

Name: Monica
Lines: Whats fish hooking?

Name: Joey
Lines: What? My hands are totally clean, I just gave the duck a bath.

Name: Doug
Lines: So thanks for the warm welcome. Its good to have you guys on my team, and I come to play. I hope you do too. Now, lets go out there and get em! Huh? And remember, there is no I in team.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yes, but theres two in martini, soo everybody back to my office.

Name: Doug
Lines: You! Chuckles! Whats your name?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh its Bing, sir. Im sorry , I was just ah...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yes!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: All right buddy, way to go!

Name: Ross
Lines: Dude, what are you doing?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Thank you! Today, my boss keep slapping my butt and he was acting like it was no big deal.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeesh, whatd you do about it?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, I didnt do anything. I didnt want to be the guy who has a problem with his boss slapping his bottom.

Name: Monica
Lines: I gotta tell ya, I think its okay to be that guy.

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, maybe its like y'know, that jock thing. Y'know how football players pat each other after touchdowns.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Y'know I dont, I dont understand guys, I mean I-I would never congratulate Monica on a great stew by y'know, grabbin her boob.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah, I know, for a really great stew you just y'know, stick your head in between em.

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay, can we please go eat?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah. What are we getting?

Name: Monica
Lines: Anything but stew.

Name: Ross
Lines: All right so, Chandler, from now on, dont give your boss a chance to get you. Y'know just ah, dont turn your back to him.

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, or you can teach him a lesson. Y'know? What you could do is you could rub something that really smells on your butt, all right? Then, when he goes to smack ya, his hand will smell.  Now what could you rub on your butt that would smell bad?

Name: Chandler
Lines: What if Joey were president?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Umm, hey Rach, can I ask you something?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, you can totally say no, but umm, would it be okay with you if I set Ross up on a date?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, ah with who?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Umm, my friend, Bonnie. She just always thought Ross was really cute, and now that you two arent together, she asked if I could set it up, but if youre not cool with it...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh-oh-oh, which one is Bonnie again?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: You remember her from my birthday party two years ago. Shes yeah, like, average height, medium build, bald...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh!  Thats fine.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Great! Okay, good for you!

Name: Hoshi
Lines: You are iron. You are steel! Let me ask you something, how come when I call your computer support line, I have to wait an hour and a half?

Name: Pete
Lines: I told you, were adding new operators all the time. Could we concentrate on my training?

Name: Hoshi
Lines: Its just hard when I know I have e-mail I cant get!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hi!

Name: Pete
Lines: Monica!  Hi honey.

Name: Hoshi
Lines: All right, on the table.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey, umm, so listen umm, my friends were telling me a little about this ah, ultimate fighting thing and it, well it sounds really dangerous. I-I dont want you to get hurt, cause I kinda like you.

Name: Pete
Lines: Oh, believe me, I dont want to get hurt either. Im being smart about this. See these guys? Theyre the best trainers in the world, and Hoshi here used to be a paid assassin.  A house painter! He used to be a house painter.

Name: Monica
Lines: Promise me youll be careful.

Name: Pete
Lines: I promise.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey, are we still on for tonight?

Name: Pete
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay, good, cause umm, well maybe we could have a little workout of our own...

Name: Hoshi
Lines: No! No boom-boom before big fight!

Name: Monica
Lines: How bout just a boom?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well that was depressing, I think I just bought a soft pretzel from one of the kids from Fame. Ready to go to the movies?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Um-hmm. Oh wait! This is Bonnie.

Name: Bonnie
Lines: Hi!

Name: Bonnie
Lines: I can show you an ID if you want?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh no, Im sorry, you look a lot different from the last time I-I saw you.

Name: Bonnie
Lines: Oh yeah, well I just started wearing bras again.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, that must be it.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well I hope you have fun tonight.

Name: Bonnie
Lines: Thanks! You too.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You said she was bald.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, she was bald, shes not now.

Name: Rachel
Lines: How could you not tell me that she has hair?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I dont know, I hardly ever say that about people.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohh, well, this is just perfect!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well Im sorry, I thought you said it was okay.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, I said what was okay when I thought she was some weird bald chick. I mean, y'know, that girl has hair got all over head!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, maybe it wont work out. Maybe Ross wont like her personality.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Why, does she have a bad personality?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh no, Bonnies the best!

Name: Chandler
Lines: What is with him?

Name: Phil
Lines: With him? Youre is favourite, youre his guy!

Name: Stevens
Lines: We never get smacked.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, thats not true, he-he smacked you once.

Name: Phil
Lines: Not on purpose, he ricocheted of you and got me.

Name: Stevens
Lines: Im telling you, I need some smacks. I got a kid starting Dartmouth in the fall.

Name: Doug
Lines: Dartmouth? Who went to Dartmouth? Dartmouth sucks. Did you go to Dartmouth Bing?

Name: Chandler
Lines: No sir.

Name: Doug
Lines: There you go.

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: Monica
Lines: God Ross, what is that?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, its the Ultimate Fighting Combo. Yeah, I saved thirty cents, plus I get to keep the cup. Yay!!

Name: Announcer
Lines: From New York City, New York! Appearing in his Ultimate Fighting Championship debut! Hes known for his confrontational business style. Ladies and Gentlemen, introducing Pete Beck-errrr!!

Name: Monica
Lines: I love you, Pete!!!

Name: Announcer
Lines: And his opponent, from Hunnington Beach, California! Hes a 300 pound street fighter, Tank Abbottttttt!!!!

Name: Monica
Lines: Pete! Pete!! That guys pretty huge!

Name: Pete
Lines: Dont worry, Hoshi taught me how to use an opponents strength and weight against him.

Name: Ross
Lines: Well, then that guy is in serious, serious trouble.

Name: Ross
Lines: All right! You go get him! Lets go!

Name: Pete
Lines: Uh-oh.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey!  Its me. Mon-i-ca! Can I just tell you how proud I am of you.

Name: Pete
Lines: It would be nice after hearing 20,000 people chant You suck!

Name: Monica
Lines: I mean I-I thought you were nuts at first, but you-you did it. And now you can just look back at this thing with no regrets.

Name: Pete
Lines: What, look back?

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, youre not gonna get going are you?

Name: Pete
Lines: Well let me ask you a question. Am I the Ultimate Fighting Champion?

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, no. But...

Name: Pete
Lines: Well Im not gonna stop until Im the Ultimate Fighting Champion.

Name: Monica
Lines: That guy stood on your neck until you passed out!

Name: Pete
Lines: Let me tell you a story. When I set out to create Moss 865, do you think it just happened overnight? No. There was Moss 1, that burnt down my Dads garage, there was Moss 2 that would only schedule appointments in January, and 862 others that I learned from, just like I learned from this fight, never to let a guy stand on my neck.

Name: Monica
Lines: You didnt know that already?

Name: Pete
Lines: Look, Im gonna get better. Okay? I promise you.

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay, just get a lot better.  Fast.

Name: Pete
Lines: Oh, one other thing. Hoshi thinks that you being ringside may have affected my concentration.

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah. That-that was the problem.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey.

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey! How long until Petes fight?

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, about five minutes. Right now theyre interviewing his opponent. Apparently he trains by going to Iran and pulling the arms off thieves.

Name: Ross
Lines: Hot dog?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So Ross, how umm, how did it go with Bonnie?

Name: Ross
Lines: What? Oh! I gotta tell you, I-I wasnt expecting to like her at all, I mean I actually wasnt expecting to like anyone right now, but shes really terrific.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ohh, thats too bad!

Name: Ross
Lines: No, I-Im saying I liked her.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, y'know what, there are other fish in the sea.

Name: Ross
Lines: Pheebs, I think shes great. Okay? Were going out again.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, I hear you! Are you capable of talking about any thing else?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey! Which ones my turkey burger?

Name: Ross
Lines: Ahh, the one next to my foot. Sorry.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, the fights starting!

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay, well be right in.  So ah, did your boss try to slap you again today?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Nine times! Okay, I had to put on lotion! But, its gonna be okay, because as of tomorrow Im conducting an experiment, and if all goes as planned, my butt will be smack free.

Name: Joey
Lines: Fights over!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Excuse me, Doug?  Hey there sports fan!!

Name: Doug
Lines: Bing! You got those numbers for me?

Name: Chandler
Lines: No, I ah, I didnt do them.

Name: Doug
Lines: Oh, you forgot?

Name: Chandler
Lines: No, no I just ah, didnt do them. Instead, I ah, hung out with a couple of friends and had a couple of beers so I certainly dont deserve any praise, verbal or otherwise.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Doug!!

Name: Doug
Lines: Hmm.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Im a little bit uncomfortable with the that way you express yourself.

Name: Doug
Lines: Oh, is it the swearing? I mean is it the constant swearing? Because I gotta tell ya, if it is, you can just... kiss my ass!

Name: Chandler
Lines: No, no. It-its not about the swearing, its more about ah, the way, that you ah, occasionally, concentrate, your enthusiasm on my buttock.

Name: Doug
Lines: Oh?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, and dont get me wrong, I appreciate the sentiment. Its just that I, I have a rather, sensitive posterior, and ah, besides, its making all the other guys jealous.

Name: Doug
Lines: Well, say no more. Y'know it takes guts to bring this up. Bing! Youre okay.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: Doug
Lines: Ha!  Ahhhhhhh!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ahhhhh!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay. Would you rather live in the shirt pocket of a sweaty giant, or inside his shower drain?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh my God! Phoebe look, its Ross and that girl.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No! No! Look at that!  Its a line of ants! Theyre working as a team!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Phoebe!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Right, oh yeah. Wow, oh, it looks like Ross is breaking up with her. Uff, I hope he lets her down easy. Lets go.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Come on Phoebe, look at that! They are not breaking up, look at them. Okay thats, you know what that is? That is a, that is a second date, thats what that is! Look at that, she just put her hand on his thigh...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh no! That really is nothing, she is very sexually aggressive.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohh!  Phoebe, this is all your fault! Now he loves her, hes gonna marry her, and this is all your fault.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: You said it was okay!

Name: Rachel
Lines: You said she was bald!!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: What?! What-what-what-what-what?!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Phoebe, we cant, we just cant just let it happen! Okay, we have to do something! We have to break them up! Okay? Just go in there and like, shave her head! You owe me one bald girl!!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, first of all, breathe. Second of all, I dont get it. Arent you the one that decided that you didnt want to be with Ross?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yes.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well isnt he your friend? Dont you want him to be happy?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yes.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So?

Name: Rachel
Lines: I just y'know, I didnt expect him to be this happy so soon. Ufff. Ooo-ooh!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh no.

Name: Rachel
Lines: What?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, we killed them all.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh!

Name: Pete
Lines: Its okay, its not as bad as it looks, its a precaution. Ah, Im not supposed to move my spine.

Name: Monica
Lines: Please tell me youre stopping now.

Name: Pete
Lines: Im fine! Id fight tonight, if theyd let me.  See this circle Im marking off here? This is my zone of terror.

Name: Monica
Lines: You are insane! You-you gotta give this up!

Name: Pete
Lines: I cant until Im the ultimate fighter. I will do it. Im telling you, the day will come when children will argue over who will win a fight, me or Superman. Now, Im not saying I could beat Superman, but y'know, kids are stupid.

Name: Monica
Lines: Sit down. All right? Please, just listen to me. You are terrible at this! Okay? You are the worst ultimate fighter ever! Ever!!

Name: Pete
Lines: Y'know I have a torn rotator cuff, a hairline fracture in my right forearm, and a severely bruised Adams Apple, but that really hurt.

Name: Monica
Lines: Well then, y'know what? I care about you to much to watch you hurt yourself like this. So if you have to do this, then youre gonna have to do it without me.

Name: Pete
Lines: Well if youre asking me to quit, then youre asking me to be someone Im not. Ive got to do this.

Name: Monica
Lines: Then Ive gotta go. Bye.

Name: Pete
Lines: Mon-Monica?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yes?

Name: Pete
Lines: Could you leave a note? Cause Im on a lot of pain killers now, and I dont know if Ill remember this tomorrow.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Thank you, sir.

Name: Stevens
Lines: Oh, excuse me. I forgot my briefcase y'know, by accident.

Name: Chandler
Lines: No. No, not at all, thats-thats ridiculous.

Name: Doug
Lines: Everybody else got one, and you want one too. Dont you?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ye-ye-yeah, yes I do!

Name: Doug
Lines: Now get on out of here, you!

Name: TV Announcer
Lines: Pete Becker is circling the ring now. It looks like, hes just trying to feel him out. Oh, Bruiser is just...

Name: Chandler
Lines: Run! Run you crazy, rich freak!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, I cant watch this.

Name: Joey
Lines: Check it out, hes winning!  Petes winning!

Name: Monica
Lines: Really?!

Name: Joey
Lines: No-o-o!!

Name: TV Announcer
Lines: Uh-oh, Bruiser has Becker on the canvas and is going for his favourite area.

Name: All
Lines: Oh! Oh!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Wait, if thats his favourite area, why is he being so mean to it?

Name: Ross
Lines: Well, this is ironic. Of your last two boyfriends, Richard didnt want to have kids, and from the looks of it, now Pete cant.

Name: All
Lines: Ohh!!

Name: Story by
Lines: Pan-ni Landrum & Mark J. Kunerth Teleplay by: Adam Chase Transcribed by: Eric Aasen

Name: Chandler
Lines: So ah, your first sexual experience was with a woman?!

Name: Bonnie
Lines: All right, I was 15, it was my best friend, Ruth, and we got drunk on that hard cider, and then suddenly, I dont know, we were, we were making out.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Tell it again.  Seriously.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I mean is that woman capable of talking about anything else but sex?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, sure. Well y'know, earlier she was talking about geography.

Name: Monica
Lines: Joey, she was listing the countries shes done it in.

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, I think we all learned something.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Me and Frank and Phoebe, Graduation 1965.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Y'know what that means?

Name: Joey
Lines: That youre actually 50?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No-no, thats not, thats not me Phoebe, thats her pal Phoebe. According to her high school yearbook, they were like B.F.F.  Best Friends Forever.

Name: All
Lines: Oh!

Name: Rachel
Lines: That is so cool.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I know! So this woman probably could like have all kinds of stories about my parents, and she might even know like where my Dad is. So I looked her up, and she lives out by the beach. So maybe this weekend we could go to the beach?

Name: All
Lines: Yeah! Yeah, we can!

Name: Bonnie
Lines: Shoot! I cant go, I have to work!

Name: Ross
Lines: Thats too bad.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohh, big, fat bummerrr.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So great! Okay! Tomorrow were gonna drive out to Montauk.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, Bonnie had sex there!

Name: Monica
Lines: Would you look at them. Am I ever gonna find a boyfriend again? I gonna die an old maid.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Youre not gonna die an old maid, maybe an old spinster cook.

Name: Monica
Lines: Thanks!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey now besides, if worst comes to worst, Ill be your boyfriend.

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah right.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Why is that so funny?

Name: Monica
Lines: You made a joke right? So I laughed.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ha-ha-ha. A little to hard. What am I not ah, boyfriend material?

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, no. Youre Chandler. Y'know, Chandler!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, so weve established my name, and hit me. But theoretically y'know, I mean say we werent friends, say its a blind date. I show up at your door, and Im like  Hey, nice to meet, ya. Hey, oh-hey.

Name: Monica
Lines: Well Id probably be scared of a guy using a fake voice.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, hey! Oh good, you brought food!

Name: Joey
Lines: No, its just my luggage.

Name: Chandler, Monica, and Joey
Lines: Hey!!

Name: Joey
Lines: Woo-hoo! All right! Yeah!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, I am having the best karma this week. First, I find this woman who knew my parents, and then my client with the fuzzy back gives me his beach house.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah? What about ah, that bike messenger you hit?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, I wasnt talking about his karma.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey-hey, check out the hat!

Name: Chandler
Lines: What a minute, I know that hat! I was taken aboard that hat! They did experiments on me! I cant have children!!

Name: Monica
Lines: Seriously, where did you get the hat?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ross gave it to me.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, I think she looks good.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohh, thank you.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Buy it for ya, or win it for ya?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well excuse me, my fashion-impaired friends, I am here to tell you that hats are back.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: And this time, theyve ganged up to form one giant, super hat.

Name: Ross
Lines: Go, go, go!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh yeah, now everybody wants to be under this hat!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oy!!

Name: Monica
Lines: Whats with all this sand?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, yeah, Bob said there might be flood damage.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, either that, or he has a really big cat.

Name: Phoebe Sr
Lines: Well, yes, its kindve an unusual house. It has umm, three beautiful bedrooms and ah, no baths. But y'know, the ocean is right there.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Knock, knock, knock.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Are you ah, Phoebe Abott?

Name: Phoebe Sr
Lines: Ahh, yes.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hi Phoebe Abott, Im your best friends daughter!

Name: Phoebe Sr
Lines: Youre Erwins daughter?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, I-I mean your-your old best friend, here.  Lily, from high school. Remember?

Name: Phoebe Sr
Lines: Oh gosh, Lily, yes. Of course I remember Lily. I... Then you must be?

Name: Phoebe Sr
