Name: Chandler
Lines: Joey kept screaming at me, Do it now! Do it!! Do it! Do it now!! Sometimes late at night I can still here the screaming.

Name: Joey
Lines: Thats cause sometimes I just do it through my wall to freak you out.

Name: Phoebe Sr.
Lines: Ill go in a second, I-I just wanted to tell you that there hasnt been a day where I didnt regret giving you up.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, bye.

Name: Phoebe Sr.
Lines: No, Im not done. I-I-I just want you to know that I, the reason I didnt look you up was, well I was afraid that youd react, just well like, the way, the way youre reacting right now, and cant we just, y'know, start from here?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No.

Name: Phoebe Sr.
Lines: Sorry. But just one last thing. Y'know you came looking for family. Im family, Im it. Now, now Im done.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: But, its not like were losing anything. Y'know?

Name: Phoebe Sr.
Lines: Yeah, I guess youre right.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Its not like we-we know each other or anything. Or that have anything in common.

Name: Phoebe Sr.
Lines: Well, I dont know. I mean its not like we dont have anything in common. I mean I like uh, pizza.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I-I like pizza!

Name: Phoebe Sr.
Lines: You do?! Wait, I like umm, the Beetles.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh my God, so do I!

Name: Phoebe Sr.
Lines: I knew it, wow!!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Wait-wait-wait, wait! Puppies. Cute or ugly?

Name: Phoebe Sr.
Lines: Ohh, so cute.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh, well! But umm, still Im-Im mad at you.

Name: Phoebe Sr.
Lines: I know. Im mad at me too.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well umm, do you wanna get something to eat? Im kinda hungry.

Name: Phoebe Sr.
Lines: Hey! Me too!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: All right, stop it. Now youre just doing it to freak me out.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh-hooo, I missed you.

Name: Ross
Lines: I missed you too.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ooh, I was soo nervous about that letter. But the way you owned up to everything, it just showed me how much youve grown. Y'know?

Name: Ross
Lines: I suppose.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You have! Ross, you should give yourself credit. I mean my Mom never thought this would work out. It was all, Once a cheater, always a cheater.

Name: Ross
Lines: Umm-hmm.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ooh, I just wish we hadnt lost those four months, but if time was what you needed just to gain a little perspective...

Name: Ross
Lines: WE WERE ON A BREAK!!!!!!!

Name: Monica
Lines: You bet.

Name: Ross
Lines: And for the record, it took two people to break up this relationship!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah! You and that girl from that copy place, which yesterday you took full responsibility for!!

Name: Ross
Lines: I didnt know what I was taking full responsibility for! Okay?! I didnt finish the whole letter!

Name: Rachel
Lines: What?!!

Name: Ross
Lines: I fell asleep!

Name: Rachel
Lines: You fell asleep?!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Y'know I cant believe I even thought about getting back together again! We are so over!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, oh, and hey-hey-hey, those little spelling tips will come in handy when youre at home on Saturday nights playing Scrabble with Monica!!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey!!

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, no-no-no dont you worry about me falling asleep. I still have your letter!!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: And hey! Just so you know, its not that common! It doesnt happen to every guy! And it is a big deal!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: I KNEW IT!!!!

Name: Monica
Lines: Gin.

Name: Chandler
Lines: We were playing Gin? Y'know if we were a couple, we could play this game naked.

Name: Monica
Lines: Will you stop!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay. All right.

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay, all right, I think youre great, I think youre sweet, and youre smart, and I love you. But you will always be the guy who peed on me.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Wow! That ripped! That ripped real nice!

Name: Joey
Lines: How many times do I have to tell you! Ya, turn and sliiiide! Y'know, turn and slide.

Name: Chandler
Lines: You dont turn and slide, you throw it out! Im tired of having to get a tetanus shot every time I get dressed!

Name: Joey
Lines: Look, were not throwing it out! I built this thing with my own hands!

Name: Chandler
Lines: All right, how about we, how bout we sell it.

Name: Joey
Lines: All right. But, youre gonna have to tell them.

Name: Chip
Lines: Hey Monica, its Chip.

Name: Monica
Lines: Yesss!!

Name: Ross
Lines: Whos Chip?

Name: Monica
Lines: Shhh!

Name: Chip
Lines: Good runnin into you at the bank today, so ah, heres my number, 555-9323. Give me a call. Later.

Name: Monica
Lines: Chip, is Chip Matthews.

Name: Ross
Lines: The guy who took Rachel to the prom? Why is he calling you?

Name: Monica
Lines: Cause I ran into him at the bank, he is still soo cute.

Name: Ross
Lines: Monica, youre so lucky! Hes like the most popular guy in school!!

Name: Ross
Lines: I was just leaving.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Good! Cause Ive got a product report to read, its like eight pages, I hope I dont fall asleep.

Name: Ross
Lines: Why? Did you write it?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Wow! Look at that, Chip Matthews called. I wonder what he wants?

Name: Ross
Lines: Well ah, actually...

Name: Rachel
Lines: I bet he sensed that I was ready to have sex with another guy.

Name: Ross
Lines: Well, umm, why dont you give him a call?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay.  Are you sure you wanna hear this?

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, Im sure.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, thats right! He called to ask out Monica! That-thats gotta be embarrassing!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey, heres a question; where did you guys get the finest oak East of the Mississippi?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Uh-huh, first you tell us where you got the prettiest lace in all the land.

Name: Ross
Lines: Im reading your ad.

Name: Joey
Lines: Looks good, uh?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh my God, you guys are selling the entertainment center?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Why? I love that thing.

Name: Chandler
Lines: You want it?

Name: Phoebe and Rachel
Lines: Oh no.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ahh, Gepeto, $5,000 dollars? Are you insane?

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, the ad alone cost 300 bucks!

Name: Chandler
Lines: All right look, Im changing it to 50 bucks, or your best offer.

Name: Joey
Lines: What kind of profit is that?! And you call yourself an accountant.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Nooo.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh. What do you do?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I cant believe you dont know what I do for a living!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I actually dont know...

Name: Ross
Lines: Good, so do I

Name: Rachel
Lines: Something to do with numbers?

Name: Rachel
Lines: What?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Nothing. Nothing.

Name: Joey
Lines: What? Whats wrong?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I just, I just have this really strong feeling that this cat is my Mother.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You mean the mom you met in Montauk. She was a cat?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, no-no, she was a human lady. This is the spirit of my Mom Lily, the one who killed herself.

Name: Ross
Lines: Are you sure shes in the cat, or have you been taking your grandmas glycoma medicine again?

Name: Joey
Lines: Dude, Phoebes mom has got a huge peni...

Name: Chandler
Lines: Let it go!!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Umm, when were you gonna tell me that youre going out with Chip Matthews?

Name: Monica
Lines: Now? Is it okay if I go out with Chip Matthews?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Nooo! Its not okay! I cant believe you would want to after what he did to me!

Name: Monica
Lines: What, that little thing at the prom?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Monica! I couldnt find him for two hours! He was having sex with Amy Welch!

Name: Monica
Lines: Come on, that was back in high school! How could that still bother you?

Name: Rachel
Lines: I mean why, of all people would you want to go out with Chip?!

Name: Monica
Lines: Look, you and I went to different high schools...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay, that doesnt help me, because we went to the same high school.

Name: Monica
Lines: You went to one where you were popular, and you got to ride off Chips motorcycle, and wear his letterman jacket. I went to one where I wore a band uniform they had to have specially made.

Name: Rachel
Lines: They had to have that specially made?!

Name: Monica
Lines: It was a project for one of the Home Ec classes.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh my God, they told us that was for the mascot!

Name: Monica
Lines: Back then, I thought that I would never, ever get the chance to go out with a Chip Matthews, and now hes-hes called me up and asked me out. And the fat girl inside of me really wants to go. I-I owe her this. I never let her eat.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, you go out with him.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, really?!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah. Just, if its possible, could you leave him somewhere and go have sex with another guy?

Name: Monica
Lines: Ill try.

Name: Ross
Lines: So you guys having any luck getting rid of the entertainment center?

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, there were a couple of calls last night, but ah, I dont think any of them are gonna work out.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yes, Joey has a very careful screening process. Apparently, not everyone is qualified to own wood and nails.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Stop it! Stop it! She keeps squirming, trying to get away! Just like when she was alive.

Name: Ross
Lines: So Pheebs, how long is your mom gonna be with us?

Name: Monica
Lines: Why cant you use the phone in here?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, Im returning a call from a certain mom at the B-E-A-C-H. I just spelled the wrong word.

Name: Ross
Lines: So, guys, am I crazy, or does Phoebes mom remind anyone of a cat?

Name: Monica
Lines: Ross, dont start.

Name: Ross
Lines: Come on, you-you cant tell me you actually believe that-that theres a woman inside that cat!

Name: Rachel
Lines: I believe it.

Name: Ross
Lines: No you dont.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yes, I do.

Name: Ross
Lines: No you doy'know what, youre not gonna suck me into this.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh sure I am, because you always have to be right.

Name: Ross
Lines: I do not always have to beokay, okay.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Jurassic Park could happen.

Name: Tony
Lines: Wow! Thats ah, thats pretty nice!

Name: Joey
Lines: Pretty nice?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Youll have to pardon my roommate, he wanted to marry this.

Name: Tony
Lines: We dont have 50 bucks, but would you be willing to trade for it? Weve got a canoe.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Y'know, I, I really dont think we need a canoe.

Name: Tony
Lines: You gotta take the canoe!

Name: Chandler
Lines: All right, just, just take the entertainment center, and then when you get home, throw the canoe away!

Name: Peter
Lines: Were not throwing it away! I built that canoe!

Name: Joey
Lines: Good for you!!

Name: Ross
Lines: Apparently Phoebes mother also goes by the name Julio.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You guys, theres a little girl in Soho looking for this cat. I mean, you know what that means?!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah-eah! 200 dollar reward, split five ways!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Do we have to tell her?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yes, we have to tell her!

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, but its made her so happy.

Name: All
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Ross
Lines: Thank you.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I hate when Ross is right!

Name: Monica
Lines: He is right, isnt he?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Y'know what, I think this might be one of the times hes wrong.

Name: All
Lines: You think?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh-no, hes right.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hi!

Name: All
Lines: Hey!

Name: Joey
Lines: Uh, Pheebs, about your mom...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah?

Name: Joey
Lines: Hows that going?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So great. Oh, we took a nap today and my Mom fell asleep on my tummy and purred.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Pheebs...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I just feel so, uhh.....

Name: Rachel
Lines: All right!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Im coming already!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Jeez!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hello, Chip.

Name: Chip
Lines: Hey, Rach! How ya doin?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Im great! Im great. Ive got a great job at Bloomingdales, have wonderful friends, and eventhough Im not seeing anyone right now, Ive never felt better about myself.

Name: Chip
Lines: So ah, Monica ready yet?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Shell be out in a second. So, Chip, hows umm, Amy Welch?

Name: Chip
Lines: Amy Welch? Wow! I havent seen her since... So, Monica about ready?

Name: Joey
Lines: This is the unit for you my friend. Sturdy construction, tons of storage compartments, some big enough to fit a grown man.

Name: Guy
Lines: What?!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh yeah! I got in there myself once. My roommate bet me five bucks that I couldnt, and then he stuck a board through the handles that locked me in. Yeah. It was funny til I started feeling like I was in a coffin.

Name: Guy
Lines: No, you, you cant fit in that thing. Thats not deep enough.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh yeah?  If I cant, Ill knock five bucks off the price off the unit.

Name: Guy
Lines: All right, you have yourself a deal.

Name: Joey
Lines: Okay.  See?! I told ya!

Name: Joey
Lines: Sometimes I get in here just to get away from it! Hey, a nickel!!

Name: Chip
Lines: Here, we are.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh my God! You still have the Chipper!

Name: Chip
Lines: The what?

Name: Monica
Lines: Thats what we used to call your ah, your motorcycle in high school. Y'know how a motorcycle is a Chopper, and youre Chip. Nevermind.

Name: Chip
Lines: No, I think its cute.

Name: Monica
Lines: Wow! A lipper from Chipper.

Name: Chip
Lines: So you still in touch with anyone from high school?

Name: Monica
Lines: Umm. Well, theres Rachel, and umm, I think thats it. How bout you?

Name: Chip
Lines: Oh yeah, I still hang with Simmons and Zana, y'know. I see Spindler a lot. Devane, Kelly, and I run into Goldie from time to time. Steve Brown, Zuchoff, McGwire, J.T., Breadsly.

Name: Monica
Lines: Is that all?

Name: Chip
Lines: Ehh, y'know after high school, you just kinda lose touch. Oh yeah! I ran into Richard Dorfman.

Name: Monica
Lines: Ohh, how is he?

Name: Chip
Lines: Not so good, Simmons and I gave him a wedgie.

Name: Monica
Lines: Isnt he an architect now?

Name: Chip
Lines: Yeah, they still wear underwear.

Name: Chandler
Lines: OH MY GOD!!!

Name: Joey
Lines: WHAT?!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Are you all right?!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah...

Name: Chandler
Lines: What happened?!!

Name: Joey
Lines: Awww, man! He promised he wouldnt take the chairs!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: What the hell happened?!! How were you locked in?!! And where the hell is all of our stuff?!!

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, this guy came by to look at the unit and-and he said he didnt think big enough to fit a grown man!

Name: Chandler
Lines: SoYou got in voluntarily?!

Name: Joey
Lines: I was tryin to make a sale!! Oh, man, if I ever run into that guy again, do you know what Im gonna do?

Name: Chandler
Lines: BEND OVER?!!!

Name: Chip
Lines: ...and then Zana, just let one rip!!

Name: Monica
Lines: Look, not that I enjoy talking about people who I went to high school with, cause I do, but umm, maybe we could talk about something else? Like you, I dont even know where you work?

Name: Chip
Lines: You know where I work!

Name: Monica
Lines: I do?

Name: Chip
Lines: The movie theatre, you used to come in all the time.

Name: Monica
Lines: You still work at the multiplex?

Name: Chip
Lines: Oh, like Id give up that job! Free popcorn and candy, anytime I want. I can get you free posters for your room.

Name: Monica
Lines: Thanks, Im set. Do you still live with your parents?

Name: Chip
Lines: Oh yeah, but I can stay out as late as I want.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Wow! They really got you guys. Your T.V. The chairs.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh yeah, your microwave. The stereo.

Name: Joey
Lines: Aww, man, he took the five of spades!! Oh, no-no-no, here it is!

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh my God! What happened?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, umm, Joey was born, and then 28 years later, I was robbed!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: So, how was your date?

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, y'know how I always wanted to go out with Chip Matthews in high school?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Um-hmm.

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, tonight, I actually went out with Chip Matthews in high school.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh honey, Im sorry.

Name: Monica
Lines: No, its okay, not only did I get to go out with Chip Matthews, I got to dump Chip Matthews.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohh! Thats so great!

Name: Monica
Lines: I know!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey! So ah, what did the insurance company say?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, they said uh, You dont have insurance here, so stop calling us.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah?  Hi!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hi! Listen uhh, this cat belongs to a little girl. There are flyers all over the place.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Im sorry, sweetie.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey, we can take her back with you if you want.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ohh. Um-hmm. But y'know, she choose to find me. I mean, I have to respect her decision. Right?

Name: Chandler, Monica, Joey, and Rachel
Lines: Thats a good call. Right.

Name: Ross
Lines: No! No! LookHey, enough is enough! Look, I am sorry that you feel guilty or whatever about spending time with your new mom, but this is not your old mom. This is a cat! Okay, Julio the cat! Not mom! Cat!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ross, how many parents have you lost?

Name: Ross
Lines: None.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, then you dont know what it feels like when one of them comes back. Do you? I believe this is my Mother. Even if Im wrong, who cares? Just be a friend. Okay? Be supportive.

Name: Ross
Lines: Im sorry.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: Ross
Lines: I dont know what to say.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You could.... say youre sorry to her mom.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I think she would like that.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Thank you. We both forgive you.

Name: Rachel
Lines: So honey, what are you gonna do about the little girl?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, okay, listen, umm, Mom, I hope you know you still mean a lot to me. And youre welcome to come back anytime.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Pheebs, if she could come back as a couch, wed really appreciate it.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Come on, Mom, Ill take you home.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ill go with you.

Name: Monica
Lines: Me too.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh! Y'know, Ive got an extra futon.

Name: Joey
Lines: Dude, you dont have to brag! We got nothing here!!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey!! We are so in luck! Treeger said that we could have all this cool stuff from the basement. Wait right there.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh no-no-no, Im, Im paddling away!

Name: Joey
Lines: Huh?!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Wow! Really?! We get all this rusty crap for free?!

Name: Joey
Lines: Uh-huh. This and a bunch of bubble wrap. And, some of it is not even popped!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Could we be more white trash?

Name: Monica
Lines: How desperate am I?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh! Good thing Chandlers not here, he always wins at this game.

Name: Monica
Lines: I just told my Mom Id cater a party for her.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: How come?

Name: Monica
Lines: Because I need the money, and I thought that itd be a great way to get rid of that last little schmidgen of self-respect.

Name: Ross
Lines: Come on, I think this is a good thing. I dont think Mom wouldve hired you if she didnt think you were good at what you do.

Name: Monica
Lines: You dont have to stick up for her. She cant here you.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey! Umm, do you guys have any juice?

Name: Joey
Lines: Just pickle.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey uh, Rach, funny story. I ah, bumped into Joanna on the street yesterday.

Name: Rachel
Lines: My boss, Joanna? Wow, that mustve been awkward.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, no, actually she uh, asked me if I wanted to get a drink.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You ah, you didnt say Yes to that did you?

Name: Chandler
Lines: No. No!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, not at first.

Name: Rachel
Lines: What is she doing here?

Name: Rachel
Lines: I dont understand! Last time you went out with her you said she was a big, dull dud.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, I think I judged her too quickly, and this time we were able to take the relationship to the next level.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, last time I almost got fired. You must end it, you must end it now!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, come on! Its not like this is an everyday occurrence for me! I mean usually Im pretty much just in there by myself.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Chandler!!  Promise me, you will end it.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, I promise, Ill end it.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Thank you.

Name: Chandler
Lines: I hope you know what Im giving up for ya, because shes not just the boss in your office, if you know what I mean.

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah-eh-eah!  Oh-oh, sorry, I-I knew what he meant.

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Hows the hired help?

Name: Monica
Lines: Doing great, the quiches are coming along.

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Whats this? Blue nail polish?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, I thought it was cute.

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Ahh, thats what your Grandmothers hands looked like when we found her.

Name: Monica
Lines: Let me ask you a question.

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Hmm.

Name: Monica
Lines: Why did you hire me?

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Oh, well Richard raved about the food at his party, of course you were sleeping with him. Then I heard the food at that lesbian wedding was very nice, I assume you werent sleeping with anybody there. Though, at least that would be something.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh my God! Did you hear that? She hired me because she thinks Im good.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, I didnt hear that.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh yeah, she didnt hire me out of pity, it wasnt so she could pick on me in front of her friends, she actually thinks Im good.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Wow! And hey, its cool if youre a lesbian!

Name: The Salesman
Lines: Good afternoon, are you the decision maker of the house?

Name: Joey
Lines: Uhhhh.

Name: The Salesman
Lines: Do you ah, currently own a set of encyclopedias?

Name: Joey
Lines: No! No. But ah, try the classifieds, people sell everything in there.

Name: The Salesman
Lines: Actually, Im not buying. Im selling. Let me ask you one question. Do your friends ever have a conversation and you just nod along even though youre not really sure what theyre talking about?

Name: Ross
Lines: Im telling you its totally unconstituional.

Name: Monica, Chandler, Phoebe, and Rachel
Lines: Oh yeah, I totally agree.

Name: Monica
Lines: I think he deserves a Nobel Prize.

Name: All
Lines: Nooo!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: it was like the Algonquin kids table.

Name: The Salesman
Lines: Excuse me, Im sorry, you havent said anything for about two and a half minutes, are you at all interested?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah-well-yeah! Yeah-oh-yeah. Come on in.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Thats weird.

Name: Monica
Lines: What?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Your nails.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, I know, I never wear fake ones. I just did it so my Mom wouldnt give me grief about me biting them.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, no, I meant that its weird that you only have nine now.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, dont panic. Im gonna go to the store, Im gonna get you another set of nails, no ones gonna know, and youre gonna look great.  Oh! Oh, its cause theyre gonna eatthats the problem.

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay ah, please dont freak out. Umm, but ah, theres a blue fingernail in one of the quiche cups, and theres no way to know which one.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: And! Whoever finds it wins the prize!

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Im not freaking out.

Name: Monica
Lines: Then why are you laughing?

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Its nothing, its just that now your Father owes me five dollars.

Name: Monica
Lines: What? You bet Id lose a nail?

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Oh no, dont be silly. I just bet Id need these.

Name: Monica
Lines: Frozen lasagnas?

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Um-hmm.

Name: Monica
Lines: You bet that Id screw up?! So all that stuff about hiring me because I was good was

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: No-no-no, that was all true. This was just in case you pulled a Monica.

Name: Monica
Lines: You promised Dr. Weinburg, youd never use that phrase.

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Oh honey, come on, have a sense of humour, youve never been able to laugh at yourself.

Name: Monica
Lines: Thats right. My Mom doesnt have any faith in me! Oh, thats hilarious! Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I dont get it.

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: No, I have faith

Name: Oven
Lines: Ding!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Op, the ruined quiches are ready.

Name: Chandler
Lines: It just doesntfeel like were breaking up.

Name: Joanna
Lines: No, we are. Im sad.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Thanks.

Name: Joanna
Lines: No, no, that was my boss. I have to go.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: Joanna
Lines: What are you doing?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Im getting dressed.

Name: Joanna
Lines: Why?

Name: Chandler
Lines: When I walk outside naked people throw garbage at me.

Name: Joanna
Lines: Wait. I wanna show you something.

Name: Chandler
Lines: What is it?

Name: Joanna

Lines: Youll see.

Name: Emily

Name: Emily
Lines: Oh God.

Name: Ross
Lines: But-but, if you dont love this, well do it in any other place at any other time. Really, its fine, whatever you want.

Name: Emily
Lines: Its perfect.

Name: Ross
Lines: And, I dont know, if it starts to rain

Name: Emily
Lines: Well then well get wet.

Name: Monica
Lines: Ohh. And I dont even have a date.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Pheebs?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Do you remember where the duck food is?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, its in the guys apartment under the sink. Why?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Because Im going to London.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: What?! What do you mean youre going to London?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, I have to tell Ross that I love him. Now honey, you take care, you dont have those babies until I get back.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: IRachel, you cant go! Ross loves Emily!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, I know, I know, I know he does. But I have to tell him how I feel! He deserves to have all the information and then he can make an informed decision.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Thats not why youre going! Youre going because you hope hes gonna say, "Yeah, I love you too, Rach. Forget that British chippy."

Name: Rachel
Lines: OhhDo you think he will?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No! Because hes in love with the British chippy! Look, Rachel, if you go, youre just gonna mess with his head and ruin his wedding! Yknow, its too late! You missed youre chance! Im sorry, I know this must be really hard, its over.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yknow what? No. Its not over until someone says, "I do."

Name: Housekeeper
Lines: The Waltham Residence.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh...yes..is this..umm..Emilys Parents house.

Name: Housekeeper
Lines: This is the housekeeper speaking. And by the way, young lady, that is not how one addresses oneself on the telephone. First one identifies oneself and then asks for the person with whom one wishes to speak.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: This is Phoebe Buffay. I was wondering, please, if-if its not too much trouble, please, umm, might I speak to Miss Emily Waltham, please?

Name: Housekeeper
Lines: Miss Waltham, is at the rehearsal dinner and its not polite to make fun of people. Goodbye.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No no no, Ill be nice, I swear!!!  Could you just give me the number for where they are?

Name: Housekeeper
Lines: Im afraid, Im not at liberty to divulge that information.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ok, somebody is on their way to ruin wedding okay. And I have to warn somebody, alright. So if you dont give me that number then Im going to come over there and kick your snooty ass all the way to New Glocken..shire.

Name: Housekeeper
Lines: Hangs up.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hello, Hello. Ohh, OHH, she knew I could kick her ass.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey.

Lines: Hi. Mom. Dad.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: Judy, the kids..

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Jack, thats what they call the subway.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: Ohh, I thought that you....

Name: Ross and Monica
Lines: Dad, dad. We got it!! We Got It!!!

Name: Emily
Lines: Ohh, here comes my dad and stepmum. Mister and Misses Geller, this is Steven and Andrea Waltham.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Sorry, what?

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Where?

Lines: Lovely to meet you.

Name: Mrs. Geller

Name: Monica
Lines: Ha ha, a joke thats funny in all countries.

Name: Waiter
Lines: Sir?

Name: Joey
Lines: Whats in it?

Name: Waiter
Lines: Goat cheese, water chestnuts, and panchetta.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Joey, its been three days, okay.. Your just a little homesick, Okay. Would you just try to relax. Just, just try to enjoy yourself.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: What the hell!!!

Name: Ross
Lines: whats up, Dad?

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: This bill for my half of the wedding. its insane.

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: How could it be so much? The receptions at their house.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: And you tell him no one takes advantage of the Gellers.

Lines: Hello.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hello. Umm, when is your next flight to London?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohh, good.

Name: Rachel

Name: Ticket Agent

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohh, I just dont think I have enough left on my credit card.

Name: Ticket Agent
Lines: Well you can split it with another credit card.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohh, okay, how about five.  Ohh, thank you.

Name: Ticket Agent

Name: Ross
Lines: Look, face it, my father is not going to pay for the build-in barbecue and believe me you can kiss you gazebo goodbye. Now I might be able to get you the new lawn.

Lines: Ahh, then you have to give us the lawn ornaments.

Name: Ross
Lines: I go back there with lawn ornaments, hes going to laugh in my face.

Name: Mrs. Waltham

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi, Pheebs.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh thank god. Oh, you changed your mind. Oh, look I know you probably want to be alone, and you dont want to talk about it, thats fine. I just want you to know, I think you are doing the right thing and...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Bye, Pheebs.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Hello, Waltham Interiors.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Who is this?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, Im Phoebe Buffay. Im one of Rosss best friends.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No..umm, could I talk to one of them? Its very very important.

Lines: No, Im bored with you now. Im going to cut you off.

Name: Phoebe

Lines: Im not going anywhere, sweetheart.

Lines: I was laughing.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Out loud?

Name: Chandler
Lines: So how are you doing?

Name: Monica

Lines: I just want to say that Ross is a wonderful young man.

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, thanks, we like him.

Name: Drunk Man
Lines: My god!! You must have been a teenage when you had him.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: Theres no way in hell, Im paying for it.

Name: Ross
Lines: Look, were down to just one point. Could we please, maybe just settle it after the wedding.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: All-right fine, but I just want to say, Im not paying for your wine cellar. You thieving, would be speaking German if it werent for us, cheap little man.

Name: Chandler
Lines: The guy was hammered, okay? Theres no way, you look like Rosss mother.

Name: Monica
Lines: Then why would he say it?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Because hes crazy. Okay? He came up to me earlier and thanked me for my very moving performance in Titanic.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, my mothers right. Im never going to get married.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ahh, you know what? That is....Who wouldnt want you?

Name: Monica

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi, Im back. Listen, I need to...

Lines: Hello.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hello. I need to get on the 11 o'clock flight.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay, you know what/ Youre going to have to call that plane and tell them to swing around and come and pick me up.

Lines: I cant do that.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Sure, you know what? Come on, well just tell them that there was like a problem with like the "engine".

Name: Ticket Agent

Name: Rachel

Name: Rachel
Lines: All right, you know what? I am not leaving here, until you call that plane back!!

Name: Ross

Name: Chandler
Lines: Morning, Ross.

Lines: Im getting married, to..day!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah you are!!

Name: Ross
Lines: Ahh, whoo-hoo!!(He runs back out the door.

Lines: So, ahh, how are ya? How ya...How ya... You okay?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yep, yep...You?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yes...Yes..Uh-huh, You? We did you.

Name: Monica
Lines: Well...Id better get going.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh yea yea, absolutely.

Name: Monica

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohhh.

Lines: Ahh, ahh, excuse me.

Name: Rachel

Name: Passenger

Lines: Hello?

Lines: Hey, were the hell have you been?!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey. I spent the night out. I met this cute bridesmaid. She is so...

Name: Joey
Lines: Ahh Pheebs, you know youre still my number one girl.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No! No, we have an emergency. Okay? Rachels coming to London.

Name: Joey
Lines: Ohh great!!!

Name: Phoebe

Name: Joey

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I KNOW THAT!!! You have to stop her!! Shes going to ruin the wedding!!

Name: Joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: All right, so, okay...

Name: Joey
Lines: Hold on. Hold on.  Rachel coming. Do...Something.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, so Im done my part, okay. Its your responsibility now, okay. The burden is off me, right?

Name: Joey
Lines: Right!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So tell me about this girl?

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: Joey
Lines: Have you seen Monica?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Im not seeing Monica.

Name: Joey
Lines: What?

Name: Chandler
Lines: What?

Name: Joey
Lines: Look weve got to find her. Phoebe just called!! Rachels coming to tell Ross she loves him!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh my god!

Name: Joey
Lines: I know! Thats why we got to find Monica!! You know where she is?

Name: Chandler
Lines: No!! Okay!! Whats with the third degree?! Why dont you just shine a light in my eyes?!

Name: Rachel
Lines: ...And so then I realized. All this stuff I had been doing. proposing to Joshua, lying to Ross about why I couldnt come to the wedding. Was all just a way of...

Name: Passenger
Lines: Oh, oh oh!! Im sorry, can I interrupt? You know I just want to say..That you are a horrible, horrible person.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ehh, pardon me?

Lines: You say you love this man, yet youre about to ruin the happiest day of his life. Im afraid I have to agree with you friend Pheebs.. This is a..this is a...terrible, terrible plan.

Name: Rachel
Lines: But he has to know how I feel!

Name: Passenger
Lines: But why? He loves this...this Emily person. No good can come of this.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well I-I think your wrong.

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Oh my God! Its like a fairyland.

Name: Mrs. Waltham

Lines: I just hope...

Name: Joey
Lines: Pisst, Monica. Alright, we really need to start looking out for Rachel. Ill cover the front door. You watch that big hole at the back of the building and I got Chandler covering Ross.

Name: Joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: Ross
Lines: I do. I do. I do.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh yea, your right. Its the second one.

Lines: Hello Joey.

Name: Felicity
Lines: Mmm.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, yeah.

Lines: Hey, you keep pushing me on this, my foots going to meet the middle of your ass.

Name: Ross
Lines: Dad!!

Name: Emily
Lines: What-whats going on?!

Lines: Nothing, nothing. Everything's under control.

Name: Mr. Waltham
Lines: You want a piece of me, sir? Is that what your saying?  You want a piece of me?

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: Okay, okay.

Name: Mr. Waltham
Lines: Sorry old boy, sorry. Sorry. Sorry.  I could kill you with my thumb, you know.

Name: Emily
Lines: What was all that about?

Name: Ross
Lines: You know what, I think weve had all the bad luck were going to have.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Hello, Waltham Interiors.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Mrs. Waltham. Hi. Its Phoebe again.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Why?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yea. Can I please, please, please talk to one of the best men? This is going to be the last time I promise.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Joey theres a girl on the phone for you.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Did you stop Rachel?

Name: Joey
Lines: No, but its okay. She just came in and gave him a hug, that it.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So nothing got ruined?

Name: Joey
Lines: No.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh thats so great! Ohh, so whats going on now?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No!! wait, wait, wait!! Oh please, hold it up so I can listen.

Name: Chandler
Lines: What we did last night was....

Name: Monica
Lines: Stupid.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Totally crazy stupid.

Name: Monica
Lines: What were we thinking?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Im coming over tonight though, right?

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh yeah. Definitely.

Name: Minister
Lines: Friends. Family. We are gathered to celebrate here today the joyous union of Ross and Emily. May the happiness we share with them today be with them always. Now Emily, repeat after me. I, Emily...

Name: Emily
Lines: I, Emily...

Name: Minster
Lines: Take thee Ross...

Name: Emily
Lines: Take thee Ross...

Name: Minster
Lines: As my lawfully wedded husband, in sickness and in health, till death parts us.

Name: Emily
Lines: As my lawfully wedded husband, in sickness and in health, until death parts us.

Name: Minster
Lines: Now Ross, repeat after me. I Ross...

Name: Ross
Lines: I Ross...

Name: Minister
Lines: Take thee, Emily...

Name: Minister
Lines: Uhh...Shall I go on?

Name: {Transcriber's Note
Lines: This is the Uncut Version of Ross's second wedding it includes episodes 423, 424, and 501. It also includes some previously cut parts not shown in the U.S. Those parts are shown in blue text.}

Name: Monica
Lines: Guys, hurry up! The flight leaves in four hours! It could take time to get a taxi! There could be traffic! The plane could leave early! When we get to London, there could be a line at customs! Come on!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Six-hour trip to London. That's a lot of Monica.

Name: Joey
Lines: What do you got there?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Condoms, dude!

Name: Joey
Lines: How come the writing is in Spanish?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Don't read my condoms!

Name: Monica
Lines: Passport, check!  Camera, check! Traveller's cheques, check!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Who are you saying "check" too?

Name: Monica
Lines: Myself. Y'know for remembering to pack a thing. Yeah, you do a good thing, you get a check!  My mom does it, I never realised it was weird.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, my mom used to put her head in the oven. Well, actually, she only did it the one time. But it was pretty weird.

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey! Are you ready yet?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yep! You got the tickets?

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh! Got 'em right here,  check!

Name: Joey
Lines: It's all London, baby! Here we go.

Name: Chandler
Lines: You got your passport?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, in my third drawer on my dresser. You don't want to lose that.

Name: Joey
Lines: Ohh!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: There it is.

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay, if you need the vacuum, it's in my closet on the left-hand side. Ah, the garbage bags are next to the refrigerator...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, okay, but Rachel's gonna be here too, can't I just ask her this stuff?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, okay, give that a try!

Name: Chandler
Lines: All right! Let's do it!

Name: Joey
Lines: Woo-hoo!!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, cheerie-o!

Name: Joey
Lines: London baby!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, 'cause that's not gonna get annoying.

Name: Joey
Lines: London baby!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey, y'know what? I was wrong.

Name: Ross
Lines: Well, we're all here! I guess we should get going!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ohhh, I wanna come over there and give you a hug and wish you luck on your wedding, but I don't-can't get up.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, I'll-I'll come hug you.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Great! Yeah, could you bring me the newspaper?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, have a great wedding!

Name: Ross
Lines: Thanks.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, hey, Chandler I wanna hug you too!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, and great! You might as well bring me my book, it's on the counter in your apartment.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh.

Name: Ross
Lines: So, we're off.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Have fun!

Name: Ross
Lines: Thanks!  Ugh, I can't believe you're not gonna be there!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, I know.

Name: Ross
Lines: So-so come! Why don't you come?

Name: Rachel
Lines: What?!

Name: Ross
Lines: To London! Come to London. Please? It'll mean so much to me.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, well, I gotta work, I'm sorry.

Name: Ross
Lines: Why-why can't you take a couple of days off?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Because, I can't! Ross, I told you, no. I can't.

Name: Ross
Lines: This is my wedding.

Name: Monica
Lines: All right, y'know what? We really are late! Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!!

Name: Ross
Lines: Fine. You'll-you'll watch it on video when we get back.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Here you go Phoebe! Here you go Phobo! Phewbedo! Phaybobo.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Thank you.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Thank you.

Name: Ross
Lines: All right, let's go! Bye, Pheebs!

Name: Joey
Lines: Bye, Pheebs!

Name: Joey
Lines: London baby!!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, do you need a hug? You don't have to bring me anything!

Name: Joey
Lines: Come on! Do something!

Name: Chandler
Lines: I am, I'm ignoring you.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, what the hell is that?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, if you see a little version of me in there? Kill it!

Name: Joey
Lines: I got it!  Here we go.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay. Listen-listen, we're not gonna have to walk this way the entire time are we?

Name: Emily
Lines: ...and that was all before 10 o'clock. The caterer rang and said it was going to be Chicken Kiev instead of Chicken Tarragon. And then the florist phoned to say there aren't any tulips. Oh, and the chilliest has carpel-tunel syndrome. We're not gonna be...

Name: Ross
Lines: Whoa-whoa-whoa! Emily,  honey, okay?

Name: Emily
Lines: Well, up yours too!

Name: Ross
Lines: What?!

Name: Emily
Lines: Oh, that's not what it means?

Name: Ross
Lines: No! No! That's-that's time-out!

Name: Emily
Lines: Sorry.

Name: Ross
Lines: Sweetie, you gotta relax. Everything's gonna be great, okay? Come on. Come on.

Name: Monica
Lines: Chicken Kiev?

Name: Ross
Lines: Um-hmm! Doesn't that sound delicious at the last minute?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, y'know, but something like salmon which would be so much more elegant than the chicken. And, you wouldn't have to worry about the salmonella.  But of course with salmon you'd have to worry about the chickenella... So, I can't wait to see this place you're getting married!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah. Yeah. Yes, this place is beautiful. Emily's parents got married here.

Name: Emily
Lines: I still can't believe they're tearing it down. It really is the most lovely building you'll ever see. I mean it's over...  Oh my God!

Name: Monica
Lines: It's nice.

Name: Emily
Lines: Oh. Oh.

Name: Emily
Lines: Oh. Oh my God. How can this be happening? What are we going to do?

Name: Ross
Lines: It's all right! Everything's gonna be all right.

Name: Emily
Lines: How's it gonna be all right?!

Name: Ross
Lines: Uh-huh, I see that.

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay, I talked to the guy with the shovel and I found out what happened.

Name: Ross
Lines: What? What?

Name: Monica
Lines: They tore it down a few days early.

Name: Joey
Lines: All right! Westminster Abbey! Hands down, best Abbey I've ever seen. Hey!  Okay. What do you think of the Abbey, Chandler?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I think it's great. It's great. Y'know, they're thinking of changing the name of this place.

Name: Joey
Lines: Really? To what?

Name: Chandler
Lines: To Put the Camera Away!!!

Name: Joey
Lines: Man, you are Westminster Crabby.

Name: Monica
Lines: Don't worry. You'll find some place to get married.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oowww!!

Name: Dressmaker
Lines: Sorry. Lucky this dress is red!

Name: Emily
Lines: We can't find another place. Then we can't have the wedding! I've ordered chicken and salad and-and cake for 150. What should be the most wonderful day of my life is rapidly turning into just Sunday with a spectacular amount of food!

Name: Monica
Lines: You're gonna find a place. But even if - God forbid - you didn't.. So you postpone the wedding. Is that really so bad? I mean, think about it. You could take all the time you needed to get everything that you want. You could have tulips, you could have salmon.... Mmmmm... Salmon!!

Name: Emily
Lines: I suppose it wouldn't be the end of the world... Oh, thank you!

Name: Monica
Lines: But either way... You're gonna get married, you're gonna be happy, my mom's gonna like you better than me.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, god... She's told you that already, didn't she?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh. Oh.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, honey! Don't get up! What do you need?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, no. Oh, nothing.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Come on! I am here to take care of you! What do you need? Anything.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, I have a wedgie.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay, that is all you.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So-so, what do you want for lunch?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, I don't know. I guess we have to eat.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I do. What's the matter?

Name: Rachel
Lines: I'm just bummed about the way I left things with Ross. I shouldn't have lied to him about having to work. He seemed so mad at me.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Eh, don't be so hard on yourself. If someone I was still in love with was getting married...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Still in love with?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah!

Name: Rachel
Lines: I'm not in love with Ross!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh. No. No. Good! Yeah, me neither.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Phoebe, I'm going to Ross's wedding because he is my ex-boyfriend and that would be really uncomfortable. Not because, I'm still in love with him! I mean, hey, y'know, I like Ross as much as the next guy, y'know? Clearly I have feelings for him, but feelings don't mean love! I mean, I still have loving feelings for Ross. Yeah! But, I have, I have continuing feelings of love, but that doesn't mean that-that I'm still in love with him. Y'know? I-I have sexual feelings for him, but I do love him-Ohh! Oh my God! Oh my-why didn't you tell me?!!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: We thought you knew!

Name: Rachel
Lines: We?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, we all know! We talk about it all the time!

Name: Rachel
Lines: You all know? Does Ross know?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh no, Ross doesn't know anything.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, I can not believe you didn't tell me!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, because we thought you knew!! It's so obvious! God, that would be like telling Monica, "Hey, you like things clean." Or, y'know, "Hey, Joey, you're gay."

Name: Rachel
Lines: What?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, please! She's always got a broom in her hand!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: The Vendor
Lines: So, what are you guys in the market for? We've got uh, scarves, tulip post cards...

Name: Joey
Lines: Check this out? Huh?  Yeah. That's the stuff. What do you think?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, I don't have to buy that, "I'm with stupid" T-shirt anymore.

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, I like it. Here you go.

Name: Chandler
Lines: All right, look, you're not really gonna buy that are you? Don't you think you've embarrassed me enough for one day?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, I embarrass you?

Name: Chandler
Lines: How can I answer that when I'm pretending I don't know you?

Name: The Vendor
Lines: He's just jealous. You'll fit right in; all Londoners wear them!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh really? Then how come no one here is wearing them?

Name: The Vendor
Lines: They're all tourists.

Name: Chandler
Lines: All right, look, if you insist on wearing that, in public, y'know, you're gonna spend the rest of the afternoon all by yourself.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh yeah?  If you're gonna make me choose between you and the hat? I choose the hat.

Name: The Vendor
Lines: Good choice.

Name: Joey
Lines: Thanks.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, wait. All right, that's it, okay, I'm out of here. I am not going to be embarrassed anymore!

Name: Joey
Lines: How you doin'? Joey Tribbiani, America.

Name: Emily
Lines: Hello?

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey! I just spoke to your dad, and you know what? He seems to think we'll be able to find a new place for the wedding.

Name: Emily
Lines: We don't have to.

Name: Ross
Lines: Whoa-whoa-what? You found a place?

Name: Emily
Lines: No. But, Monica and I were talking, and-and I was so upset about the hall being knocked down, and she suggested that we put the wedding off for a bit.

Name: Ross
Lines: She said what?

Name: Emily
Lines: She said, "If I'm not gonna be happy getting married somewhere that we find in a day, well then we should just postpone it."

Name: Ross
Lines: Postpone it? Emily, do you think Monica realises how much our parents spent on this wedding? Do you my sister's teeny-tiny little brain comprehends that people took time out of their lives to fly thousands of miles to be here, huh?  This isn't right.

Name: Emily
Lines: I realise that people are going to be disappointed. But, I'm sure they'll come back when we can do it right.

Name: Ross
Lines: I can't ask people to do that? Would you ask people to do that?

Name: Emily
Lines: Don't you point your pants at me!  We have no choice! Anywhere that's half-decent would've be booked months ago, Ross don't you understand? This is our wedding I'm talking about.

Name: Ross
Lines: The only thing I understand is; postponing it is not an option. This is when we're getting married.

Name: Emily
Lines: So what are you saying? It's now or never?

Name: Ross
Lines: No. I'm saying it's now.

Name: Emily
Lines: Or?

Name: Ross
Lines: There's no 'or' in mind. What is wrong with these pants?!!

Name: Emily
Lines: It's not the pants. It's you that is backwards. And if, and if you don't understand how important this is to me, well then, perhaps we shouldn't get married at all!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So, did shopping make you feel any better about Ross?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Manhattan does not have enough stores.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, I think I can help you get over him.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You can?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah. I just need you to bring me some photos of Ross.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Um-hmm.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: And a small piece of chocolate.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: And a glass of tepid water.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ooh, is this one of those things where you throw it in a bag with some graveyard dirt and hang it from a north-facing tree?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Uh, only if you have the hiccups too. Yeah, the pictures are for you, the water and the chocolate is for me. I just didn't feel like getting up. Okay, I'm gonna show you a picture of Ross. Okay? And you're going to remember all of the bad things about him. All right? Really focus on his flaws.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I can do that. I certainly did it when we were going out.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay. Umm, before we get started, I just wanna say for the record that I love Ross, I think he's such a great guy. Here.  Okay, now, close your eyes. And imagine that you're with Ross okay and imagine that you're kissing him. And you're-you're running your hands all over his body. And then you run your hands through his hair, but eew-oh gross it's some kind of grease, it's-uck! Hah?

Name: Rachel
Lines: I don't know, his uh, his hair never really bothered me that much, and y'know it was always more crunchy than it was greasy.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, this is going to be harder than I thought. Umm, let's try some uh, aversion therapy.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay?

Name: Rachel
Lines: All right.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So uh, now look at the picture...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: All right, and umm...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ow!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, how do you feel now?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, I like you less!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, this is just as boring in England.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh.  Sorry!

Name: Chandler
Lines: No-no-no, y'know what? I really shouldn't have said that you were embarrassing me, I mean that really wasn't cool. And if it makes you feel any better, I've had a really lousy day.

Name: Joey
Lines: Me too.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah?

Name: Joey
Lines: Noo!! I've had the best day ever! Dude, check this out! Now, I'm gonna fastforward past the part with you, 'cause it is boring.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: Joey
Lines: Sh-shh-shh!

Name: Joey
Lines: Okay, so say hi to my friend and tell him that you like the hat.

Name: Fergie
Lines: Okay, so umm, what's your friend's name?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, Chandler.

Name: Fergie
Lines: Hi Chandler!

Name: Chandler
Lines: That's... That's was...

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: Joey
Lines: That's Fergie baby!!

Name: Fergie
Lines: Joey says you don't really like his hat, but I think it's kinda dashing.

Name: Joey
Lines: So, I hear you're single now...

Name: Fergie
Lines: Yeah, ummm, I don't like the hat that much.

Name: Chandler
Lines: How did you? How? How?

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, I was trying to figure out how to get to Buckingham Palace, right? So, I'm in my map and-and... Hey!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hi. I understand you had a little talk with Emily.

Name: Monica
Lines: Yes, I did! And you are welcome!

Name: Ross
Lines: Am I?! And was it your idea to postpone the wedding?!

Name: Monica
Lines: Umm...

Name: Chandler
Lines: I'm gonna go to the bathroom.

Name: Joey
Lines: Wait up!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey-hey, since you're the 'fix-it' lady, here's a pickle, what do you do when the bride says she doesn't want to have the wedding at all?

Name: Monica
Lines: She said that?!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Monica
Lines: Why?!

Name: Ross
Lines: I don't know, I told her it was stupid to put off the wedding just because the hall was gone and she liked flipped out.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh my God. You're even dumber than I am!

Name: Ross
Lines: Excuse me?

Name: Monica
Lines: Ross, how long have you been planning this wedding?

Name: Ross
Lines: I don't know. A month?

Name: Ross
Lines: I had no idea. And that-that pillowcase thing, I thought you guys were just doing the flying nun.

Name: Monica
Lines: Sometimes we were.

Name: Ross
Lines: Come on. You gotta help me figure out what to do. Okay?

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay.

Name: Ross
Lines: Come on.

Name: Chandler
Lines: That was pretty intense huh?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah.  Hey, I hope Ross didn't think that we just went in there because we were uncomfortable being out here!

Name: Chandler
Lines: I hope he did!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ooh! I thought of a good flaw! Ross pops his gum!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, right!  Wait a minute, I do that too.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I know. It drives me crazy.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I'll get it.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hello.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, Pheebs! It's Joey!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey, Joey! Hey! Ooh! Ooh! I just say someone on the-that looks just like you on the subway. And I was gonna go over and say 'hi!' but then I figured, he doesn't care if he looks like you.

Name: Joey
Lines: That just cost me four bucks. But uh listen, I just called to see how the chick and the duck are doing?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ohh, they're having a great time with their Aunt Phoebe! Aunt Rachel hasn't been helpful at all. So, do you miss me?

Name: Joey
Lines: Kinda, but I've just been having way too much fun.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So you're not homesick yet?

Name: Joey
Lines: No, I don't think so.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: All right, the seven of us miss you.

Name: Joey
Lines: Who's seven?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Y'know, me, Rachel, the birds, the babies...

Name: Joey
Lines: Ahh, the babies miss me?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Of course they do! Or I'm just really hungry.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ooh, the pizza guy's here!

Name: Joey
Lines: What? You ordered pizza without me?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah. But y'know we were thinking about you, y'know we ordered the Joey Special.

Name: Joey
Lines: Two pizzas?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yep! Okay, gotta go, talk to you later.

Name: Joey
Lines: Wait, well, where did you get it from?!

Name: Emily
Lines: Monica, why have you brought me here of all places?!

Name: Monica
Lines: You'll see.

Name: Emily
Lines: I tell you, this wedding is not going to happen.

Name: Emily
Lines: Oh God.

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay? But-but imagine a lot more lights, okay? And-and y'know fewer bricks, and-and-and flowers, and candles...

Name: Ross
Lines: But-but, if you don't love this, we'll do it in any other place at any other time. Really, it's fine, whatever you want.

Name: Emily
Lines: It's perfect.

Name: Ross
Lines: And, I don't know, if it starts to rain...

Name: Emily
Lines: Well then we'll get wet.

Name: Monica
Lines: Ohh. And I don't even have a date.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Pheebs?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Do you remember where the duck food is?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, it's in the guys' apartment under the sink. Why?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Because I'm going to London.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: What?! What do you mean you're going to London?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, I have to tell Ross that I love him. Now honey, you take care, you don't have those babies until I get back.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: But what about all the "finding-his-flaws" stuff we've been doing?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, that didn't work.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I-Rachel, you can't go! Ross loves Emily!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, I know, I know, I know he does. But I have to tell him how I feel! He deserves to have all the information and then he can make an informed decision.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: That's not why you're going! You're going because you hope he's gonna say, "Yeah, I love you too, Rach. Forget that British chippy."

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohh-Do you think he will?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No! Because he's in love with the British chippy! Look, Rachel, if you go, you're just gonna mess with his head and ruin his wedding! Y'know, it's too late! You missed you're chance! I'm sorry, I know this must be really hard, it's over.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Y'know what? No. It's not over until someone says, "I do."

Name: Housekeeper
Lines: The Waltham Residence.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh...yes..is this..umm..Emily's Parents' house.

Name: Housekeeper
Lines: This is the housekeeper speaking. And by the way, young lady, that is not how one addresses a person on the telephone. First one identifies oneself and then asks for the person with whom one wishes to speak.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: What are you saying?!

Name: Housekeeper
Lines: Now, let us try that again, shall we?

Name: Housekeeper
Lines: The Waltham Residence.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hello. This is Phoebe Buffay. I was wondering, please, if-if it's not too much trouble, please, umm, might I speak to Miss Emily Waltham, please?

Name: Housekeeper
Lines: Miss Waltham, is at the rehearsal dinner and it's not polite to make fun of people. Goodbye.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No no no, I'll be nice, I swear!!! Could you just give me the number for where they are?

Name: Housekeeper
Lines: I'm afraid, I'm not at liberty to divulge that information.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ok, somebody is on their way to ruin wedding okay. And I have to warn somebody, alright. So if you don't give me that number then I'm going to come over there and kick your snooty ass all the way to New Glocken..shire.

Name: Housekeeper
Lines: Hangs up.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hello, Hello. Ohh, OHH, she knew I could kick her ass.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey.

Name: Ross
Lines: Hi. Mom. Dad.

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Sweetheart. Oh sorry were late, my fault, I insisted on riding the tube.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: Judy, the kids..

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Jack, that's what they call the subway.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: Ohh, I thought that you....

Name: Ross and Monica
Lines: Dad, dad. We got it!! We Got It!!!

Name: Emily
Lines: Ohh, here comes my dad and stepmum. Mister and Misses Geller, this is Steven and Andrea Waltham.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Sorry, what?

Name: Mr. Waltham
Lines: It's the Gellers!

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Where?

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Lovely to meet you.

Name: Mr. Waltham
Lines: Terribly nice of you to offer to pay for half the wedding.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: Ohh forget it. Too hell with tradition, we're happy to do it.

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: We know how expensive weddings can be, besides this may be the only wedding we get to throw .

Name: Monica
Lines: Ha ha, a joke that's funny in all countries.

Name: Waiter
Lines: Sir?

Name: Joey
Lines: What's in it?

Name: Waiter
Lines: Goat cheese, water chestnuts, and panchetta.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Joey, it's been three days, okay.. Your just a little homesick, Okay. Would you just try to relax. Just, just try to enjoy yourself.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: What the hell!!!

Name: Ross
Lines: what's up, Dad?

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: This bill for my half of the wedding. it's insane.

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: How could it be so much? The receptions at their house.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: And you tell him no one takes advantage of the Gellers.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ooh, ooh, ooh,ooh,ooh.  Hi.

Name: Ticket Agent
Lines: Hello.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hello. Umm, when is your next flight to London?

Name: Ticket Agent
Lines: There's one leaving in thirty minutes.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohh, good.

Name: Ticket Agent
Lines: And I do have one seat left.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohh, thank you, thank you, thank you.

Name: Ticket Agent
Lines: The last minute fare on this ticket is twenty seven hundred dollars.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Huh.. How about 600?

Name: Ticket Agent
Lines: Sorry.

Name: Rachel
Lines: How about 600 and these earrings?

Name: Ticket Agent
Lines: They prefer it if I don't barter.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohh, I just don't think I have enough left on my credit card.

Name: Ticket Agent
Lines: Well you can split it with another credit card.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohh, okay, how about five.  Ohh, thank you.

Name: Ticket Agent
Lines: I'm just going to need to see your passport.

Name: Ross
Lines: Look, face it, my father is not going to pay for the build-in barbecue and believe me you can kiss you gazebo goodbye. Now I might be able to get you the new lawn.

Name: Mr. Waltham
Lines: Ahh, then you have to give us the lawn ornaments.

Name: Ross
Lines: I go back there with lawn ornaments, he's going to laugh in my face.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: This is ridiculous. I mean we had an agreement.  Will you say something, Steven?! Please!!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi, Pheebs.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh thank god. Oh, you changed your mind. Oh, look I know you probably want to be alone, and you don't want to talk about it, that's fine. I just want you to know, I think you are doing the right thing and...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Bye, Pheebs.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Hello, Waltham Interiors.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, hi, Mrs. Waltham. I need to speak with ether one of the best men, or Ross's sister Monica.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Who is this?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, I'm Phoebe Buffay. I'm one of Ross's best friends.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Where did you get this number?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I got it from your maid. She's a bitch, but I wore her down.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Well, if you're one of Ross's best friends, why aren't you here?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, um, I can't fly. I'm having my brother's babies.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: Oh, am I on the radio?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No..umm, could I talk to one of them? It's very very important.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: No, I'm bored with you now. I'm going to cut you off.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ohh! Okay, I'm going to have to kick her ass too.

Name: Felicity
Lines: Are you going home? I was hoping to get to know you better.

Name: Joey
Lines: I'm not going anywhere, sweetheart.

Name: Monica
Lines: I was laughing.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Out loud?

Name: Monica
Lines: Well I didn't want everyone to think I was stupid.

Name: Chandler
Lines: So how are you doing?

Name: Monica
Lines: My mother's driving me crazy, but Ross is getting married. I'm happy.  I'm not going to let anything spoil that.

Name: Drunk Man
Lines: I just want to say that Ross is a wonderful young man.

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, thanks, we like him.

Name: Drunk Man
Lines: My god!! You must have been a teenage when you had him.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: There's no way in hell, I'm paying for it.

Name: Ross
Lines: Look, were down to just one point. Could we please, maybe just settle it after the wedding.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: All-right fine, but I just want to say, I'm not paying for your wine cellar. You thieving, would be speaking German if it weren't for us, cheap little man.

Name: Chandler
Lines: The guy was hammered, okay? There's no way, you look like Ross's mother.

Name: Monica
Lines: Then why would he say it?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Because he's crazy. Okay? He came up to me earlier and thanked me for my very moving performance in Titanic.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, my mother's right. I'm never going to get married.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ahh, you know what? That is....Who wouldn't want you?

Name: Monica
Lines: Ohh, Please?! I'm a single mom, with a thirty year old son!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi, I'm back. Listen, I need to...

Name: Ticket Agent
Lines: Hello.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hello. I need to get on the 11 o'clock flight.

Name: Ticket Agent
Lines: Oh I'm afraid that plane has already pulled away from the gate.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay, you know what? You're going to have to call that plane and tell them to swing around and come and pick me up.

Name: Ticket Agent
Lines: I can't do that.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Sure, you know what? Come on, we'll just tell them that there was like a problem with like the "engine".

Name: Ticket Agent
Lines: I'm afraid I'm going to have to ask you to step aside, Miss.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Look, If I don't get to London!! He is going to marry that other girl!!!

Name: Ticket Agent
Lines: I can't imagine why.

Name: Rachel
Lines: All right, you know what? I am not leaving here, until you call that plane back!!

Name: Ross
Lines: I'm getting married today!! Whoo-hoo!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Morning, Ross.

Name: Ross
Lines: I'm getting married, to..day!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah you are!!

Name: Ross
Lines: Ahh, whoo-hoo!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohhh.

Name: Passenger
Lines: Ahh, ahh, excuse me.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah?

Name: Passenger
Lines: If you're planning on doing that throughout the entire flight. Please tell me now. So that I could that a sedative...or perhaps slip you one.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well I've-I've never done that with you before.

Name: Chandler
Lines: So, ahh, how are ya? How ya...How ya... You okay?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yep, yep...You?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yes...Yes..Uh-huh, You? We did you.

Name: Monica
Lines: Well...I'd better get going.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh yea yea, absolutely.

Name: Monica
Lines: Could you not look?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I don't want to look.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hello?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey, were the hell have you been?!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey. I spent the night out. I met this cute bridesmaid. She is so...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I don't want to hear about her!!

Name: Joey
Lines: Ahh Pheebs, you know you're still my number one girl.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No! No, we have an emergency. Okay? Rachel's coming to London.

Name: Joey
Lines: Ohh great!!!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No it's not great. No, she's coming to tell Ross that she loves him.

Name: Joey
Lines: But, he loves Emily?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I KNOW THAT!!! You have to stop her!! She's going to ruin the wedding!!

Name: Joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: All right, so, okay...

Name: Joey
Lines: Hold on. Hold on.  Rachel coming. Do...Something.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, so I'm done my part, okay. It's your responsibility now, okay. The burden is off me, right?

Name: Joey
Lines: Right!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So tell me about this girl?

Name: Rachel
Lines: ...And so then I realised. All this stuff I had been doing. proposing to Joshua, lying to Ross about why I couldn't come to the wedding. Was all just a way of...

Name: Passenger
Lines: Oh, oh oh!! I'm sorry, can I interrupt? You know I just want to say..That you are a horrible, horrible person.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ehh, pardon me?

Name: Passenger
Lines: You say you love this man, yet you're about to ruin the happiest day of his life. I'm afraid I have to agree with you friend Pheebs.. This is a..this is a...terrible, terrible plan.

Name: Rachel
Lines: But he has to know how I feel!

Name: Passenger
Lines: But why? He loves this...this Emily person. No good can come of this.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well I-I think your wrong.

Name: Passenger
Lines: Oh-no.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, he doesn't really love her. I mean, it's just a rebound thing from me.... You'll see!

Name: Passenger
Lines: Fortunately, I won't. And by the way, it seems to be perfectly clear that you were on a break.

Name: Joey
Lines: Do something..... Something....

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: Joey
Lines: Have you seen Monica?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I'm not seeing Monica.

Name: Joey
Lines: What?

Name: Chandler
Lines: What?

Name: Joey
Lines: Look we've got to find her. Phoebe just called!! Rachel's coming to tell Ross she loves him!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh my god!

Name: Joey
Lines: I know! That's why we got to find Monica!! You know where she is?

Name: Chandler
Lines: No!! Okay!! What's with the third degree?! Why don't you just shine a light in my eyes?!

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: Oh my God! It's like a fairyland.

Name: Mrs. Waltham
Lines: I know, it's horrible isn't it?

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, I love it. I only hope my wedding looks this good.

Name: Mrs. Geller
Lines: I just hope...

Name: Joey
Lines: Pisst, Monica. Alright, we really need to start looking out for Rachel. I'll cover the front door. You watch that big hole at the back of the building and I got Chandler covering Ross.

Name: Monica
Lines: Why would I care where Chandler is? You know uhh...You know sometimes I don't even like Chandler.

Name: Joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: Ross
Lines: I do. I do. I do.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh yea, your right. It's the second one.

Name: Ross
Lines: Really?

Name: Felicity
Lines: Hello Joey.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, Felicity.

Name: Felicity
Lines: Umm, I thought about you all day.

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Felicity
Lines: Um-hum. Talk New York to me again.

Name: Felicity
Lines: Mmm.

That's right. For everyone in the building, and I'm gonna sit them down and explain to them, I am not a bad guy. I am not a cheap guy! I'm just a guy who-who stands up for what he believes in. Name: Rachel
Lines: Because a car backfired?

Lines: Well, okay, what-what did she say?

Lines: Huh? Yeah! Yes, of course!
