Name: Phoebe
Lines: Guys, Im happy too.

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay, come here!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Wow! Big day huh? People moving in, people getting annulled

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay, I gotta go find Rachel but umm, if you guys see her could you please try to give her some really bad news so that mine doesnt seem so bad?

Name: Ross
Lines: Bye.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hmm, something bad to tell Rachel Bad news for Rachel, what could that be?!

Name: Ross
Lines: Could ya just, could ya just lay off, please? All right? My life is an embarrassment! I should go live under somebodys stairs!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ross, its not that big a deal! So youll been divorced three times, youll still have a life, youll go on dates

Name: Ross
Lines: No! No, I wont! Ill be at the bottom of the dating barrel now. The only guys below me will be Four Divorce Guy uh, Murderer Guy, and-and, Geologists.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ross, youre being ridiculous! Okay? You are cute and smart and sweet and that is much more important than three stupid divorces!

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh yeah? Have you ever dated anyone who has been divorced three times?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yknow thats really fair. Yknow? Most guys who have been divorced three times are like 60. Ross, nobody cares about this except you! This-this embarrassment thing is all in your head! Here, Ill show you! Come here.

Name: Ross
Lines: What?! Why?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hi! Hi! Listen, my friend Ross is about to be divorced for the third time, but wouldnt you date him?

Name: Ross
Lines: And if you wait right here, Ill go get Ross.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: Monica
Lines: Ugh, I thought you were Rachel!

Name: Chandler
Lines: What gave me away?

Name: Monica
Lines: I just tell her, I have to get it over with. I told Ross and Phoebe and shes the only one left!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, so thats it, everybody knows! Its official, were moving in together. No turning back. Are ya scared? Are ya?

Name: Monica
Lines: No.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Wow that was my scariest voice! Youre very brave.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ugh, the worse day! Yknow, you think youre making progress at work and then your boss calls you Raquel.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey listen, for the first four years of my work everybody called me Sha-la-lap.  Seriously.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I believe you. So, it was right in the middle of a staff meeting so of course no one else wants to correct her so everyone else is calling me Raquel! By the end of the day, the mailroom guys were calling me Rocky!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, I-I still think youre very-very nice and very pretty

Name: Rachel
Lines: What?

Name: Monica
Lines: Have a seat.  Okay, listen umm, Chandler and I are going to live together, here.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh my God! Thats so great! Im so happy for you guys!

Name: Monica
Lines: Really?!

Name: Rachel
Lines: And that was so sweet of you to ask! Oh my God, the three of us are gonna have such a good time living together!

Name: Monica
Lines: Yes, we are.

Name: Rachel
Lines: And Chandler, youre gonna have to watch those long showers you take in the morning because you know Raquel cant be late.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Rach

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, hes gonna work on that.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ohh! This is so exciting! Oh God  Come and knock on my door

Name: Monica
Lines: Well be waiting for you

Name: {Transcibers note
Lines: Ill finish that one for those of you who dont know what theyre talking about. Where the towels are Hers and Hers and His, Threes Company too! Yeah, thats the theme song for Threes Company.}

Name: Ross
Lines: once you know the stories, its not that bad. First marriage, wifes hidden sexuality, not my fault. Second marriage, said the wrong name at the altar, a little my fault. Third marriage, well they really shouldnt allow you to get married when youre that drunk and have writing all over your face, Nevadas fault.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, so what do you think ladies? Who wouldnt be interested? Who wouldnt want to date him?

Name: Stephanie
Lines: Well the divorces dont bother me, Id date him. But, not while hes still married.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, what about you?  Wouldnt you want a date?

Name: Karin
Lines: Actually, Im dating at all anymore. See, I figured out that I was only dating guys that were like yknow bad for me, so until I work that out

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Whatever! What about you Meg?

Name: Meg
Lines: Well, I dont care about the divorces either, but I wouldnt date him. Its just that hes obviously still in love with this Rachel girl.

Name: Ross
Lines: What?!

Name: Ross
Lines: This is crazy! I mean, yes-yes Rachel is my good friend and I-I have loved her in the past, but now, she is just my wife! Phoebe, will you-will you help me out here?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, I thought you loved her when you-when you married her.

Name: Ross
Lines: We were drunk! I wouldve married uh, Joey with that amount of alcohol!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey! You could do a lot worse than Joey Tribbiani!!

Name: Ross
Lines: Look, Im sorry, but you guys are wrong. I just dont want to be divorced three times.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yes, and now hes using this three divorces reason because he wants to stay married to her because he loves her. I must say, "Well done!" Bravo Meg.

Name: Meg
Lines: Okay now I wouldnt date you because you seem a little creepy.

Name: Karin
Lines: I am so attracted to him right now.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, when are we gonna tell Rachel what is actually gonna happen?

Name: Monica
Lines: Soon! I-I just couldnt before. You saw how upset Joey got! I couldnt do that to her, shes my best friend!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, Joeys my best friend.

Name: Monica
Lines: Im not your best friend?

Name: Chandler
Lines: You just said Of course youre my best friend. Would you please tell Rachel though?

Name: Monica
Lines: All right, all right, at least Im prepared.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey-hey!

Name: Monica
Lines: These arent for you! Are you upset?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I am now!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey roomie!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, bye!

Name: Monica
Lines: Rach, theres something uh, important I have to tell you.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Are you pregnant?!

Name: Monica
Lines: No! But, Im throwing this shirt away! I think there was a little misunderstanding before.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Um-hmm.

Name: Monica
Lines: Umm, when I said that uh, that Chandler and I wanted to umm, live together we meant alone together.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh my God! Oh, thats funny, I cant believe I did that.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh no sweetie, no! This is my fault, I wasnt clear! Im really sorry. And listen, you take as much time as you need to move out okay? Theres absolutely no rush.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay. Dont you want a cookie?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Sure?  Thanks.

Name: Monica
Lines: Maybe, do you need a tissue?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Monica, where did you get these?!

Name: Monica
Lines: I made them!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ooh, good God, theyre so yummy!

Name: Joey
Lines: God, its gonna so weird like when I come home and youre not here. Yknow? No more Joey and Chans. No more J and Cs. "You wanna go over to Joey and Chandlers?" "Cant, its not there."

Name: Chandler
Lines: Look, Im just gonna be across the hall, we can still do all the same stuff.

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah but we wont be able to like get up in the middle of the night and have those long talks about our feelings and the future.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Not once did we do that.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hi.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hi.

Name: Monica
Lines: So I, I told Rachel it was just gonna be the two of us.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh yeah? Well, howd she take it?

Name: Monica
Lines: Really well. Yeah. Surprisingly well. Yeah, she didnt cry. She wasnt angry or sad.

Name: Chandler
Lines: And youre upset because you didnt make your best friend cry?

Name: Monica
Lines: I mean, all Im asking for is just a little emotion! Is that too much to ask after six years?! I mean what? Are-are-are Rachel and I not as close as you guys?! I mean do we not have as much fun?! Dont I deserve a few tears?!! I mean we-we told Joey, he cried his eyes out!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey! I did not cry my eyes out!! Come on! Its like the end of an era! No more J-man and Channies!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, I gotta ask, who calls us that?!

Name: Russell
Lines: You got married again.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yes.

Name: Russell
Lines: So thats your second marriage in two years.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yes, second in two years. Third overall.

Name: Russell
Lines: Ross, I have been a divorce attorney for 23 years and never had I so much business from one client. Why dont you tell me what happened.

Name: Ross
Lines: Basically, Rachel and I were in Vegas and we got drunk

Name: Russell
Lines: Im sorry, is this the same Rachel whos name you said at the altar in the second marriage?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yes-yes-yes! But, I-I do not love her.

Name: Russell
Lines: Oh, thats better then.

Name: Ross
Lines: This was just a drunken mistake and I need to get it annulled.

Name: Russell
Lines: I see. Have you considered therapy?

Name: Ross
Lines: I think just the annulment for today.

Name: Russell
Lines: There are a couple of forms to fill out.

Name: Ross
Lines: Easy.

Name: Russell
Lines: And well need to have witnesses who can testify that you were not of uh, sound mind.

Name: Ross
Lines: No problem.

Name: Russell
Lines: And well need you and Rachel to testify before a judge.

Name: Ross
Lines: Ooh! Theres no way to do this without her? Cause I kinda all ready told her uh, it was, it was already taken care of.

Name: Russell
Lines: Of course you did. Look Ross, you cant get an annulment unless you and Rachel are both there.

Name: Ross
Lines: Uh-ha, what about someone who looks like Rachel?  I will think about the therapy.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey. So um, I was thinking that maybe we should start dividing up our stuff.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay!

Name: Monica
Lines: Yknow, no point in dragging it out. Dragging out the long process of you moving out and us not living together anymore.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey Rach, what about this?  Huh? Who-who gets this? See, I dont know if I want it because it might be yknow, too many memories!

Name: Rachel
Lines: What the hell is that?

Name: Monica
Lines: I dont know.  Hey, Rachel, you want the big plate? I want you to have the big plate.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Wow! Mon, thanks! I love this plate!

Name: Monica
Lines: Something to remember me by!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Mon, honey youre not dying. Im just moving out. Yknow, I mean were gonna see each other all the time.

Name: Monica
Lines: But still, its a big change. The end of an era, you might say!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Are you okay? Youre not blinking.

Name: Monica
Lines: Im fine! I just, Im thinking how much its an end of era.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, all right. But yknow I gotta say, I dont, I dont think six years counts as an era.

Name: Monica
Lines: An era is defined as a significant period of time. Now, it was significant to me, maybe it wasnt significant to you!

Name: Rachel
Lines: What is the matter with you?!

Name: Monica
Lines: What is the matter with you?!! Why arent you more upset?! Arent you gonna be sad that were not gonna be living together anymore?! I mean arent you gonna miss me at all?!

Name: Rachel
Lines: All right, fine, but dont get mad at me. Its-its just a little hard to believe.

Name: Monica
Lines: Whats hard to believe?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well yknow, its you guys. You-you do this kind of stuff! Yknow? I mean, you-you were gonna get married in Vegas and then you backed out! I guess Im not upset because I dont see you guys going through with it. Im sorry.

Name: Monica
Lines: Rachel, its going to happen. Chandler is gonna move in here.

Name: Rachel
Lines: But I

Name: Monica
Lines: No-no, wait! Just let me finish, okay? This isnt something that we just, we just impulsively decided in-in Vegas, this is something we both really want. And it is going to happen.

Name: Rachel
Lines: It is? Really?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, sweetie.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I mean were not, were not gonna live together anymore?

Name: Monica
Lines: No.

Name: Rachel
Lines: What? Oh my God! Im gonna miss you so much!

Name: Monica
Lines: Im gonna miss you!

Name: Rachel
Lines: I mean its the end of an era!

Name: Monica
Lines: I know!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, bye!

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh no.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So? Did you get the annulment?

Name: Ross
Lines: I couldnt.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I knew it! Because you love Rachel.

Name: Ross
Lines: Its not that. Okay? Annulments are more complicated than I

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, complicated cause of the love.

Name: Ross
Lines: I I do, I do not love Rachel. Im gonna tell her right now about the whole thing so we can get this marriage annulled as fast as possible. Okay? Would I do that if I loved her?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ive never been more convinced of your love for her.

Name: Ross
Lines: I do not have feelings for Rachel! Okay?!

Name: Ross
Lines: Ohh, whats wrong?!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Monica and Chandler are really moving in here and I have to move out and everything is changing.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh myCome here! Come here!  Its okay. Everythings gonna be okay.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Thank you.

Name: Ross
Lines: Of course.

Name: Joey
Lines: So, Ross and Rachel got married, Monica and Chandler almost got married, do you think you and I should hook up?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh we do, but not just yet.

Name: Joey
Lines: Really?! Well, when?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay umm, well, first Chandler and Monica will get married and be filthy rich by the way. Yeah. But it wont work out.

Name: Joey
Lines: Wow.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I know. Then, Im gonna marry Chandler for the money and youll marry Rachel and have the beautiful kids.

Name: Joey
Lines: Great!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: But then we ditch those two and thats when we get married. Well have Chandlers money and Rachels kids and getting custody will be easy because of Rachels drinking problem.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh-oh, what about Ross?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I dont want to go into the whole thing, but umm, we have words and I kill him.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey! Check it out! This is unbelievable! Joey has been holding his breath for almost four minutes!

Name: Joey
Lines: Dude! What are yoyou trying to kill me?!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Pheebs, I wanna ask you something.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh, what?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well since Im movin out and-and youre so beautiful

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh!

Name: Rachel
Lines: how about I move in with you?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, that would be great but then what do we do about Denise?

Name: Monica
Lines: Whos Denise?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: My roommate.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You have a roommate?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yes, Denise. Denise!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, what is with the secrecy Phoebe? Huh? And what about this Denise, is she cute?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Pheebs, I dont understand. How can you have a roommate that none of us know anything about?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Maybe because you never listen to anything that I say. I talk about her all the time! DENISE!!!!!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey Rach, listen I was thinkin uh, Im gonna have an extra room over at my place

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, thats true.

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, why dont you move in with me? Itll be great! We could stay up late, watch movies, and you know about Naked Thursdays right?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, yeah I think Im gonna find my own place.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey-hey! I thought Naked Thursdays was just our thing man!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So, what did Rachel say when you told her you were still married to her?

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, that. Umm, she took it really well.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: You didnt tell her did you?

Name: Ross
Lines: No.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Of course not, because youre in love with her.

Name: Ross
Lines: I am not in love with her. She was very upset about having to move out so I eh, didnt tell her we were still married because she would only get more upset. I-I just comforted her, as a friend.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: What do you mean, comforted her?

Name: Ross
Lines: Its nothing, I just gave her a hug.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ah-ha! A classic sign of love, the hug!

Name: Ross
Lines: Its also a sign of friendship.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, not in your case Lovey Loverson.

Name: Ross
Lines: It was a hug!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, just tell me this, did you or did you not smell her hair?

Name: Ross
Lines: S-s-smell her hair? What if I did?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ninety percent of a womens pheromones come out the top of her head! Thats why, thats why women are shorter. So that men will fall in love when they hug them!  Oh come on Ross, youre a scientist.

Name: Ross
Lines: I was hugging her as a friend. Its not my fault her-her hair got in my face, shes got a lot of it and it smells all-all uhcoconutty.  What?! Oh, that doesnt mean I have feelings for Rachel! Maybe it means I have feelings for coconuts!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, whatever you say. But just be careful, all right? Rachels not in the same place you are.

Name: Ross
Lines: If the place you are referring too is being in love, then she is in the same place as me because I am not in that place!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, I didnt understand that, but yknow, maybe thats cause you were speaking the secret language of love!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey!  Dude, some guy just called for you.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Who was it?

Name: Joey
Lines: I dont know! How about, "Thanks for taking the message." Jeez!

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay listen, yknow when you move in Rachels room is gonna be empty, you wanna talk about what we want to do with it?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Sure!

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay, I was thinking we should have a beautiful guest room, right? With a mahogany sleigh bed and bedside tables with flowers on them all the time! And we could have a roll top desk with comment cards on them so people could say how much they loved staying here!! Okay, whatever, I really havent thought about it that much.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, I like that idea. Obviously! I was thinking maybe-maybe-maybe it could be a game room, yknow? I mean you can buy old arcade games like uh, like Space Invaders and Asteroids for $200, the real ones! The big-big ones!

Name: Monica
Lines: No.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay so you mean no as in, "Gee Chandler, what an interesting idea. Lets discuss it before we reject it completely."

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, Im sorry. Of course I mean that. Interesting idea, umm, talk about it, but no.

Name: Chandler
Lines: So, thats it?

Name: Monica
Lines: I just dont think arcade games go in the beautiful guest room. The beautiful guest room is gonna be filled with antiques.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Which is why Asteroids is perfect! Its the oldest game!

Name: Monica
Lines: What do you have against the beautiful guest room?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I dont have anything against the beautiful guest room, especially since everybody we know lives about 30 seconds away!

Name: Monica
Lines: Are you mocking me?

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, whats up?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Nothing, Monica and I had a stupid fight.

Name: Joey
Lines: But youre still moving in together, right? Because my ad came out today.

Name: Chandler
Lines: "Wanted. Female roommate, non-smoker, non-ugly." Nice!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah? I just figured yknow, after living with you itd be an interesting change of pace to have a female roommate, yknow? Someone I can learn from, someone-someone whos different than me. And whats more different than me; a guy whos not 19 than say a girl who is 19? Enh?  Not just a hat rack my friend!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Pheebs, I have to ask you

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Shhhhhh! Im swamped right now.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Youre just staring into space.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Umm, Im trying to move that pencil.

Name: Rachel
Lines: This one?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: It worked!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Pheebs, this whole apartment thing is just a nightmare! Every place I can afford comes with a roommate who is a freak. I mean, look at this;  "Wanted. Female roommate, non-smoker, non-ugly." Its just, there is nothing! The citys full!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey.

Name: Ross
Lines: Rach, uh, you still looking for a place?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah! Why?

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay, theres this guy, Warren, from the museum and hes going on a dig for like two years and hes got this great place he needs to sublet. So uh, you interested?

Name: Rachel
Lines: That sounds great! Id love to live at Warrens!! I love Warren! Thank you!

Name: Ross
Lines: Dont thank me! If you wanna thank something, thank the volcano that erupted thousands of years ago, killing but perfectly preserving an entire civilization.  Heres Warrens number.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, this is great! I am gonna call him right now!  Oh, thank you!

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay, you go grab it!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I saw it.

Name: Ross
Lines: I dont know what youre talking about.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Umm, Im talking about that which you already know but wont admit. You love her again; you re-love her!

Name: Ross
Lines: Look, I do not re-love her.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I cant believe you wont just admit it!  Okay, just promise me that you wont do anything stupid.

Name: Ross
Lines: Look, were just friends now! Okay? Why would I do anything stupid?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ugh!!! Well, the apartment is already subletted! I mean, this is just hopeless. Im never gonna find anything.

Name: Ross
Lines: You can live with me.

Name: Rachel
Lines: What?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: What?!

Name: Ross
Lines: What?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh my God! Are you serious?!

Name: Ross
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I would love to live with you Ross; thats-thats great! Thank you!

Name: Ross
Lines: Well, Im-Im just glad I could, yknow, help you out.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Wow! Im-Im so happy for you guys.  This is so-so, not stupid.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ross-Ross, you have no idea what this means to me! I mean, I mean I was gonna be homeless. You just saved me! Youre my hero!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hero, I uh, I dont knowwell, all right.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, I have to go tell Monica what a wonderful brother she has!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hi.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hi.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hi, listen, Im sorry about before. I dont need to have a game room. I mean when I was a kid I only played those games because I couldnt get girls, and now I can emNow, I have you.  Not-not that I think that I have you or think of you as property in any sort of way, I see women

Name: Monica
Lines: Stop it Chandler.  Im sorry too.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Really?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah! Oh yes!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ohh.

Name: Monica
Lines: Listen, we dont have to make that a guest room, we can think of something to do with the room together.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Thats a great idea! We can easily think of a way for us both to enjoy the room.

Name: Monica
Lines: Totally!

Name: Chandler
Lines: We dont have to come up with this now.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh good.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey, yknow what? Why dont we think about changes we can make in the living room?

Name: Monica
Lines: Changes?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah, I mean were gonna have to move around some furniture to make room for my chair.

Name: Monica
Lines: Youre-youre-youre gonna bring the Barca Lounger over here?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Is that a problem?

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, its a set and they should probably stay together.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, thats cool. Then Ill just bring them both over.

Name: Monica
Lines: See now-now youre taking them away from their home.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, I get it. So, I get nothing! Nothing here is mine! Everything here is yours! Ill get up in the morning put on your clothes, and head off to work!

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah-yeah, yknow what? Yeah, thats it-thats it, everything will be mine! Nothing will be yours! Thats-thats what I said! Oh come on, Chandler! Im talking about the barca lounger! It just, it doesnt match! Where is it gonna go?!

Name: Chandler
Lines: In the game room!

Name: Monica
Lines: Look it is not my fault that your chairs are incredibly ugly!

Name: Chandler
Lines: All right! Thats fine! Thats fine! I wont bring over the chairs! I wont bring anything over! I wouldnt want to ruin the ambiance over here at Grandmas place!!

Name: Joey
Lines: Everything on your application looks really goodOhh! Just one last question umm, are you and your friends gonna be over here all the time like partying and hanging out?

Name: The Potential Roommate
Lines: Oh dont worry, Im not really a party girl.

Name: Joey
Lines: Whoa!! Now look, dont be just blurtin stuff out. I want you to really think about your answers. Okay?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh dont listen to him, hes just some guy who really wants the apartment, but I dont think hes gonna get it.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Why did you take the shower curtain down?

Name: Joey
Lines: That thing was a hazard!  Im very safety conscious.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey! Oh listen, I was just clearing some space for your stuff.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh thanks, but listen, I was just at Monicas and she and Chandler had a big fight and theyre not moving in.

Name: Ross
Lines: What do you mean, theyre not moving in? They-theyre still moving in right?

Name: Rachel
Lines: No-no, they just had a big blowout over what to do with my room.

Name: Ross
Lines: What?! Over a stupid room!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, I feel kinda bad for them, but Im also really psyched cause I dont have to move in here!

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh no, yeah no, that parts great!

Name: Ross
Lines: Whats all this about you guys fighting?! Is this really over a room?! I mean, that is so silly!

Name: Monica
Lines: Ross, we can handle this.

Name: Ross
Lines: Well, apparently not, and I cant just stand by and watch two people I care about very much be hurt over something that is so silly. I mean, enough of the silliness!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, why dont you tell her to stop being silly!

Name: Ross

Lines: What about me? I just found out that Denise is leaving town for a while, I dont have a roommate.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, maybe-maybe I could be your roommate Pheebs.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Maybe you could be my roommate!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well theres an idea!!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah!

Name: Rachel
Lines: That would be great! Wait, how long is Denise gone for?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Umm, she said shed be back December 26th.

Name: Rachel
Lines: December 26th, huh maybe shes Santa Clause.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh look who it is, my husband. The apple of my eye.

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay, I got us a court date for tomorrow at 2:00 and I picked up all the forms. Ill take care of everything.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well sure, if you say youre gonna take care of everything I have no reason to doubt you. Give me those forms!  All right, now Im gonna do this my way and I dont want to hear a peep out of you!

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay Rach, but

Name: Rachel
Lines: Op! Youre peeping!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ross! Yknow what, I just gotwhy? Why did you do this?!

Name: Ross
Lines: Look I told you

Name: Rachel
Lines: I dont wanna hear "Three failed marriages!"

Name: Ross
Lines: Look, if youd had two failed marriages, youd understand!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, yknow what? Thanks to you Im half way there! Ugh! Oh! I am so mad! Ross, I dont think I have ever been this angry!

Name: Ross
Lines: What about the time I said we were on a break?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ugh!

Name: Monica
Lines: Pheebs, hows it going?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Im doing okay. I think its going well. Do you think theyre having fun? Am I talking to fast?

Name: Monica
Lines: Nope, sound like me. Pheebs, its going great. Look at Chandler with little baby girl Chandler.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Na-uh, no, we are all responsible for our own babies.

Name: Chandler
Lines: See thats where I think that youre wrong. Weve been playing these babies man for man; we should really be playing a zone defense.

Name: Monica
Lines: What do you mean?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I just think that things would go a lot smoother if we each have our own zone. Phoebe, you can be in charge of wiping. And yknow Mon, you can be in charge of diapering and I can be in charge of looking how cute they are when they put their hands around

Name: Phoebe
Lines: That sounds really great, but maybe you should be in charge of wiping.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, Im a rookie. I should not be in the end zone.

Name: Monica
Lines: This is so great! This is exactly how we set the plates at the restaurant.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah?  Well this is not what I ordered.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey guys!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey babies! Oh, Im having the best morning. That uh, that Porsche Ive got the keys too, still there!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Shocking! Since you still have the keys.

Name: Joey
Lines: You should see the treatment I get when Im with that car! People are friendly; they-they wanna talk, and not just about the car! One guy gave me advice about my equity investments.

Name: Chandler
Lines: What equity investments?

Name: Joey
Lines: The ones that got me the Porsche! Will you keep up!  But I figured, if-if people keep seeing me just standing there, theyre gonna start to think that I dont own it. So I figured Ill wash it. Right? Monica, you got a bucket and some soap I can borrow?

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh yeah, I got soap and sponges and rags and Carnuba wax and polishing compound.

Name: Chandler
Lines: You dont even have a car!

Name: Monica
Lines: I know. But umm, one time there was this really dirty car in front of the building, so I washed it.

Name: Chandler
Lines: And?

Name: Monica
Lines: And six others.

Name: Chandler
Lines: There you are.

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, she tops out at 130.

Name: Guy #2
Lines: Wow!

Name: Joey
Lines: And thats just in the city. I get her up to 160 when I take her upstate.

Lines: Really! You got a place upstate?

Name: Joey
Lines: Sure!

Lines: Well, Ill see you later.

Name: Joey
Lines: Okay, take it easy.

Name: The Porsche Owner
Lines: Hey! Thats my car.

Name: Joey
Lines: Really? Oh uh, oh just give me five more minutes with it.

Name: The Porsche Owner
Lines: What-what are you doing?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh I-I uh, found the keys and now Im just polishing her up.

Name: The Porsche Owner
Lines: But its my car!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, but its my wax.

Name: The Porsche Owner
Lines: Listen, I-I-I dont come to this city much so I dont know if youre crazy or this is some kind of street theater, but could I have my keys.

Name: Joey
Lines: Sure. Here.  Ill uh, save your parking spot.

Name: The Porsche Owner
Lines: Im not coming back.

Name: Joey
Lines: Why not?

Name: The Porsche Owner
Lines: I live upstate.

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, so did I.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I dont know why I was so nervous about this. And I dont know why Frank and Alice are always complaining. This is so easy.

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, two hours, a lifetime thats the same.

Name: Monica
Lines: Chandler, what are you doing? That thing can put someones eye out!

Name: Chandler
Lines: He can do more than that! He can destroy the universe!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No Chandler, they can swallow one of those little parts! And also, look at his smooth area, thats just gonna mess them up.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Theyre not gonna swallow anything, you guys are being way over protective. When I was a kid, my mom used to just throw me into a pile of broken glass!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: What?!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Glass, sand, whatever.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, look at little Leslie stretching in her sleep.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh its so cute. I wonder what age it is when you stop being able to put both legs over your head.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, I can still do that.

Name: Monica
Lines: How are you still single?!

Name: Monica
Lines: Good. What made you change your mind?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I swallowed the sonic blaster gun.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: How did that happen?!!

Name: Monica
Lines: Damnit! Yknow this whole time we were concentrating on watching the babies and, and no one was watching Chandler!

Name: Judge
Lines: Okay you two are asking the court for an annulment?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yes your honor, and here are, are forms, all filled out.

Name: Judge
Lines: So based on your petition you are seeking an annulment on the grounds that Mr. Geller is mentally unstable.

Name: Ross
Lines: Fine, Im mentally unstable.

Name: Judge
Lines: And based on the fact that Mr. Geller is intravenous drug user.

Name: Ross
Lines: What?!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Uh yes, heroin and crack.

Name: Ross
Lines: Crack isnt even an intravenous drug!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, you would know.

Name: Judge
Lines: Now it also says here that you lied about your sexual preference before marriage?

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, come on!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ross, please, I found the magazines!

Name: Judge
Lines: And finally that you were unable to consummate the marriage. Well, that makes sense since youre gay and addicted to heroin.

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay, Im sorry, this is insane! I-I-Im not addicted to heroin, Im not gay, and there is no problem with my ability to consummate anything! Look, Ill consummate this marriage right here, right now!

Name: Judge
Lines: That wont be necessary.

Name: Ross
Lines: And when we were dating we consummated like bunnies!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ugh!

Name: Judge
Lines: Now if you were two involved in a serious relationship, that really creates a problem.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ross! Your honor, rest assured relationship ended like two years ago!  And could you strike "Consummated like bunnies" from the record?

Name: Judge
Lines: Is there, anything in this record that is actually true?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, yes, we got married in Vegas and uh, and the names I think.

Name: Judge
Lines: Well, based on what I heard, you two certainly dont qualify for an annulment. If you two dont want to be together youll have to file for divorce.

Name: Ross
Lines: Thats great! Are you happy now? Look what you did with your funny, funny form!

Name: Rachel
Lines: What?! Me?! What about you and your consummated like bunnies nonsense!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay, do you see, do you see what youre keeping me married too?!

Name: Judge
Lines: You need to get out of my chambers.

Name: Rachel
Lines: All right look lady here is the deal, I came here for an annulment and I am not leaving here until I get one!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah!

Name: Judge
Lines: Would you like to spend the night in jail?

Name: Rachel
Lines: And thank you for your time.

Name: Joey
Lines: So the Porsche guy took his car back.

Name: Chandler
Lines: But you found the keys to his clothes?

Name: Joey
Lines: No. No, I just uh, I just loved the way it feels when everybody thinks I own a Porsche.

Lines: Hes got something plastic lodged in his throat, weve got to go to the hospital.

Lines: Okay, listen this really hurts. Lets go.

Name: Joey
Lines: Porsche.

Lines: Oh my God.

Lines: I know, the babies are asleep.

Lines: Was the setting of Phoebes triumph.

Lines: Is not as important as the fact that Phoebe took care of the babies all by herself.

Lines: Phoebe, would you take a look at this mess!!!!

Lines: Oh honey thank God youre home, I was getting worried.

Lines: Oh, little Xs! Great! That makes up for everything!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yknow, I-Iyouve done a lot of stupid stuff too! Okay?

Lines: Okay, how about you flew to London to stop my wedding! Ah, how about you told me you loved me after I was already married!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey! Wait a minute! That was different! I did those things because I was in love with you!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah! Right!

Name: Ross
Lines: Youre right. Thats very different. So lets, lets just sign the papers. All right?  What?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Nothing.

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay, can we just sign please?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Uh-hmm.

Lines: Congratulations.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay Ross, werewait a minute. Umm, I uh, I kinda have a little confession.

Lines: What?

Lines: Excuse me?

Lines: Well, remember how we were too drunk to remember anything the night we were married?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah?

Name: Rachel
Lines: And uh, yeah, I didnt really, I didnt want to say anything, but it kinda it just, it kinda kept coming back to me, and umm, remember we were in the casino and for some reason thought it would be funny to eat a lot of grapes. And uh, and I thought it would be funnier if we got married. So as a, as a compromise we decided first to get married, and then  to eat a lot of grapes. So umm, sorry I got us into this mess.

Name: Ross
Lines: So then if-ifI mean if you think about it, this is all  your fault.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, dont push it though.

Name: Ross
Lines: Ive got to say; I know I divorce a lot of women, never thought I would be divorcing you.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I know. I always thought if you and I got married, it would be the one that stuck. And it wouldnt be a secret, and we wouldnt have our wedding dinner at Pizza Hut.

Lines: Did I, did I even treat?

Name: Rachel
Lines: No, it was on the house, it was, it was a newlywed special.

Name: Ross

Lines: I figure that $1,500 would cover him for a few months, yknow? But I have to trick him into taking it so I wont hurt his pride.

Lines: Hey!

Lines: Hey! Wow! You look great! Wanna move in with me tomorrow?

Lines: No, no dont get mad because lookthis is what happened. So I-I started packing, then I realized, "What am I doing? I am lousy at packing!" Right? But you love packing! So, as a gift to you, on our last night, ta-da!

Lines: Ill be coordinator! Oh my God! Im so sorry, I didnt get you anything! Okay, look everybody has to help! Okay? You can help, cant you Phoebe?

Lines: Okay.

Lines: Its almost 8 oclock, its almost past his bedtime. Where-where is he?

Lines: Hes at a dinner party.

Lines: Of course he is! What, do you think Id just use my son as-as an excuse? What kind of father do you think I am?

Name: Monica
Lines: All right, sorry.

Lines: Oh, I wish Id know you were going to do that, I ordered Chinese.

Lines: Oh thats okay. Hey, actually in a way its kinda nice. Me, bringing the food of my ancestors, you, the food of yours!

Lines: Say, Joe, I had a strange idea of what we could do for our last night. What do you say we play a little uh, foosball for money?

Lines: Okay, lets play! The big game, Italy vs. China, apparently.

Lines: Ohhhhhh, look its the roller blades.

Lines: No.

Lines: You guys, we said we were gonna have fun! Come on, hey, remember the time  You dont remember?

Lines: Im sorry Pheebs, I guess Im just really said that Im leaving.

Lines: Im gonna miss you so much.

Lines: Well, this doesnt have to be so sad though. Yknow? Maybe instead of just thinking about how much youre gonna miss each other, you should like think of the things youre not gonna miss.

Lines: I have one.

Lines: Good! Great! You can go first.

Lines: Good thats a good one. Okay, Monica, anything? Yknow? Does Rachel move the phone pen?

Name: Monica
Lines: Aw, sometimes. Always, actually.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, good. There you go. Doesnt anyone feel better?

Lines: Not just the phone pen. I never get my messages.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You get your messages!

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, well I dont think it really counts if you have to read them off the back of your hand after you fall asleep on the couch.

Name: Rachel
Lines: So-so, you missed a message from who? Chandler or your mom? Or Chandler? Or your mom?

Lines: Great! It worked! No ones sad.

Lines: Okay, give me a chance to win my money back. Okay? Sudden death, one goal, $1,000.

Lines: You serious?

Lines: Oh yes!

Lines: Okay, get ready to owe me!

Lines: Okay.

Lines: Okay, here we go. Ready?

Lines: No! No! No! Noone can beat me.

Lines: Whats up?

Lines: You know what else Im not gonna miss? "Im Monica. I wash the toilet 17 times a day. Even if people are on it!"

Lines: "Hi Im Rachel, is my sweater too tight? No? Oh, Id better wash it and shrink it!"

Lines: "Oh my God, I love Ross! I hate Ross! I love Ross! I hate Ross!"

Lines: "Oh my God, I cant find a boyfriend! So I guess Ill just stumble across the hall and sleep with the first guy I find in there!"

Lines: Still broken?

Lines: Nah, not my game.

Lines: All right.

Lines: Ho-ho, you win! 50 dollars!

Lines: Oh yeah! Okay, lets play again.  What do you got?

Lines: A four and a nine.

Lines: Youre kidding right?

Lines: No. Why?

Lines: Damn! I am good at Cups!

Lines: Im not talking to her!

Lines: Well, one of you has to take the first step! And it should be you, because shes the one whos leaving. Its harder for her!

Lines: It needs to go about 20 blocks to the left!

Lines: Because its my apartment!

Lines: Okay, look at him. Look at those strong hands. Oh what I wouldnt give to be that can of  condensed milk.

Name: Ross

Name: Ross
Lines: I dont know, aheh, yours was the first name that-that popped into my head, Im Im sorry. I-I didnt think it would matter.

Name: Chandler

Lines: I dont know, I-I was all high.

Lines: Mom and dad just sent me in here to find out if you  were trying to get Ross stoned!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Your parents caught Ross smoking pot in college and he blamed it on me!

Lines: Ross, I cant believe youd do that!

Name: Chandler
Lines: The reason we havent told them were together is because they hate me, okay? So will you fix this?

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay, okay, Ill tell em it wasnt Chandler who got high. Now who should I say it was?

Lines: You! Its not like its a big deal! You-you dont still do it or anything!

Lines: Joey! Come on! I dont wanna make any mistakes, alright? This is the only dessert and if I screw it up everybody's gonna be like Oh, remember that Thanksgiving when Rachel screwed up the trifle?

Lines: Oh I am!

Lines: Rachel, come here.  Okay, I was just starting to take my Thanksgiving nap, and I had another dream about Jack.

Lines: Oh, Phoebe, do I wanna hear this?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I dunno, lets see! So, okay, I dreamt that we were gonna get married, and he left, becuz he had to go fight a fire. And, um, so okay, I went to a night club, and I saw him making out with a girl.

Lines: Oh my God, he dream-cheated on you!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, but then Jacques Cousteau came and he kicked his ass for betraying me! It was soo cool! Then, he took me diving and he introduced me to his pet seahorse, who, by the way, was totally coming on to me, and please, that is not gonna happen.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: Boy, Im glad I wore the big belt today.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Five minutes ago, a line like that wouldve floored me. Now nothing. Well, not nothing, I am still a woman.

Name: Ross

Lines: Whats the matter with you? Get out of here!

Lines: Oh, hey guys!

Lines: Or we could just follow your clever jokes  any ideas? No! Didnt think so! Okay, cmon guys, show us where the presents are!

Lines: Hmm, how about my azzz?

Lines: This bench, its hollow! I cant believe I never knew that!  Oh, the presents!!!

Lines: Oh great!

Lines: I dont wanna know what Monica got me. Yknow? I mean, look, Im sure she worked really hard at getting you a present, and wanting to surprise me, and you guys are gonna ruin that, and I, look we have to put these back, this is not what Christmas is about.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Whatever Linus, Im opening mine.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Nobody is opening anything ok? Look, I dont know about you guys, but I wanna see the look on Monicas face when I give her my present, and Im sure she wants to see the look on my face when I get mine. So please, please, can we just, can we put them back?

Lines: Will you get us better gifts?

Lines: Fine!

Lines: Oh yes, I see what you mean. That look is priceless.

Lines: Joey.

Lines: Yeah?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, yoii. What was that for?

Lines: Well, I dont know tonight when they yelled cut and we didnt get to kiss, I was really, really, disappointed, and I just, really wanted to kiss you

Lines: No.

Name: {Transcribers note
Lines: This is where the opening credits are, but theyre not the usual opening credits. Oh no! These credits are based on the world that would have been created had all of the above actually happened. It starts out with all of them at the fountain sitting on the couch as Fat Monica runs up and sits on the arm of the couch, tilting the whole thing towards her. It then goes on to show Rachels still a shop-aholic and with Barry. Fat Monica is sweating while cooking and dancing while eating a donut. Phoebe as the Wall Street shark smoking while on two cell phones. Then theyre dancing in the fountain. Joey entering as Dr. Drake Remoray and meeting a groupie. Chandler trying to write as a bird does its business on his shoulder and falling asleep while typing. Ross doing some kara-tay and trying to get Carol into bed. And finally, some more dancing in the fountain, them all flexing, and the turning out the lamp and shutting off all the lights bit from the first season. Just remember one thing, this is an alternate universe. Everything from every other episode doesnt apply, for instance, Ross and Rachel have no history. And in fact have not seen each other in years in this world.}

Name: Ross
Lines: Yes! Youre the person who checked out my book?!

Name: Woman
Lines: Yknow, you look nothing like I wouldve thought. Youreyoure so young.

Name: Ross
Lines: Well I uh, I skipped forth grade.

Name: Ross
Lines: I am veryvery sorry.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So how was, how was your date?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, it was great! I mean we walked all around the village. We went to this ice cream place, split a milkshake, 70/30 but still And guess what, Im thinking about taking her upstate to one of those bed and breakfasts.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh really? She said she wants to go away with you?

Name: Joey
Lines: No-no-no-no-no! Its a surprise, but its gonna be tricky thought because she said she was gonna be pretty busy at work for a while.

Name: Phoebe and Rachel
Lines: Oh no, yeah.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Jo-Joey, look honey we-we need to talk okay? Umm, I kinda got the feeling from her today that uh, shes not lookin for a serious relationship.

Name: Joey
Lines: Where are you gettin this?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, she told me. She said shes kinda a loner.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh. Oh.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Joey

Name: Joey
Lines: No hey Rach, its cool okay? Yknow Im a loner too!  Right?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey Joey, yknow what? You are way to good for her.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah and honey I promise next time that I will just say good-bye and tell em youre not looking for a relationship.

Name: Joey
Lines: No! No. Dont do that, just next time make sure she really likes me.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well that too.  Joey?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Do you want some pancakes?

Name: Joey
Lines: Finally!

Name: Monica
Lines: What are we gonna do?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I say we go with Careless Whisper.

Name: Janice
Lines: Chandler?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Did she see us yet? Did she see us?

Name: Monica
Lines: Janice, what umm, what are you doing here?

Name: Janice
Lines: Well umm, I thought I was going to go back to my apartment but then I just felt I couldnt really be alone tonight.  I was wondering if I could maybe stay here with you, just I really feel that I need to be with family.

Name: Monica
Lines: Our kids are gonna call her Aunt Janice arent they?

Name: Janice
Lines: Please, its because otherwise I really dont know what I might do.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Arent you just a tinsy bit curious?

Name: Janice
Lines: Do you have any tissues?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, in-in-in the bathroom.

Name: Janice
Lines: Okay!

Name: Monica
Lines: Well justwell just let her stay.

Name: Chandler
Lines: No-no-no-no, if we let her stay, she will stay forever!

Name: Monica
Lines: Kinda like your Barca lounger.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Is that what youre thinking about right now?

Name: Monica
Lines: I never stop thinking about it.

Name: Janice
Lines: Hey you guys, umm do either one of you want to get in there before I take my bath.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Janice, Im sorry but umm, you cant stay here tonight.

Name: Janice
Lines: Why not?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Honestly? Our apartment is a hotbed for electromagnetic activity. Now Monica and I have been immunized, but sadly you have not.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh my God! Oh my God! You have to go!

Name: Janice
Lines: Why?

Name: Monica
Lines: Because Chandler still has feelings for you!

Name: Janice
Lines: He does?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Say again?

Name: Monica
Lines: Thats right. Thats right. And that is why you cant stay here tonight. And probably why you shouldnt come to the wedding.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Feelings, such strong feelings.

Name: Monica
Lines: I mean, I realize that his feelings may never completely go away, but you can.

Name: Chandler
Lines: I just wanted to show Monica your book.

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey everybody! Happy Thanksgiving!

Name: Chandler
Lines: No, no, no. No-no-no.

Name: Joey, Rachel, and Phoebe
Lines: Shhhh!

Name: Ross
Lines: What, are we keeping Thanksgiving a secret this year?

Name: Chandler
Lines: No, we're playing this game I learned at work. You have to name all the states in six minutes.

Name: Ross
Lines: What? That's like insanely easy!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Now, that's a lot harder than it sounds. You always forget at least one, or in some cases... fourteen .

Name: Monica
Lines: It's a stupid game and I wasn't playing against other people, so technically I didn't lose.

Name: Ross
Lines: What? You forgot fourteen states?

Name: Monica
Lines: Nobody cares about the Dakotas.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, okay, time's up!

Name: Rachel
Lines: All right, I got 48.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh that's not bad, Pheebs?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, I got tired of naming states. So I decided to list the types of celery, and I have one: regular celery.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, so Rachel's got 48 and Phoebe has the lead invegetables, Joey?

Name: Joey
Lines: Say hello to the new champ of Chandler's dumb states game.

Name: Ross
Lines: Wow, how many have you got?

Name: Joey
Lines: Fifty-six!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey! How is New England not a state? Huh? They have a sports-team!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Does South Oregon have a sports-team?  There you go.

Name: Rachel
Lines: How come we have one extra place setting?

Name: Monica
Lines: 'Cause you invited your assistant.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, right. Sorry. But Tag's not coming; his girlfriend came into town, so he's spending Thanksgiving with her.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh! Why didn't you tell me? I made him his own individual sweet potato stuffed pumpkin.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, I was going to, but then I figured, you know... you're food is so delicious and perfect, you can never have too many of those pumpkin things.

Name: Monica
Lines: Now you think I wouldn't enjoy that, because it is so fake,  but I still do.

Name: Ross
Lines: Done! With time a-to-spare.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oooh that may be a New World's record

Name: Ross
Lines: You know, I hate to lecture you guys, but it's kinda disgraceful, that a group of well-educated adults and Joey can't name all the states. Did you ever see a map, or one of those round, colorful things called "a globe?" Hmm?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Uh, Magellan? You got 46 states.

Name: Ross
Lines: What? That's impossible.

Name: Joey
Lines: 46. Wow! Who's well educated now, Mr. I-forgot-ten-states?

Name: Monica
Lines: All right, I'm out of oven space. I'm gonna turn on Joey's. Please, watch him! Do not let Joey eat any of the food!

Name: Chandler
Lines: I am only one man!  Okay Ross, time is up!

Name: Ross
Lines: No, just give me another minute.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Look Ross, if you don't know them by now, you will never know them, okay? That is the beauty of this game. It makes you want to kill yourself.

Name: Ross
Lines: This-this is crazy! I can do this! All right, uhh, I bet I can get all 50 before dinner.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, but if you can'tno dinner!

Name: Ross
Lines: You're on!

Name: Joey
Lines: All right. Don't look at my list, Ross, 'cause there's a lot on there that you don't have.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey, did you guys know, that your oven doesn't work?

Name: Joey
Lines: But the drawer full of take-out menus is okay, right?

Name: Monica
Lines: Ross, I'm gonna use yours, okay?

Name: Ross
Lines: Pshhshhh!

Name: Monica
Lines: Chandler? Can you give me a hand?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Sure, and Joey; do not let Ross look at any of the maps or the globe in your apartment.

Name: Joey
Lines: Don't worry, Chandler, it's not a globe of the United States.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey you guys I'm gonna go out and take a walk.

Name: Ross
Lines: Phoebe, why is your bag moving?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, it's not!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Seriously, it's moving!

Name: Joey
Lines: What the hell is in there?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: It's just my knitting that's all!  Yes! I knit this. I'm very good.

Name: Monica
Lines: Rosss apartment is nice! How come we don't hang out here more often?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I don't know. Maybe it's because it smells a little weird. It's like old pumpkins or something.

Name: Monica
Lines: That's my pie!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Which smells delicious!

Name: Monica
Lines: Uh-oh! Uh-oh!

Name: Chandler
Lines: What?

Name: Monica
Lines: We left Joey alone with the food!  Yep! Yep, I knew it! There he is... feeding stuffing to a dog!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hi Geller-Bing residence. How can I help?

Name: Monica
Lines: Phoebe, why is there a dog in our apartment?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I'm sorry, who's this?

Name: Monica
Lines: Phoebe, there's a dog sitting on my couch!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Tell her, I'm allergic, and I will sue!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, there's no dog here?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh my god! Where are you?

Name: Monica
Lines: I'll be right there!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: They're here already? How are they doing this?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi Tag! What are you doing here?

Name: Tag
Lines: I, uh, wanted to see if your offer to spend Thanksgiving with you is still good.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, sure! Come in!  Well, what-what happened to your girlfriend?

Name: Tag
Lines: We kinda broke up this morning.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, I'm sorry.

Name: Tag
Lines: Yeah, so she went back to Ohio.

Name: Ross
Lines: Ohio!! Thank you!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Huh! Where is the dog?!

Name: Ross
Lines: What dog? There-there's no dog here.

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah that dog left!

Name: Monica
Lines: Phoebe! Phoebe, open up!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: There's no dog in here.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Phoebe, we can hear the dog barking!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No that's just me coughing!  Oh, good, there you are! Listen, um, I have a dog in my room.

Name: Chandler
Lines: What is it doing here?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, I'm watching it for some friends who went out of town. Wait.  Hello, my name is Clunkers. May I please stay with you nice people?

Name: Monica
Lines: Oooh, I wish she could stay here, but Chandler is allergic!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Extremely allergic, okay? If I'm anywhere near a dog for more than 5 minutes, my throat will just close up!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: That's odd, 'cause this dog's been living here for the past 3 days

Name: Chandler
Lines: Really?

Name: Monica
Lines: Chandler, if that dog's been here that long, and you haven't had a reaction, maybe you're not allergic to this dog?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, it still has to go, right?

Name: Monica and Phoebe
Lines: Why?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, it's um

Name: Joey
Lines: Don't do it!

Name: Monica
Lines: Don't do what?

Name: All
Lines: What?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Are you crazy?

Name: Ross
Lines: Are you out of your mind?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Why?

Name: Joey
Lines: Told ya.

Name: Chandler
Lines: They are needy, they are jumpy, and you can't tell what they are thinking, and that scares me a little bit.

Name: Ross
Lines: Right, they are scary.  Ahh, she just ate a treat out of my hand!!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Wait a minute. Do you not like all dogs? I mean, not even puppies?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Is there a puppy here?

Name: Tag
Lines: You don't like puppies?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, you are new!

Name: Joey
Lines: Look, Chandler, I told you, never tell anyone about this dog thing. It's like Ross not likin ice cream.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: You don't like ice cream?

Name: Ross
Lines: It's too cold.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, it's just that dogs make me a little uncomfortable.

Name: Ross
Lines: It hurts my teeth.

Name: Chandler
Lines: And I don't wanna say this, I don't you guys to hate me, but uh, I don't think, I can be around that dog anymore. Okay, so either the dog goes, or I go.  Oh my god!!

Name: Ross
Lines: How can I not get this? I'm a college professor; I got 1450 on my S.A.T.s.

Name: Ross
Lines: Damn, I forgot you were here.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: All right. We're gonna take Clunkers to Rosss. We'll be back in a minute.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, wait before you guys go, can I just ask you a question?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Rachel
Lines: When a guy breaks up with his girlfriend, what is an appropriate amount of time to wait before you make a move?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, I'd say about a month.

Name: Monica
Lines: Really? I'd say 3 to 4.

Name: Joey
Lines: Half hour.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Interesting.

Name: Monica
Lines: When it's your assistant, I would say never.

Name: Joey
Lines: All right, Rach, the big question is, does he like you? All right? Because if he doesn't like you, this is all a moo-point.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Huh. A moo-point?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, it's like a cow's opinion. It just doesn't matter. It's moo.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Have I been living with him for too long, or did that all just make sense?

Name: Monica
Lines: Please, don't listen to Joey, okay. Would you look at him? He-hes obviously depressed. He's away from his family; he's spending Thanksgiving with strangers.  What he needs right now is for you to be his friend.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You're right, I'm sorry. Thank you. Okay, that's what I'm gonna do.

Name: Joey
Lines: Fine! Take their advice. No one ever listens to me. When the package is this pretty, no one cares what's inside.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: Tag
Lines: Hey.

Name: Rachel
Lines: How are you holding up?

Name: Tag
Lines: Not bad.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah? I'm sorry about your girlfriend.

Name: Tag
Lines: Thanks.

Name: Rachel
Lines: So were you guys together a long time?

Name: Tag
Lines: A year. On and off. I kinda thought we'd end up together. I don't anymore.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Now that she broke up with you?

Name: Tag
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah. Hmmmm.

Name: Tag
Lines: It's weird. I always used to assume, that I would meet someone and fall in love and be happy and all that was just a given. But lately it's like what if it's not. Do you ever have that feeling?

Name: Rachel
Lines: NoYeah, all the time, constantly. It's terrifying. But you know that I figure itit has to work out.

Name: Tag
Lines: Why?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Because, uhit has to.

Name: Tag
Lines: You have all the answers, don't you?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, I know, I do. I really do.

Name: Tag
Lines: Hey, thanks for talking to me.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, what is a boss for? Hug it out!

Name: Joey
Lines: All right, he likes you back! Huh? Told ya, you should go for it!

Name: Tag
Lines: What?

Name: Tag
Lines: What did Joey say? I like you back?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Uh, yeah, well, see, he Joey knows, that I'm-I'm very insecure about my back and, andyou're hugging me, so obviously you are not repulsed by it, yeah!

Name: Tag
Lines: Wait-wait a minute; that doesn't make any sense.

Name: Rachel
Lines: No?  All right, here's the truth um, Joey said what he said, because um, I'm attracted to you.

Name: Tag
Lines: Wow.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, I admit it. I have a crush on you, and uh, and, and I know that's crazy because we work together, and-and nothing could ever happen, and the last thing I want to do is-is to freak you out or make you feel uncomfortable. Which is why it would be really great if you said something right about now.

Name: Rachel
Lines: What?

Name: Tag
Lines: Right there! That's my car!  Hey!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay, that's gonna take them a minute. Do you have anything else you wanna get off your chest?

Name: Tag
Lines: I can't believe this!

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay Phoebe, we should probably go back now.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Please don't leave me, I'll be lonely.

Name: Monica
Lines: Stop it. Stop! Okay let's go. We can be strong.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, okay.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh my god! Did you hear that? She said Monica!  Oooh, I can't leave her!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: You know if you want, we can sneak the dog back in and Chandler wouldn't even know.

Name: Monica
Lines: That's not gonna work.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I've had that dog there for three days and Chandler had no idea. He's not so smart.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey! I didn't know either.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, but you kinda knew that something was going on, didn't you?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, I knew.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Where's Chandler?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Here I am.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Wash your hands!!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: How did youknow?

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey! What's she doing back here?

Name: Monica
Lines: Relax, Ross. She's not made of ice cream!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey look, Phoebe. I, uh, I laid out the states geographically...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, no, we don't really have time for this right now. Okay, we have to keep Chandler away from my bedroom.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, but, but look what I'm...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: See, this is exactly what we do not have time for.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Where's Monica?

Name: Ross
Lines: Um, in Phoebe's room. You can't go in there.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Why not?

Name: Ross
Lines: Monica's crying. She's very upset about this whole Clunkers thing.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, I, I should go in there.

Name: Ross
Lines: No. No, no. She doesn't want to see you right now.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Why not?

Name: Ross
Lines: Because you sent away the dog!

Name: Chandler
Lines: This is ridiculous.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, is it? Is it? Look, when Monica and I were kids, we had a dog named Rover. And, uh, one day, my dad decides, he doesn't like dogs. So Monica and her friendPhyllistake away the dog. And that was the last time we ever saw him. Don't you see? This is just like that. Only with a few details changed.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Monica's all upset, because I sent Clunkers away.

Name: Joey
Lines: So? Bring the dog back, you're a hero.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah, I can be a hero, I could do that. I could, I could do... I, w-w-what if, what if it attacks me?

Name: Joey
Lines: Chandler, it's like a big gerbil.

Name: Chandler
Lines: And that doesn't scare you?

Name: Joey
Lines: Ross, you need some help?

Name: Ross
Lines: From you?  Yes, please!

Name: Joey
Lines: First of all, Utah? Dude, you can't just make stuff up!

Name: Ross
Lines: I hate America! When I finish this game, I swear I am moving.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey! Tag's still talking to the police.

Name: Joey
Lines: If you said it like that, you probably did, yeah.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey, is Chandler here?

Name: Chandler
Lines: No, no he went for a walk.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, but you cannot tell him... but look whose back!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh No-no-no-no-no-no-no! He went over to Ross' to bring the dog back here!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh no, the dog's not going to be there!

Name: Joey
Lines: You think?

Name: Monica
Lines: Hi, honey.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Please, please, please, don't be mad at me.

Name: Monica
Lines: What? Why, why would...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Shh, wait and see. Maybe we will, maybe we won't.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: We have good news, look whose back!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Clunkers?! Oh my god!

Name: Monica
Lines: That's right, she came back all by herself.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: It's a Thanksgiving miracle!

Name: Chandler
Lines: It is so good to see you!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, she came all the way back from Ross' building. Oh, the things she must have seen! And then she climbed up the fire escape and she tapped on the window with her teeny little paw and then we ran to let her in I went to far, didn't I? When should I have stopped?

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay, maybe this is so hard, because there aren't 50 states. Let me tell you something, I have 49 states, and there are no more! I-I think, I should be able to eat something.

Name: Chandler
Lines: It's up to you.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, hi! How are you doing?

Name: Tag
Lines: I'm okay. I gotta go down to the police station and look at mug shots.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh.

Name: Tag
Lines: Thanks for having me over, you guys.

Name: Ross
Lines: Tag? Y-You're going?  Uh we didn't, uh we didn't get the chance to talk. Uh, so, where did you say you're from again?

Name: Tag
Lines: Colorado.

Name: Ross
Lines: Ah, what good are you.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Look, um, I think we should talk about what happened on the terrace.

Name: Tag
Lines: Okay.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ah, I-I never should have said what I said. Ityknow what? It just doesn't matter how I feel. I mean we work together, so nothing could really ever happen between us, and what I would love is just to go to work on Monday, and-and never talk about this again, okay? Big day Monday lots to do. So, we're okay?

Name: Tag
Lines: Um, I'm not.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, god, I know it, that I freaked you out.

Name: Tag
Lines: No, you didn't. The only thing that freaked me out was you saying that nothing could ever happen between us.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Really?

Name: Tag
Lines: Yeah, so, please don't fire me for doing this.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay, well, that's one less thing we have to do on Monday.

Name: Ross
Lines: Delaware!  Delaware!

Name: Chandler
Lines: All right.

Name: Ross
Lines: I want my turkey now!

Name: Chandler
Lines: You got it.  You got Nevada twice.

Name: Ross
Lines: I know.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Ben
Lines: Im ready!

Name: Ross
Lines: You sure?

Name: Ben
Lines: Uh-huh!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, let me just straighten out your helmet there.

Name: Ben
Lines: Thanks daddy.

Name: Ross
Lines: No-no, one daddy, two mommies. All right, its all yours.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay. Okay.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yes! Yes! Yes!!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: His first big kids bike, this is so exciting!

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh yeah, I remember mine! Ohh, it was my sixth birthday, my dad took me to the park, I got it, andit bent.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I never had a bike of my own.

Name: Ross
Lines: What?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, we didnt have a lot of money. But the girl across the street had the best bike! It was pink and it had rainbow colored tassels hanging off the handle grips, and-and-and a bell and this big, white wicker basket with those plastic daisies stuck on.

Name: Chandler
Lines: That sounds like my first bike.  My dad gave me his old one.

Name: Ross
Lines: Ohh.

Name: Monica
Lines: Did the girl ever let you ride it?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No! But she gave me the box that it came in. It had a picture of the bike on the front.  So I would sit on it and my step-dad would drag me around the backyard.

Name: Ross
Lines: That is so unfair!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Not really, I got to drag him around too!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey! What are you guys doing?

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: Monica
Lines: Making holiday candy for the neighbors.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Im sorry, who?

Name: Monica
Lines: Im gonna hang this basket  on the door and when the neighbors walk by they can all take a piece.

Name: Chandler
Lines: But we dont know the neighbors.

Name: Joey
Lines: I do. Theres uh, lets see, Guy With a Mustache, Smokes-A-Lot Lady, Some Kids Ive Seen, and A Red-haired Guy Who Does Not Like To Be Called Rusty.

Name: Monica
Lines: See? This is exactly why Im making this candy. We can learn their names and get to know our neighbors.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Wouldnt it be easier if we just moved?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Gooood morning!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Eh, somebodys in a good mood!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, why shouldnt I be? I have great friends! I have a wonderful job!

Name: Monica
Lines: Where you can make out with your assistant.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Come on, its not a big deal! We stayed up all night coming up with a plan so that us dating will not be a problem.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh yeah, whats the plan?

Name: Rachel
Lines: We We are not going to let it be a problem.

Name: Monica
Lines: Wow! It took you all night to come up with that plan?!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well yknow, we did other stuff too.

Name: Monica
Lines: Did you two

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh Monica come on, yknow I dont sleep with guys on the first date!

Name: Monica
Lines: Matt Guire, Mark Lynn, Ben Wire

Name: Rachel
Lines: Anymore!!

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi. Tag, I have a conference call today is that correct?

Name: Tag
Lines: Yes, at 4:00.

Name: Tag
Lines: Id better get back to my desk.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay, you hard worker! Ill remember to put that in your evaluation.

Name: Tag
Lines: My what?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, youve been here for two months now and your boss is required to hand in a performance evaluation. But yknow, there is one thing that I have yet to evaluate.

Name: Tag
Lines: Are you serious?

Name: Rachel
Lines: No, Ive just always wanted to do that. Can you help me clean this up?

Name: Monica
Lines: The basket is totally empty! My God, the neighbors ate all the candy!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, either that or uh

Name: Monica
Lines: Joey!!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah?

Name: Monica
Lines: Did you eat all the neighbor candy?!

Name: Joey
Lines: Uh well yeah, that was the plan, but by the time I got to it there was only a couple of pieces left!

Name: Phoebe

Lines: Ohhhhh. Thats how it got fixed!

Lines: Well, what did you think, that-that elves came in and fixed it?

Lines: Joey you broke my chair!!

Lines: Yeah, he thought he broke your chair so he switched the chairs!

Name: Joey
Lines: So, there was no miracle?!

Name: Rachel
Lines: No Joe, no miracle.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh no this is devastating! My faith is shaken. Im so glad I have the new chair to get my through this difficult time in my life.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Uh-huh! Nice try, but you dont get that chair anymore! All right? That is my chair now! You can sit on my lap!  No I take that back!

Name: Rachel
Lines: No-no-no! This chairs not going anywhere.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, wheres the logic in that?!

Name: Rachel
Lines: The logic is, that there are two of us and we are both strong enough to break a chair in half!

Name: Chandler
Lines: So Joey breaks my chair and I get nothing!

Name: Joey
Lines: Thats right!

Name: Chandler
Lines: What are you guys? Like a gang or something?!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah! We are!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Were the Cobras!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Excuse me! Can you tell me where I can find Earl? Hes the supply manager around here.

Name: Marge
Lines: Sorry, I dont know any Earl.

Name: Earl
Lines: Im right here!!!!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Earl! Im Phoebe.

Name: Earl
Lines: Phoebe? The lady who sells toner?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Umm, look it, you-you cant kill yourself.

Name: Earl
Lines: Look, um I really appreciate your coming down

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No-no I cant! I cant let you do it!

Name: Earl
Lines: Why?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Because it was fate that made me call you today!

Name: Earl
Lines: I thought it was toner.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No! Think about it okay? This isnt even my regular job! Okay? And my first day on the job, youre my first call! And-and somebody else mightve hung up on you, but I wouldnt do that because I know about this stuff. My mom killed herself.

Name: Earl
Lines: Really?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yes.

Name: Earl
Lines: How?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Im not gonna give you tips! Look dont you see that this-thisthis all came together so that I could stop you from doing this.

Name: Earl
Lines: Couldnt it just be a coincidence?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, its fate!

Name: Earl
Lines: It doesnt really seem like enough to be fate.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh. Well umm, okay heres a weird thing. My mother was also a supply manager.

Name: Earl
Lines: Im actually the office manager.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh my God! So was she! And! Get this, okay? Your-your name is Earl, right? Her name was Pearl, P-Earl.

Name: Earl
Lines: Well, was there anything else?!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Sure!  Umm, where are you from?

Name: Earl
Lines: Philadelphia.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh my God! So was she! Oh, Ive got-Ive got goose bumps.

Name: Earl
Lines: Really?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, yknow Im wearing layers and its warm.

Name: Earl
Lines: Yeah-yeah.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: But ifno look, okay. These jerks might not care about you, but the universe does! And that says a lot!

Name: Earl
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Ross
Lines: All right. I think it was a mouse.

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: How are you honey?

Name: Monica
Lines: How do you think I am?! Youve wrecked all my childhood memories. You love Ross more than me. And I just rubbed a dead mouse on my face!

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: Sweetheart, we love you just as much as Ross! Now, Im sorry about everything that happened and Id probably never be able to make it up to you, but heres a start.

Name: Monica
Lines: Whats this?

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: Its the key to my Porsche. Well, the key to your Porsche.

Name: Monica
Lines: What?!

Name: Ross
Lines: What?!!!

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: Ive been thinking about getting rid of it. I was driving it the other day and saw my reflection in a store window. Your mothers right, I do look like an ass.

Name: Monica
Lines: Wait, youre giving me your Porsche, youre kidding me right?!

Name: Ross
Lines: Well w-w-w-w-wait, w-wait, wait, wait a minute! I mean a couple of stupid boxes get wet and she gets a Porsche?!

Name: Mr. Geller
Lines: Why dont we take it for a spin?

Name: Monica
Lines: All right!

Name: Ross
Lines: Well, what about me?! Im a medical marvel!!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh yeah.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ahhhh.

Name: Joey
Lines: Ahhh  Eh?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Uh-huh.

Lines: Hey guys!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: Monica
Lines: Do you guys know what happened to Chandlers barca lounger?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh yeah, Joey broke it. Had to get rid of it.

Name: Monica
Lines: Are you kidding?! I get a Porsche and the barca loungers gone?! This is the best day ever!

Ill need a year and a half to plan the wedding, and Id like to know the guy for a year, year and a half before we get engaged Which means I need to meet the guy by the time Im thirty.

Name: {Transcribers Note
Lines: She puts the key into the ignition, which is on the left side of the steering wheel. Does anyone know why that is? Its a tradition left over from Porsches racing history. The worlds greatest endurance race is the 24 Hours of LeMans. Which is in France and runs for 24 hours straight from noon on Saturday through the dark of night and finishes at noon on Sunday. In the 60s LeMans had a unique start where the drivers would actually start the race outside of the car and across the track. At the start of the race, the drivers would run across the track, get in the car, buckle up, start the car, and drive off. Porsche wanted to reduce the amount of time that took. Since all cars to that point had the ignition switches on the right side of the steering wheel, that required the drivers to use their right hand to grab the seat-belts, put the car in gear and start it. The drivers left hand did nothing. Porsche in order to save a few seconds in a 24-hour race; moved the ignition switches to the left side of the steering wheel so that the driver could start the car with his left hand while grabbing the seat-belts with his right hand. Thats why every Porsche car built since then has the ignition on the left side of the steering wheel.}

Lines: Uh-huh. Uh-huh. Umm, could-could I get a copy of that? Cause Carol threw it out, she lost ours. Shes such a scatterbrain, but man what a hot piece of ass.

Lines: Uh-huh.

Lines: Im told there are two sides to this story, but all Ive heard is that Bens a bit of a poo-poo head.

Name: Phoebe

Lines: Concert. Yeah. That does put us inquite a pickle. Because you see Im very busy before and after the concert, and hes obviously busy during.

Lines: So, I guess you and I should talk about Jack and Ben right now.

Lines: Okay.

Lines: Joey, just because theyre not getting married doesnt mean this is going to be a disaster. Maybe they have a plan!

Lines: Hey, now wait a minute! I get when you told people at first that you wanted to be an actor they laughed at you! Now come on Bobby, why dont you tell us a little bit about your band?

Name: Joey
Lines: So whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa! What are you gonna do? Youre gonna have the baby and-and raise it by yourselfwithout a husband?! You cant be a single mother alone! Youre gonna ruin your life!

Lines: Oh excuse me! Am I ruining my life?

Lines: No! No! No! Its different for you. Youre so strong and together. Youre not some dumb kid who doesnt know what shes doing.

Lines: One pregnant woman at a time, please! I just want you to be okay.

Lines: Look, Rachels told me how much easier youve made all this on her. Why cant you do that for me?

Name: Joey
Lines: Because! Cause Cause youre my baby sister!

Name: Dina
Lines: And youre my big brother! I mean, youre my favorite guy in the whole world. Im not even scared to tell mom and dad. I was scared of telling you.

Lines: Well Id be scared of them, but all right.

Name: Dina
Lines: Joey, I cant stand the thought of having this baby with you mad at me. I want him to have his uncle. Is my baby gonna have his Uncle Joey?

Name: Joey
Lines: Of course hes gonna have his Uncle Joey!

Name: Dina
Lines: Were gonna be all right. I mean, even if were not married this baby is gonna be so loved. Not just by us.

Name: Joey
Lines: Thats right! By his uncle too!

Name: Bobby
Lines: And by you.

Lines: Okay Bobby, why dont we just come over here and let them have a little moment.

Name: Joey
Lines: Come here!

Name: Rachel
Lines: No! Seriously! Whats wrong with you?!
