Lines: Youre gonna love me so much. I got Sting tickets!!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh my God! I do love you! How did you do it?!

Name: Ross
Lines: Welllets just say  Rosss caaaaan!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oo, where are the seats?

Name: Ross
Lines: Uh, middle balcony.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, now would you say that thats more than 50 yards away from Sting, his wife, or a member of his family?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Then thats not breaking the law! Im there!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Phoebe?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Look at that guy by the window, wow!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hes awfully short and I think hes talking to himself. And to  be completely honest, hes not that good in bed.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, what is wrong with me lately? I mean its like every guy I  seeI mean look here.  Look at that guy for example, I mean  normally thats not someone I would-would be attracted to, but right now, with the  way Im feeling, all I want to do is rip off his sweatpants and fanny pack.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Wait a second! This is about the fourth month of your pregnancy, right?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: This is completely normal, around the fourth month your hormones start  going crazy.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Really?! So this has happened to you?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh absolutely yeah! Oh and keep in mind, now, I was carrying triplets so  in, yknow, medical terms I was-I was thrice as randy.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Wow! This explains so much! Last weekend, I went from store to store  sitting on Santas lap.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah. Yeah, I remember trying to steal a cardboard cutout of Evander  Holyfield from a Foot Locker.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ah.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, yknow what? I go see my doctor tomorrow, Ill ask her  about this. Maybe she can give me a pill or something.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah. Yeah, thats what you need a goodpill.

Lines: Hey!  Hey!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hi!

Lines: Hi! Look! I got our pictures developed from Rockefeller Center.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh great! Hey-hey Joey, do you want to check out pictures of me and Mona  ice skating?

Lines: Oh uh, ordinarily I would love too, but I am just swamped right now.

Lines: Hey where-where are the pictures that creepy pretzel vendor took of us  together?

Lines: Oh yeah, probably at the end.  Oh my God! He only took  pictures of my breasts!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yknow she has a face Ross!

Name: Mona
Lines: Okay. Okay, heres a good one of us.

Lines: Wow! That is a good one! Wow, it looks like a, like a holiday card  yknow, with the tree in the middle and the skaters and the snow.

Name: Mona
Lines: Yknow, every year I say Im gonna send out holiday cards and I  never do it. Do you wanna, do you wanna send this one out together?

Name: Ross
Lines: Together? Like-like to people?

Name: Mona
Lines: Yeah, yknow. Happy holidays from Mona and Ross. Itll be cute,  okay?

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay.

Lines: Oh, I gotta get to work. So call me later?

Lines: Uh sure, sure.

Name: Mona
Lines: Bye guys.

Lines: Bye.

Lines: Congratulations! You just got married!

Name: Ross
Lines: I know. Can you believe that?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Wait, Im-Im sorry. Whats the big deal about a holiday  card?

Name: Ross
Lines: Married couples send out cards, families send out cards, people who have  been dating for a couple of months do not send out cards! What-what is she crazy?!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey-hey-hey, hey thats your wife youre talking about!

Lines: Bing! Ho! And the Bing-ette!

Lines: Honey, you remember my boss Doug right?

Lines: Hi. So good news, the divorce is final. I signed the papers this A.M.

Lines: I didnt know you and Carol were getting divorced, Im  sorry.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Monica says that her Maitre D. is the funniest guy she's ever met.

Name: Joey
Lines: Seriously? She actually said that?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yes! Am I crazy to be this upset?

Name: Joey
Lines: Nooooo! Being funny is your thing!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah!

Name: Joey
Lines: Without that, you just got "lame with women".

Name: Monica
Lines: Hi! There you are.

Name: David
Lines: Wow, you look even... more beautiful than you did yesterday.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oof...

Name: David
Lines: In fact, ehm... I going to kiss you now.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, wait, wait!

Name: David
Lines: Yeah, I-I don't, I can't get away with stuff like that. I-I-It sounded sexy in my head, so I...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, no, it's not that.  Uhm... Remember when you asked me if I was seeing someone and I said no? Well, uhm... I am. His ... his name is Mike.

Name: David
Lines: Oh... oh...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I should have told you.

Name: David
Lines: No... well, yeah.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I'm sorry, I'm sorry.

Name: David
Lines: Well, i-it's okay. I-I-I understand... Well, s... well, are you happy with this guy?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I am happy.

Name: David
Lines: Damn it! I-I'm sorry. I-I don't mean that. I-I want you to be happy... But only with me. No, uhm... that's not fair. Uh, who cares, leave him!. Oh, I don't mean that. Yes I do... I'm sorry Uhm, I... I think I should probably uhm... go...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well... but David, just... I just want you to know that... that... you know... telling you this... is one of the hardest things I've ever had to do.

Name: David
Lines: Well... just so you know... hearing it wasn't exactly a Vladnik carnival either... Can we at least hug goodbye?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Of course, yeah. You know, a kiss on the cheek wouldn't be totally inappropriate...

Name: David
Lines: No... no...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I mean...

Name: David
Lines: In Minsk...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah?

Name: David
Lines: ...it's uhm... i-it's two on each cheek and uhm... and one on the lips.

Name: Ross
Lines: Is everything allright?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh yeah, it's fine, it's fine. Sandy was just... was just telling me about how he proposed to his fiance and it was just sooo beautiful.

Name: Sandy
Lines: Well, her favourite flower is the camellia. From the poem...

Name: Rachel
Lines: I can't... I can't hear it again.

Name: Sandy
Lines: You know, I can't tell it again...

Name: Ross
Lines: And I'm fine never having heard it...  Rach, can I... can I see you for a sec?

Name: Ross
Lines: Do you realise that man has cried in our apartment three times...? Huh? I haven't cried that many times since I moved in.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Look, Ross, he's just... Sandy is just sensitive, that's all.

Name: Rachel
Lines: What...? Too sensitive to take care of our baby?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Sandy made Madeleines.

Name: Ross
Lines: This... this is exactly what I'm talking about. What kind of a guy makes... makes... delicate French cookies, huh? They're not even... butch, manly cookies with... with... you know with... with chunks.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, I... you know, I-I-I don't know what to say... I mean, I never thought of you as a guy who needed his men to be men. You know, 'cause I gotta tell you Ross, it not like you just came in from branding cattle.

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey... there's sensitive... and there is too sensitive.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay, what? What is too sensitive?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hmmm... No, no... No, I can't do this. It's bad.

Name: David
Lines: But... I-I-It's nice... A-a-and... nice is good. A-a-and good is not bad, ergo, w-w-we should keep kissing.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, no. No.

Name: David
Lines: But... ergo...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Look David, if... if you had never left, then... yeah, we'd probably still be together right now, but... you did leave, and I-I'm with Mike and I really care about him...

Name: David
Lines: Uhm... uhm... Goodbye... Uh... Schto ya ztez vigul... ui...

Name: Mike
Lines: Well... hey, the key works...!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: And you thanks for the face massage. Thank you.

Name: Ross
Lines: Did Rachel tell you we hired a male nanny?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah! I think that's great!

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh really? Did she tell you he plays the recorder, recites poetry and bakes Madeleines?

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh... How are they?

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey...! Rachel and I hired a male nanny.

Name: Joey
Lines: Really...? Guys do that...? That's... weird...

Name: Ross
Lines: Thank you!

Name: Joey
Lines: That's like a woman wanting to be a...

Name: Ross
Lines: ...a what? A what? What's the end of that sentence?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yes... What is the end of that sentence?

Name: Joey
Lines: Uhm... A penis model.  Anyway, hey... Did you tell Chandler that some guy from work is the funniest guy you've ever met?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, so?

Name: Ross
Lines: Wow!

Name: Joey
Lines: Really? Do you not know Chandler?

Name: Monica
Lines: Is that why he's acting so weird...? He's jealous...? Oh my God, that is crazy. It's not like I'm attracted to Geoffrey...

Name: Joey
Lines: So what? Being funny is Chandler's thing... You know, like Ross's thing is...

Name: Ross
Lines: Science...? Academia...? Being a good father...?

Name: Monica
Lines: I can't believe he's that upset about this...

Name: Joey
Lines: Monica, you have to do some damage control here, okay. 'Cause he's feeling like...

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: Joey
Lines: Heeeyy! Hey!

Name: Chandler
Lines: What are you guys talking about?

Name: Ross
Lines: Uhm... Rachel and I hired a male nanny.

Name: Chandler
Lines: You got a man who's a nanny...? You got a manny...?

Name: Chandler
Lines: You know, I don't mind a... male nanny, but I do draw the line at a male wetnurse.

Name: Monica
Lines: Ohhh, ooohhh... you are on a roll, mister!

Name: Chandler
Lines: If I'd known you guys were coming over, I would have brought more pizza.

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay, okay... Chandler you... you stop it!

Name: Chandler
Lines: What is so funny about that?

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, I don't know... I-It's... just the way you say it... I mean, you're funny... You have that funny thing. You're a funny guy!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Did you tell her what we talked about?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah....

Name: Chandler
Lines: So those were pity laughs? PITY LAUGHS?

Name: Monica
Lines: Honey, listen... You have nothing to worry about with Geoffrey.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh yeah? Is he funnier than me?

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, you're... you're different funny... I mean, you're... you're more sarcastic a-a-and... well, he does... bits... and impressions... and... and limericks...

Name: Chandler
Lines: I do limericks... uhm... There once was a man named Chandler, whose wife made him die inside.

Name: Monica
Lines: Honey, you know I think you're hilarious! Come on, you know that joke you told me last week? The one about Jerry Lewis and the girl with the lazy eye...?  That slayed me.

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey... I made up that joke and told it to you!

Name: Joey
Lines: Not knowing when to shut up...

Name: Ross
Lines: Yep! That's my thing...

Name: Mike
Lines: So... how many guys have your key?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, no, no, no, no... It's not... it's not... i'ts not as bad as it looks... really. I was just saying goodbye to an old friend.

Name: Mike
Lines: Your lipstick's on his mouth.

Name: David
Lines: Oh, uh... we just uh... happen to wear the same shade.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, uhm... David and I did use to go out... but years ago, and he lives in Minsk. He's only... he's only in town for a couple of days.

Name: Mike
Lines: Did you uhm...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, no...

Name: Mike
Lines: ...kiss him?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, well, yeah...

Name: David
Lines: Yes, but uhm... You should know... she really likes you. I-In fact I-I-I don't think you realise j-just how lucky you are fella.

Name: Mike
Lines: Don't point your finger at me.

Name: David
Lines: Why? Wh-What are you going to do about it?

Name: Mike
Lines: Well... I'll... just show you what I'm gonna do about it...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Stop it! Stop it, before someone gets really hurt!  Here David, you should just go.

Name: David
Lines: Allright... But... if I ever do come back from Minsk...  well, you just better watch out.

Name: Mike
Lines: Well, if I ever goto Minsk, you'd better watch out.

Name: David
Lines: Oh, you're going to Minsk?

Name: Mike
Lines: Well, I might.

Name: David
Lines: Really? Well, if you do, come in the spring. It's just lovely there.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, well... guys?

Name: David
Lines: Right... Goodbye Phoebe.

Name: Mike
Lines: Hey, what are you kidding me?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I'm sorry, I'm so sorry. If you... If you want your key back, I totally understand.

Name: Mike
Lines: It's never gonna happen again right?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Right! Never! Never! I swear!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah! Allright! Hey, hey Ross. Check it out! Sandy taught me Hot-cross Buns.

Name: Ross
Lines: Really? Sounded like Three Blind Mice.

Name: Joey
Lines: Noooo... Three Blind Mice goes like this...

Name: Sandy
Lines: Who's up for puppets?

Name: Joey
Lines: Me! I'm up for puppets!

Name: Sandy
Lines: Well, please welcome... The Snufflebumps... Who wants to be mr. Wigglemunch and who's gonna be the Grumpus?

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay, okay... How exactly is a two month old supposed to appreciate puppets?

Name: Sandy
Lines: Actually studies have shown that the movement and colours help their cerebral development... The whimsical characters are just for us.

Name: Joey
Lines: I wanna be mr. Wigglemunch.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: Sandy
Lines: Well, I guess we know who's gonna be the Grumpus...

Name: Rachel
Lines: That was kind of rude!

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, I'm sorry. Please apologise to Sandy and the Snufflebumps for me.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You know, he was just doing his job...

Name: Ross
Lines: Well, you know what... I-I'm sorry I'm the only one who isn't in love with Gary Poppins out there... But I just... I can't... I can't go through with this.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, come on Ross...

Name: Ross
Lines: No! Hey, you know what? I'm sorry. I would never force you... to hire someone you were this uncomfortable with...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh... That's true.

Name: Ross
Lines: Thank you!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, you're the one who wants to fire him, so you're gonna have to do it.

Name: Sandy
Lines: So you see Wigglemunch, that's why it's important to shaaaaaaare...

Name: Joey
Lines: I am learning so much from you.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, I'm off to Tulsa, so if your Maitre D. friend has any funny Oklahoma jokes, tell him to e-mail me at www.hahanotsomuch.com.

Name: Monica
Lines: Honey, you can relax. Last night at work, Geoffrey told this really sexist joke. After that, not so funny anymore.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Really...? See... that's the thing: you gotta keep it smart, people!

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay, don't miss that flight. You know I love you.

Name: Joey
Lines: Allright. See you later!

Name: Chandler
Lines: See ya!

Name: Joey
Lines: Did that guy really make that joke?

Name: Monica
Lines: Naaaa... He still kills me. Last night he had me laughing so hard, I swear... a little pee came out.

Name: Ross
Lines: Here goes...

Name: Rachel
Lines: I can't watch. It's like firing Elmo.

Name: Ross
Lines: Sandy... Hi, we uhm... we kinda need to talk. I'm afraid it's not working out.

Name: Sandy
Lines: Oh...

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, uhm... I mean, Rachel and I, think you are great... with Emma... uhm... We just feel...

Name: Rachel
Lines: YOU! You feel!

Name: Ross
Lines: I... just feel that the... the chemistry isn't right. I'm sorry. We're... we're more than happy to give you good recommendation...

Name: Sandy
Lines: Oh, no, no, no... That's okay. I got a lot of offers from other families. I just picked you guys because... I liked you the best.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, damn you Geller!

Name: Ross
Lines: Anyway, uhm...Well, I'm glad there's no hard feelings.

Name: Sandy
Lines: No, none at all. You need to be happy with whoever is in your home... Although if you don't mind telling me, what was your problem? Maybe it's something I can work on in the future.

Name: Ross
Lines: No, you know, it's uhm... nothing you did, it's... it's uhm... my issue.

Name: Ross
Lines: You know, I'm just not uhm... that comfortable with a guy who's as sensitive as you.

Name: Sandy
Lines: That's fair... Although, can I ask... why do you think that is?

Name: Ross
Lines: Why... I... I don't know.  Uhm... errrr... maybe... maybe because of my father?

Name: Sandy
Lines: hmmm...

Name: Ross
Lines: I mean, uhm... you know when I was growing up he was kind of a tough guy... You know a-a-and as a kid I wasn't the athlete I am now.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Huh ha ha!

Name: Ross
Lines: I play squash...! Anyway, uhm... I uhm... I always get the feeling he thought I was too sensitive.

Name: Sandy
Lines: That must have been hard.

Name: Ross
Lines: It was hard... I remember... I was in my bedroom... playing with my dinosaurs... playing and learning... and my father walks in and says... he says... "What are you doing with those things? What's wrong with you, why aren't you... why aren't you outside playing like a... like a real boy?

Name: Sandy
Lines: But you are a real boy!

Name: Ross
Lines: I know I am!  ...And when it's summer, and it's hot, why can't you wear a tank top?

Name: Sandy
Lines: It's allright! Crying is good. It lets the boo-hoos out.

Name: Ross
Lines: Here come some more...

Name: Sandy/Grumpus
Lines: And what's the one kind of boat that can never, ever sink?

Name: Joey/Wigglemunch
Lines: What kind?

Name: Sandy/Grumpus
Lines: A friend-ship...

Name: Joey
Lines: Wow! You blow my mind...

Name: Sandy
Lines: Oh, I gotta go.

Name: Joey
Lines: Aaahh... How much do I owe you?

Name: Sandy
Lines: Twenty bucks.

Name: Joey
Lines: It's like the cheapest college ever.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hi!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey... hey listen... What do you guys know about investments?

Name: Chandler
Lines: How come?

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, I'm starting to make good money on the show and I'm thinking... I should probably do something with it.

Name: Monica
Lines: What do you do with your money now?

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, I just tape it to the back of my toilet tank.  I didn't say that! It's in a bank guarded by robots!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Do you have any ideas?

Name: Joey
Lines: Uh, yeah... This guy at work got me excited about going in on an emu farm. That'd be kinda cool huh? Pitchin' in on the weekends, helping to plant the emus...

Name: Monica
Lines: Joe... Emus are birds. You raise them for meat.

Name: Monica
Lines: Joey, I think you should consider something a little less risky. I mean, I think in this market, real estate is your best investment.The Fed. just lowered the rates and the interest on your mortgage is totally deductible.  That's right, I know some stuff!

Name: Joey
Lines: Real estate, huh? Hmmm...

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, and you know who's selling a great apartment? Richard!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, and you know whose knowledge of her ex-boyfriend is shocking? Monica!

Name: Monica
Lines: My dad told me. They play golf together.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, well... Maybe I'll join them some time. I just hope the club doesn't slip out of my hand and beat the moustache off his face.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hi!

Name: Rachel and Monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Listen! You have to help me pick a dress 'cause I'm meeting Mike's parents tonight!

Name: Monica
Lines: Wow, the boyfriend's parents! That's a big step.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Really? That hadn't occurred to me.

Name: Monica
Lines: They just gonna love you, just be yourself.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: They live on the upper east side on Park Avenue!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh yeah, she can't be herself.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, so... allright... Which dress?  You can say "neither".

Name: Rachel and Monica
Lines: Oh God, neither!

Name: Monica
Lines: I'm sorry honey, but we're gonna take you shopping. It's gonna be fine.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, totally! You are in such good hands. And I'm so good with meeting parents. With the father, you know, you want to flirt a little bit, but not in a gross way. Just kind of like: "Oh mr. Pincer, I can see where Wallis gets his good looks..."

Name: Monica
Lines: You went out with Wallis Pincer?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Uh, he took the SAT's for me.

Name: Monica
Lines: I knew you didn't get a 1400!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ssshyeah, well, duh! I mean...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So... now... What about with Mike's mom?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, with the mother, just... just constantly tell her how amazing her son is. Take it from me, moms love me. Ross's mom one time actually said I'm like the daughter that she never had.

Name: Monica
Lines: She said WHAT?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi.

Name: Ross
Lines: Hi.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I just finished getting Phoebe all dressed to meet Mike's parents. She's so nervous, it's so sweet!

Name: Ross
Lines: Guess what? I made Emma laugh today.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You WHAT? And I missed it? Because I was giving a makeover to that stupid hippie?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, and it was uhm... it was like a real little person laugh too. It was... it was like uhm...  Only... only not creepy.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well... well, what did you do to make her laugh?

Name: Rachel
Lines: You WHAT? You sang... to our baby daughter... a song about a guy who likes to have sex with women with giant asses?

Name: Ross
Lines: But you know what, if you think about it, it actually promotes a healthy uhm... body image... because... even big butts or uhm... juicy doubles.

Name: Rachel
Lines: owwwww...

Name: Ross
Lines: Please don't take her away from me!

Name: Catherine
Lines: Oh hi, come on in. I'm Catherine, the listing agent.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hi I'm Joey. This is Chandler.

Name: Chandler
Lines: So how come Richard's selling the place? Went bankrupt? Medical malpractice? Choked on his own moustache?

Name: Catherine
Lines: Actually, he is buying a much bigger place. It's got a great view of Central Pa.....

Name: Chandler
Lines: mmm That's enough about you!

Name: Joey
Lines: Is there anything we should know about the apartment?

Name: Catherine
Lines: All the appliances are included. There is a lot of light, a new kitchen... I think you guys would be very happy here...

Name: Chandler
Lines: No, no, no, no, no, NO! No, no... we're not together. We're not a couple. We're definately not a couple.

Name: Catherine
Lines: Oh... Okay, sorry!

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, you seem pretty insulted by that. What? I'm not good enough for you?

Name: Joey
Lines: You know what it is? It's a nice place but I gotta see I don't know if I see myself living here. Oh, oh, oh, let me see...  Yeah, I could see it.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Look at these videos. You know, I mean, who does he think he is? Magnum Force, Dirty Harry, Cool Hand Luke... Oh my God!

Name: Joey
Lines: What?

Name: Chandler
Lines: There's a tape here with Monica's name on it.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Get there faster!

Name: Mike
Lines: Wow! You look like... like my mom.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I'm wearing pantyhose!

Name: Mike
Lines: Great! Come on in!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, thank you! Oh... Oh my God, you're RICH!

Name: Mike
Lines: No, my parents are rich.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, so... They gotta die someday.  HELLO!

Name: Mike
Lines: Mom, dad, this is Phoebe. Phoebe, these are my parents: Theodore and Bitsy.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Theodore... Bitsy... What a delight!

Name: Bitsy
Lines: It's so nice to finally meet you!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: And you... Your home is lovely.

Name: Bitsy
Lines: Well thank you, I'll give you a tour later. It's actually three floors.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Holy crap!

Name: Bitsy
Lines: Phoebe, why don't you come in the living room and meet our friends?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, try and stop me!

Name: Mike
Lines: Hey... Wh... What are you doing?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I'm trying to get your parents to like me.

Name: Mike
Lines: Yeah, I'm sure they will, but you don't have to do this... I'm wanting them to get to know Phoebe, not  Phoebe...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Got it! It... It's hard to stop...

Name: Mike
Lines: Well, come on...

Name: Theodore
Lines: Phoebe, these are our friends, Tom and Sue Angle.

Name: Bitsy
Lines: Phoebe, come sit. Tell us a little bit about yourself... So where are you from?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: God! God! This is not going well.

Name: Mike
Lines: No, no, no, you're doing fine, really... Why don't you go talk to my dad?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, okay, okay, okay... Still sure about me being myself?

Name: Mike
Lines: Absolutely! Or maybe just a little less pimp spit.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So Theodore... I uhm... I can see where Mike gets his good looks from...

Name: Theodore
Lines: Oh... Well...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah... And that physique! You must work out all the time...

Name: Theodore
Lines: Oh no, not all the time... I do the best I can...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah I bet! Look out!

Name: Theodore
Lines: OH! OWWWWW!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh my God, are you okay?

Name: Theodore
Lines: I recently had surgery.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I'm so sorry!

Name: Theodore
Lines: No, I'll be fine... I just should check the stitches...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I really, really am sorry.

Name: Theodore
Lines: How could you know. Why wouldn't you punch me in the stomach?

Name: Mike
Lines: Uhm... Did you just hit my dad?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yes... I'm sorry, I've never met a boyfriends parents before...

Name: Mike
Lines: But, I mean, you have met... humans before, right? Look, why don't you go talk to my mom?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah okay... yeah, your mom... okay... She looks nice, I can talk to her.

Name: Mike
Lines: Yeah, you do that, and I go check my dad for signs of internal bleeding.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah... Oh Bitsy, hi. Uhm... listen I just wanted to thank you again for having me here tonight.

Name: Bitsy
Lines: Well, not at all...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Also uhm... I just want you to know what a wonderful man your son is.

Name: Bitsy
Lines: Thank you, I think so too.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, and you know, it really is a testament to how he was raised. Especially to you. Because he's very respectful of women.

Name: Bitsy
Lines: Is he really?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Are you kidding. He is so considerate of my feelings and... you know I think... you'd also like to know that he is a very gentle lover.

Name: Bitsy
Lines: E-e-excuse me?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh no, no, no, no, no, no. Don't get me wrong. No, he's not in like a sissy way. No, no, no... when he gets going, he can rattle a headboard like a sailor on leave...

Name: Bitsy
Lines: That's... my boy.

Name: Mike
Lines: Awesome!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey dude, what's up?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Don't judge me, I'm only human!

Name: Joey
Lines: Did you take that tape?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I had to! Okay, imagine you were married... and you found a tape of your wife in another guys' apartment... Wouldn't you need to know what was on it?

Name: Joey
Lines: I don't know. Who'm I'm married to?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Some girl...!?

Name: Joey
Lines: She hot?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah...!?

Name: Joey
Lines: How did she get me to settle down?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Allright, I'm gonna watch it... I mean look, it's probably not even what I think it is... And even if it is... It can't possibly be as bad as what I'm picturing in my head...  Can it?

Name: Joey
Lines: Guess I don't know. My experience: if a girl says yes to being taped... She doesn't say no to much else, I tell ya...

Name: Chandler
Lines: Then you're gonna have to watch it for me.

Name: Joey
Lines: What? Whoo... What?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Just for a few seconds, so I can know what it is... Please?

Name: Joey
Lines: All right, fine... But if I enjoy this, you have only yourself to blame...

Name: Chandler
Lines: Why am I hearing cheering?

Name: Joey
Lines: Well it's okay, its like... its just a football game.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Football? Just football?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, see... you were all worried for nothing.

Name: Joey
Lines: You don't wanna see what I just saw!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh you missed it. She was laughing. Oh it was amazing. It was amazing. It was the most beautiful, beautiful sound that...

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh I know, isn't it? Ooh... what'd you do to get her to laugh?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh! You know, I just... couple of things I tried ... I just sang a little doo... Itsy Bitsy Spider...

Name: Ross
Lines: You sang Baby Got Back didn't you?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Nothing else worked. That girl is all about the ass...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: ...and then it goes back to the chorus... Smelly cat, Sme-lly ca-t / I-t's not your fau-lt. And that's the end of the song... I realise that you didn't ask to hear it, but uhm... no-one had spoken in seventeen minutes.

Name: Mike
Lines: Phoebe writes lots of great songs. Wha... What was that one you sang the other night that everybody just loved?

Name: Phoebe

Now those plates may not be as nice as the pretty pink ones   I picked out, but they're very important to Monica. I want you to apologize   to her right now.

Lines: I'm sorry.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Mon, I'm so sorry.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay. Thats better. Now I want you to both apologize   to each other and mean it.

Name: Amy and Rachel at same time
Lines: Sorry.

Name: Chandler
Lines: By the way, that fight was totally arousing.

Name: Ross
Lines: Dude. Well done. You know what? If I die, and Rachel   dies and Monica dies then you can totally take care of Emma.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh yeah? Well thanks.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, but you should know he eats five times a   day and shoves pennies up his nose.

Lines: Are you okay Mon?

Name: Monica
Lines: uh huh.. I mean these things happen. Its' just a   plate. Its not like somebody died.

Lines: It's all right. You can mourn.

Name: Monica starts crying
Lines: Thank you. It was so beautiful. <gets up and walks   towards the front door> I'm going to go to Joeys and get the pies.

Lines: Actually its not pies, its just pie.

Name: Monica
Lines: I don't care. <pauses and realizes...> Oh my   god. I've lost the will to scold.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Look Amy, it got a little of control..Um.. and I'm   sorry. You're my sister and uh.. if it really means that much to you..

Name: Amy
Lines: So you're going to give me the baby?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Uh. No.. I was going to let you use my Ralph Lauren   discount.

Name: Amy starting to cry
Lines: You are not going to regret this.

Name: Rachel
Lines: She needs changing.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh no no no.. I'll get her. I'm super-compentent   and totally responsibile and fourth in line to raise Emma. I'll be right there   Emma. Just let me get my trusty diaper bag here. <knocks over the box of   china> Well.. what do you know? I guess, I'll be the one who dies first.

Lines: Hey, does Monica know about her broken plates yet?

Lines: Nope...  Hey... so I'm gonna...   put the plates back. You know, I think you were right, I don't think we should   use these plates again for a looong time.

Lines: This kitty is Mittens and this one is Fitzhugh, and this little guy in the cat condo is Jinkies.

Lines: Hi

And maybe we start eating out of Joey's   refrigerator for a change. You're chef... what can you make out of backing   soda and beer?

Lines: Thanks... uh... I'm so sorry about Ross, it's...

Name: Chandler
Lines: At least he died doing what he loved... watching blimps

Name: Ross
Lines: Who is he?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Some guy, Tom Gordon.

Name: Ross
Lines: I don't remember him, but then again I touched so many lives.

Name: Monica
Lines: So, did you know Ross well?

Name: Tom
Lines: Oh, actually I barely knew him. Yeah, I came because I heard Chandler's news. D'you know if he's seeing anyone?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yes, he is. Me.

Name: Tom
Lines: What? You... You... Oh! Can I ask you a personal question? Ho-how do you shave your beard so close?

Name: Tom
Lines: Hey, listen. Call me.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ok!

Name: Ross
Lines: I'm dead and no one cares?

Name: Monica
Lines: I look like a man??

Name: Chandler
Lines: Please, one ridiculous problem at a time!

Name: Ross
Lines: It isn't ridiculous, look around! No one's here!

Name: Chandler
Lines: You gave them one day's notice, not everyone in our class checks the web site everyday and Monica... it's probably the way you stand!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yes, you're right. Still somebody must have seen it... I mean, I went to that school for 4 years, I didn't have an impact on anyone?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, that's not true. You had an impact on me, I mean, it's 15 years later and we're still best friends. Doesn't that count for something?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah...

Name: Chandler
Lines: I'm sure it's somebody for you. Now, go hide.

Name: Kori
Lines: Hi. I'm here for Ross Geller's memorial service.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Kori? Kori Weston?

Name: Kori
Lines: Yeah...

Name: Chandler
Lines: Wow! You look amazing!

Name: Kori
Lines: And you are...

Name: Chandler
Lines: Chandler, Chandler Bing. I'm not gay, I'm not gay at all.

Name: Monica
Lines: You are married though.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Don't listen to him, he's in a really bad mood!

Name: Kori
Lines: I can't believe that Ross is gone. It is just so sad.

Name: Chandler
Lines: I didn't know Ross and you were so close.

Name: Kori
Lines: We weren't but we had one class together. He was such a great guy and he talked so passionately about science. I always remembered him.

Name: Chandler
Lines: I'm sure that would mean a lot to him. And if heaven has a door, I'm sure he's pressing his ear up against it and listening intently.

Name: Kori
Lines: I thought so many times about calling him and asking him out. I guess I really missed my chance.

Name: Ross
Lines: But you didn't! I'm still alive!! Kori, I know this is a big surprise for you. It's a long story but the things you just said really made my day! I mean, the fact that you are here means more to me than if this room were filled with people!

Name: Kori
Lines: You sick freak, who does that? I can't believe I had a crush on you!

Name: Ross
Lines: Did you hear that? Kori Weston had a crush on me!!

Name: Teleplay
Lines: Sherry Bilsing - Graham & Ellen Plummer Story: Brian Buckner & Sebastian Jones Directed by: Gary Halvorson Transcribed by: Eleonora, Pheeboh, Roni & Vanessa

Name: Joey
Lines: Monica, hey, can I borrow the Porsche?

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok.

Name: Joey
Lines: Alright!

Name: Monica
Lines: But ehm...what is it not?

Name: Joey
Lines: A place to entertain my lady friends.

Name: Monica
Lines: And what else is it not?

Name: Joey
Lines: A place to eat spaghetti.

Name: Monica
Lines: Very good!  What do you need it for anyway?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh well, the powerball lottery is upto 300 million and they don't sell tickets here in New York, so...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh! So you're driving up to Connecticut?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah Connecticut...Not West Virginia.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey, maybe I'll drive you up there! I'd like to buy some tickets myself!

Name: Joey
Lines: Uh!

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah with Chandler not getting paid, we could really use 300 million dollars.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah, because if I was at my old job we'd say 300 million? No thank you!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey will you get me tickets too?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah me too. oh! I have an idea. Why don't we all pitch in 50 bucks, we'll pool our money together and then if we win, we'll split it!

Name: Everyone almost simultaneously except Ross
Lines: yeah thats a great idea!

Name: Ross
Lines: No thanks!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: You don't wanna win the lottery?

Name: Ross
Lines: Uh...sure I do, and I also wanna be King of my own country and find out what happened to Amelia Earhart.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Still on Amelia Earhart?

Name: Ross
Lines: The woman just vanished!

Name: Joey
Lines: Seriously, Ross, you don't want in on this?

Name: Ross
Lines: No! Do you know what your odds are of winning the lottery? I...I mean you have a better chance of being struck by lightning 42 times.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yes but there's six of us so we'd only have to get struck by lightning 7 times.

Name: Joey
Lines: I like those odds!

Name: Ross
Lines: Seriously you guys, I can't believe you're going to spend 250 dollars on the lottery, I mean that's such a bunch of boohaki.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh oh, we think Emma is about to start talking so we're trying to be careful about what words we use in front of her.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah so get ready to hear alot of ehm...boohaki, goshdarnit and brotherpucker.

Name: Monica
Lines: How do you know she's gonna start talking?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well when I talk to her I almost feel like she understands what I'm saying.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Kinda like Joey.

Name: Joey
Lines: What's that now?

Name: Monica
Lines: God! Look at all these tickets! It's so exciting! You know I haven't won anything since the sixth grade.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Pie eating contest?

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh! You assume because I was heavy that's the only way I could win something?

Name: Chandler
Lines: No, I saw a picture of you covered in blueberries.

Name: Monica
Lines: That was a good day!

Name: Ross
Lines: They're towing your car, they're towing your car!!

Name: Monica
Lines: I'm parked in a garage on Morton!

Name: Ross
Lines: They're towing a car. And I am seeing...spots.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Joey relax! My mother picked her up two hours ago. You were there!

Name: Joey
Lines: I was?

Name: Racel
Lines: Yes and you talked to her...

Name: Joey
Lines: I did?

Name: Rachel
Lines: She dropped off a casserole?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh yeah! The casserole lady.

Name: Monica
Lines: So, did you come by to watch us win the big bucks?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, uh... and then I figured after you win, we could all go out to the balcony and see a night rainbow with gremlins dancing on top of it!

Name: Ross
Lines: Think he washed his hands?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hello? Hey Charlie, what do you know?

Name: Rachel
Lines: What's going on?

Name: Monica
Lines: Chandler is supposed to find out if he's getting an assistent job at his ad agency. But out of the 15 interns, they are only hiring three.

Name: Joey
Lines: Ooh! Tough odds!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah if only it were a sure thing like your 24 state lottery!

Name: Joey
Lines: Look who's coming around!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Damnit. Alright call me when you know more.

Name: Joey
Lines: Did you get it?

Name: Chandler
Lines: One of the slots got filled.

Name: Joey
Lines: By you!?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Sense the tone! No that kid Nate got it.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh! I hate that guy! I mean come on kid! Pull up your pants!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah I know.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, there's two spots left right?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah...I mean I want this so much! I mean, I wanna get one, I want my friend Charlie to get one...Except I don't care about Charlie.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey you guys! Ok, you're not going to believe this! I just saw my psychic and she said I was definitely gonna win the lottery tonight!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey that reminds me, I thought we could use some extra luck so I brought a wishbone home from work.

Name: Ross
Lines: A psychic AND a wishbone? Guys! Give someone else a chance!

Name: Monica
Lines: Alright, who wants to do it?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh can I? Vegetarians never get to do the wishbone. It's really not fair either! You know, just because we don't eat the meat doesn't mean we don't like to play with the carcasses!

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok, hey Rach?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh no, I'm good, I don't wanna get that turkey smell all over my hands.

Name: Joey
Lines: I'll do it!! It'll get the casserole stink off of mine.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I hope I win!

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, it doesn't really matter ... you're both wishing for the same thing, right?

Name: Joey
Lines: I can't tell you what I'm wishing for! Else...you know...won't come true!

Name: Monica
Lines: Right! .. but we "know" what you're wishing for!

Name: Joey
Lines: Can't really say!

Name: Monica
Lines: I understand, but you're wishing for what we think you're wishing for, aren't you?

Name: Joey
Lines: I'm not really comfortable with these questions!

Name: Rachel, Chandler and Monica
Lines: Please, just do it!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: One, two, three!

Name: Joey
Lines: I won, hey!

Name: Ross
Lines: You know what, I'm sure your wish is gonna come true, but, you guys - just in case, maybe a genie will come out if we rub this lamp!  Ah!! That thing gets hot!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: You know, Ross, just keep making your jokes. How are you gonna feel if we actually do win?

Name: Ross
Lines: Uh, you're not gonna win.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, I know, I know, the odds are against us, but somebody has to win, and it could be us! And then how you gonna feel? You know, we're gonna be all like "oh everybody, let's take our helicopters up to the cape" and you're gonna be all like "oh, I can't guys, I'll meet you guys up there, I gotta gas up the Hyundai"

Name: Ross
Lines: Ok, I've heard myself on tape and I sound nothing like that.

Name: Chandler
Lines: I can see the headline now: "Lottery winners' friend filled with regret eats own arm".

Name: Ross
Lines: Why would I eat my own arm?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well you wouldn't, but we own the paper, we can print whatever we want.

Name: Monica
Lines: You know what, Ross? I'm gonna throw in 50 bucks for you.

Name: Ross
Lines: Why?

Name: Monica
Lines: Because I know that you think the lottery is "boohaki" but we're all here and gonna watch the numbers and have fun. And you're my brother, and I want you to be a part of this.

Name: Ross
Lines: You don't have to do that, I'll pay for myself. But just the fact that you want me to have fun with you guys - that's so sweet! Come here

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Get a room!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ok, so now that you're in, what are you gonna do if we win?

Name: Ross
Lines: I don't know, probably just invest it.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ooh! Calm down ...

Name: Joey
Lines: Seriously, that's your fantasy? To invest it?

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, I'm sorry, did I say "invest it"? I meant "be cool and piss it all away"

Name: Joey
Lines: Ooh, ooh, I know! We should pool all own money and buy the Knicks!

Name: Rachel
Lines: I don't really care about the Knicks.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, you will when I pick you as starting forward.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You would do that? I never get picked!

Name: Chandler
Lines: You know, I'm not sure a sports team is the way to go.

Name: Joey
Lines: You're not gonna let me buy the Knicks?? I can't believe you're taking this away from me!

Name: Chandler
Lines: You're right, it has been you dream for over 15 seconds.

Name: Ross
Lines: Uh, how long until they announce the numbers, Mommy?

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, I've gotten into the habit of calling Rachel "Mommy" when we're around Emma. Which I now realize we are not ...

Name: Rachel
Lines: I'm hoping that if she hears it enough it will be her first word.

Name: Ross
Lines: Although if we're gonna do that, we should probably call me "Daddy" too.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oooh, I like that, "daddy"

Name: Ross
Lines: I ... I was just talking about Rachel.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oooh, is daddy getting angry? Is daddy gonna spank me?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hello? Hello? Oh, hey Charlie. Did anybody else hear? ... What? Susan got it?? How? Oh man, I would have slept with him!! .. Alright, bye.

Name: Joey
Lines: Dude, I'm sorry. But hey, there's one spot left, right?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well no, Charlie's gonna get that.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey, don't say that! You got just as good a chance as anybody else of getting that job!

Name: Chandler
Lines: He's the boss's son.

Name: Monica
Lines: Come on, lottery!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ooh, you guys, it starts in like 20 minutes.

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok, here we go. We need to sort out the tickets as quickly as possible to see if we've won. So does anybody have any ideas how to organize this?  Ok, how about this: we divide them into 6 groups of 40, and the remaining 10 can be read by whoever finishes their pile first.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ooh, I have another idea!

Name: Monica
Lines: I'm sorry, idea time is over.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ok, well, are all the tickets in the bowl?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Chandler
Lines: What about the ones you have on the nightstand?

Name: Monica
Lines: There are no tickets on the nightstand!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yes there are, I just saw them a few minutes ago.

Name: Monica
Lines: Un, no you didn't! You must be mistaken!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Honey, there are like 20 tickets on the nightstand!

Name: Monica
Lines: Chandler, sense the tone!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, well, well, look what mommy found!!

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok, fine!! I bought 20 extra tickets for me and Chandler.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Uh! The psychic also said that I would be betrayed.

Name: Ross
Lines: I can't believe this, I thought we were all in this together!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey, you just got in 5 minutes ago!

Name: Ross
Lines: 3 minutes ago!!! I don't know why that's important ...

Name: Joey
Lines: I was with you the whole time we were in Connecticut, when did you even get those?

Name: Monica
Lines: When you were reading the dirty magazines without taking off the plastic!

Name: Joey
Lines: I'll show you how.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok, well Monica, suppose one of your "special" tickets win? How are you gonna feel when you win the lottery and you lose all your friends?

Name: Monica
Lines: Please ... if I win the lottery, you guys are not gonna leave me. Someone gave me a basket of mini-muffins last week and I couldn't get rid of you for 3 days!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Chandler, would you just tell her what she did was wrong?

Name: Chandler
Lines: She's right, you shouldn't have bought tickets just for us ...

Name: Monica
Lines: Ahhh!

Name: Monica
Lines: There's the man I married!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: All right, believe me.If you win the lottery, it's the last you're gonna hear from us!

Name: Monica
Lines: Fine! Don't be my friends! I'll buy new friends! Yeah, and then I'll pay for their plastic surgery so they'd look just like you!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, I want my tickets too ! And I'm buying the Knicks! And Steffi Graff, ah ah!

Name: Ross
Lines: Than I want mine, too ! And if I win I'm gonna put it all into a very low-yield bond.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, you guys! We've got to keep all the tickets together

Name: Monica
Lines: No, no! We should divide them up  and I should get extra because we used my card to buy them!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, if anybody gets extra tickets, it should be me! This all thing was my idea!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, yeah! Thanks for inventing the lottery!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok, that's it! Just give'em to me! I'll split them up!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: OOOOOHHHHH!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey, hey!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, if she jumps, I get her tickets.

Name: Joey
Lines: No, no!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: If we are not doing it together, we're not doing it at all! So, say goodbye to your tickets! .

Name: Everyone
Lines: NO!!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Don't come any closer!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Can I come a little bit closer, valuable things are getting squished...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, what's more important, your friends or money?

Name: Everyone but Monica
Lines: Friends!

Name: Monica
Lines: Money!  Friends...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey Monica, what about your extra tickets?

Name: Monica
Lines: They're all in there! Even these five that I hid in my bra ...

Name: Ross
Lines: Monica!

Name: Ross
Lines: Go, go, go!!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: What a beautiful night to be running around the street, looking for tickets. And the wind sure made it fun.

Name: Monica
Lines: Phoebe, we lost half of them.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So, what? Monica, we have the winning ticket! My psychic said I  was gonna win, remember?

Name: Ross
Lines: Weird.. your psychic didn't mention anything about the scary pigeon...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: As a matter of fact she said that's how I am going to die.  So, excuse me for being a little skittish.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey, there's two messages. These could be from work!

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, play them!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ok, here we go!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, I bet that was very hard for him to do.

Name: Second message
Lines: "Hey Chandler, it's Charlie"

Name: Chandler
Lines: This is..shhh!

Name: Second Message
Lines: "Listen, oh... it turns I got the last spot. I'm really sorry man, it was a lot of fun working with you. Give me a call if you want."

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh God, I am so sorry honey...

Name: All
Lines: Oh, so sorry man! Sorry!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, it is so unfair. It's like that time they promoted Sandra over me at work.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, is she related to Ralph Lauren?

Name: Rachel
Lines: No, she was just much better at job than me!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Guys, the drawing is about to start!

Name: Rachel
Lines: You know what? We should call my mum's house and say goodnight to Emma before she goes down.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh yeah, it's a good idea!

Name: Monica
Lines: Honey, you've been really strong about this, I know how badly you wanted that job.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah, you know, I really thought I deserved it.  But... let's go win the lottery... I mean, we still have 130 chances to win, right?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi mum, put her back on!

Name: Joey
Lines: Rach, come on! They are announcing the numbers! My God, I can already feel myself changing.

Name: TV
Lines: "Here we are, the official Powerball numbers! We have 53"

Name: Chandler
Lines: I got that!

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, we have one too!!

Name: Monica
Lines: We are on a roll, people!!

Name: Ross
Lines: Come on!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Mum, please!I know you love your new lips, but I can barely understand you! Would you, please, just let me say goodnight to my daughter?

Name: TV
Lines: "And number 29! Here we go! The Powerball is 7"

Name: Monica
Lines: Check your numbers! Make me rich!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Guys, you're not gonna believe this! I was just saying goodnight to Emma and she said her first words!!

Name: All
Lines: Wow!

Name: Joey
Lines: And what did she say?

Name: Rachel
Lines: She said "gleba"!!

Name: Monica
Lines: Make me rich!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Isn't that amazing?

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh yeah, no no no...that's great!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Why-why aren't you more excited?

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, Rach...oh..."gleba" is not a word.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, but of course it is!

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay, what does it mean?

Name: Rachel
Lines: I don't know all the words.

Name: Ross
Lines: I'm just, I'm just glad I didn't miss my daughter's first words .

Name: Ross
Lines: Yes you did, gleba is a word!

Name: Ross
Lines: Ok, use it in a sentence.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok... "Emma just said gleba"!

Name: Ross
Lines: It's not a word!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay, okay, okay, fine, I'm gonna look it up .

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, oh, ok, great. You know what, while you're at it she said another word the other day, why don't you, why don't you look up: pbbqqt....

Name: Ross
Lines: She's gonna be a scientist!

Name: Joey
Lines: Damnit! anybody got anything?

Name: Chandler
Lines: No.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I'm still looking through mine...

Name: Monica
Lines: Hello? Hold on. It's your boss.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ah, the "I'm sorry I rejected you" phone call. I'm not used to getting it from guys.  Hey, Steve.

Name: Steve
Lines: Chandler, hi! I'm sure you've heard we filled the three positions. We just felt that with your maturity and experience, you wouldn't be happy being someone's assistant.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh no no no no, I'd love to be somebody's assistant! Answering phones, getting coffee, I live for that stuff! And I'm not too mature... farts, boobies, butt cracks!

Name: Steve
Lines: Chandler, you were the strongest person in the program. We're offering you the position of junior copywriter.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Me, that guy who just said butt cracks?

Name: Steve
Lines: Yes, that's right. We're excited about the level of sophistication you'll be bringing to the job.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ok well, thanks, you won't regret it. I'll see you tomorrow .

Name: Chandler
Lines: What?  Oh, yeah, I'm gonna be a junior copywriter.

Name: Everybody
Lines: Oh my God, congratulations!

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh sweetie, I'm so proud of you!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Does that mean I get the good loving tonight?

Name: Monica
Lines: You bet! No TV or anything!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, that is so great about the job.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Thanks, man.

Name: Joey
Lines: And I like to think I had a little something to do with it.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Really? What?

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, before, with the wishbone... I didn't wish we would win the lottery, I wished you'd get the job.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh yeah.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You know what? There is a little part of me that really thought we were gonna win.

Name: Ross
Lines: Me too. So much for my dinosaur/Amelia Earhart theme park.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: You guys, what was the Powerball number again?

Name: Monica and Ross
Lines: Seven.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: We won.

Name: Rachel
Lines: What?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: We won!

Name: Monica
Lines: Let me see!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Don't tear it.

Name: Ross
Lines: Phoebe, you don't have any of the first five numbers.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I know that, but look, we've got the Powerball number, we've won 3 dollars!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Wow, you'd think we should get that over 20 years or go for the big payout.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I don't care, I've never won anything before, I can't believe this!

Name: Rachel
Lines: So Pheebs, what are you going to do with your $3?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: It's not all mine. We all get 50 cents.

Name: Monica
Lines: You know what? You can have mine.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Me too.

Name: Joey
Lines: Me too.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Me too.

Name: Ross
Lines: I guess if everybody else is...

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey guys, so I just called the Powerball hotline, can you believe it? Nobody won.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I beg to differ .

Name: Gunther
Lines: Maybe nobody won the jackpot, but there was this guy in here earlier, and he found the ticket on the street, right outside, and won $10,000 .

Name: Teleplay
Lines: Mark Kunerth Story: Dana Klein Directed by: Terry Hughes Transcribed by: Eleonora, Pheeboh, Sebastiano & Vanessa

Name: Joey
Lines: God, you're beautiful...why are we fighting this?You know you want it to happen as much as I do.

Name: Joey
Lines: I want you.I need you.Let me make love to you.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I don't wanna stand in the way of true love or anything, but I think a  cantaloupe might hurt less.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, ehm...I'm...I'm rehearsing my lines.They gave me a big romantic story on Days Of Our Lives. It's the first time my character's got one. I'm so nervous, you know, I really want it to be good!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Woow!I haven't seen you this worked up since you did that dog food commercial and you thought you were gonna be with a real talking dog!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, that was a disappointment... Oh, hey!D'you want to come down to the set and tell me if I'm doing ok?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Are you serious?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah!Hey, you just have to promise not to get yourself thrown out again.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey, that was an honest mistake!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, that was an awesome day!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hi!

Name: Monica
Lines: So, do you guys wanna come and eat dinner at the restaurant sometime in the next few weeks?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Sure!

Name: Ross
Lines: I'd love to!

Name: Monica
Lines: Well you can't! We're booked solid for the next month!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, I can't give you a massage, because my licence has been revoked again!

Name: Ross
Lines: Phoebe, what happened?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, it was an accident...You know, it's a lot of oil and sometimes the hand just slips!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Have I got a surprise for you? Pack your bags!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh no!You guys aren't supposed to get divorced for 7 years!

Name: Chandler
Lines: What? No, I'm taking Monica to a romantic inn in Vermont !

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, good!Ok, good for you!Try to recapture the magic!

Name: Chandler
Lines: So, what do you say? Can you get out of work?

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, honey!I can't. I was just telling these guys that things are crazy at the restaurant!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Are you really that busy?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, I'm sorry. I really am.

Name: Monica
Lines: Tell them I'm a chef in a big New York restaurant!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: And tell them that in 2 weeks I will once again be a masseuse in good standing!

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, don't worry about it! Just use your travel insurance.

Name: Chandler
Lines: I don't have travel insurance.

Name: Ross
Lines: Well, this is what happens when people live on the edge!

Name: Monica
Lines: Why don't you take Ross?

Name: Ross
Lines: Uh, don't you think that would be a little weird? I mean, two guys in a romantic inn...

Name: Monica
Lines: No, not if their room has two beds!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey Joey, is this the bed where Olivia lost her virginity?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, please!Honey, just the fact that you want me here to support you, I'm...OH MY GOD!Is that Christian Sanders?He's so gorgeous!

Name: Joey
Lines: Also so gay!

Name: Rachel

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, at the Christmas party him and Santa did some definitely gay stuff!

Lines: Joey, Joey! We're ready for you!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, wish me luck!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok, not that you need it but good...GOD!Is that Chase Lassiter?He's straight, right?

Name: Joey
Lines: Rach, I gotta say...if you weren't here wondering if these guys were gay I don't know if I could do this!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, I'm sorry, you're right.I'm sorry, good luck!

Name: Director
Lines: On a bell please! Quietly.. and ACTION!

Lines: Drake! What are you doing in here?

Name: Joey/Drake
Lines: Stopping you from marrying the wrong man and making the biggest mistake of your life.

Name: Actress/Olivia
Lines: Get out!

Name: Joey/Drake
Lines: You don't love him!

Lines: What do you know about love?

Name: Joey/Drake
Lines: I know what I felt that night when we kissed under the bridge.

Lines: That kiss never happened.

Lines: Oh, what about this one.

Name: Rachel
Lines: OH!

Name: Actress/Olivia
Lines: No, I told you...get out!

Name: Joey/Drake

Name: Chase Lassiter
Lines: You look familiar, have we...

Name: Rachel
Lines: SSSHHHHTTT!!He's asking her a question!!

Name: Joey/Drake
Lines: Can you really live the rest of your life never knowing what we could have been?

Name: Actress/Olivia
Lines: I don't have a choice...

Name: Joey/Drake
Lines: Yes, you do.Yes...you do. I'm the one who doesn't have a choice because I...because I can't stop loving you.

Lines: Don't say that...

Name: Joey/Drake
Lines: Tell me to stop, just...tell me to stop.

Name: Director
Lines: CUT!

Name: Rachel
Lines: NO!  Or, cut!You know, that's your call!

Lines: Thank you!

Lines: Thank you! You haven't said anything...

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh..please!I-I welcome criticism.

Name: 3rd Customer

Name: Phoebe
Lines: And there's a country called Argentinaaaa, it's a place I've never seeeeen. But I'm told for fifty pesos you can buy a human spleen. Humaaan spleeeeen. Ol!

Name: Monica
Lines: What are you doing here!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, you said that you had customers lined up in the street, so I am here to entertain!

Name: Monica
Lines: Great!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah! It really has been great too, you know, some of this people must have seen me play before because they were requesting a bunch of my songs! Yeah, "You suck" and "shut up and go home".

Name: Monica
Lines: Listen Phoebe...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Monica
Lines: You know how much I love listening to your music, you know, but...

Lines: This is kind of a classy place.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ok, say no more.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hi, Chandler Bing, I have a reservation.

Name: Receptionist
Lines: Welcome to the Chestnut Inn Mr. Bing, so where are you joining from?

Name: Chandler
Lines: New York.

Name: Ross
Lines: The big apple!

Name: Chandler
Lines: I'm sorry, he's a little bit wound up, we had to stop at every maple candy stand on the way here.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, I ate all my gifts for everybody.

Name: Receptionist
Lines: I am sorry Mr. Bing, there's no record of your reservation in the computer.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, that's impossible, can you check again, please?

Name: Ross
Lines: Check again please!

Name: Receptionist
Lines: I'm sorry, it's not here.

Name: Ross
Lines: Not there.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Let me get this straight. I called yesterday trying to cancel my reservation and I was told it was not refundable, then we drove six hours all the way up here and now you tell me that we don't have a reservation?

Name: Receptionist
Lines: I don't know what to say.

Name: Ross
Lines: She doesn't know what to say!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Just give us the cheapest room you have.

Name: Receptionist
Lines: Unfortunatly the only thing we have available is our deluxe suite, the rate is six hundred dollars.

Name: Chandler
Lines: That's insane!

Name: Ross
Lines: Totally insane. Dude, let's drive home, we'll hit all the maple candy stores on the way back and if...if they're closed maybe we'll tap a tree and make some ourselves.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Does that room have a closet I can lock him in?  We'll take it.

Name: Receptionist
Lines: Great.

Name: Chandler
Lines: What!? They are totally ripping us off!

Name: Ross
Lines: Dude, don't worry 'bout it! I know how we can make your money back! This is a nice hotel, you know, plenty of amenities, we just load up on those! Like those apples. Instead of taking one, I'm... I take six!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Great, at a hundred dollars an apple, we're there!

Name: Ross
Lines: C'mon, you get the idea, ow-ow-ow we'll make our money back in no time!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Dude, you're shaking!

Name: Ross

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi!

Lines: Hey!

Name: Rachel

Lines: Oh, you know, the writing was good, and the director is good, and... and my co-star's good but they're not as good as me!

Name: Joey
Lines: Right...  ok, so just from the top of the page, right here.

Lines: I can't believe you married him.

Name: Rachel/actress
Lines: But what choice did I have. He was keeping my sister in a dungeon!

Name: Joey/Drake
Lines: So what about us? Everything we feel for each other.

Name: Rachel/actress
Lines: It's over! You have to accept that.

Name: Joey/Drake
Lines: How can I? Knowing I'll never hold you in my arms again, or touch your skin, or feel your lips, knowing I'll never make love to you? How can I accept that... I can never kiss you again when it's all I can do not to kiss you right now.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Kiss me.

Name: Joey
Lines: What?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Kiss me.

Lines: Ah, Rach, it doesn't say that!

Lines: just... don't talk...

Lines: What did you get?

Lines: USA Today

Name: Ross
Lines: Nice, put it with the others.

Name: Ross
Lines: We are four short of a bush-o . God I feel so alive, I love being in the country!

Name: Chandler

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, that's not cool.

Name: Chandlers
Lines: Dude, none of this is cool.

Lines: I think I know what you mean though...the lamp is the hotel's, but the bulbs ...oh, you already got that.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ok, how about this ?

Lines: No, no, no, you can't take the remote control!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yes, but the batteries...

Lines: Thank you, thank you very much!

Lines: Let's celebrate with some maple candy!

Lines: No!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Can I ask you a question?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Have you ever had any weird romantic dreams?

Name: Monica
Lines: Let me think. Oh, when I was younger I used to dream that I got married to Mayor McCheese, and on our wedding night I ate his head.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok, well this is like that...in no way. I had a...I had a dream last night that I wanted to kiss Joey.

Name: Monica
Lines: Wow, do you mean like kiss him-kiss him?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh yeah! I mean, that was pretty intense.

Name: Monica
Lines: What do you think brought than on?

Name: Rachel
Lines: I don't know! I mean, maybe that's something to do with the fact that I saw him do a love scene yesterday.

Name: Monica
Lines: A love scene? With who?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Olivia.

Name: Monica
Lines: Olivia? I thought she was marrying Connor!  Oh right, real life more important.

Name: Rachel
Lines: So do you think that my dream means anything?

Name: Monica
Lines: I don't know. I mean, you saw him do a love scene, so maybe you don't have a thing for Joey, maybe you have a thing for Drake.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ah! Well it was Joey reading Drake's lines in the dream...

Name: Monica
Lines: Of course it was! Trust me, when it comes to psychology I know what I'm talking about. I took two psych classes in college.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You took the same class twice.

Name: Monica
Lines: It was hard!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: Rachel and Monica
Lines: Hi.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh...Phoebe? Maybe I wasn't clear before. I really love listening to your music here, but my restaurant is sort of an upscale place.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Right, yeah, ok, I'll ask the butler to fetch my diamonds out of the vault.

Name: Monica
Lines: Phoebe, it's not what you wear. It's sort of your songs... I just don't think you should play at the restaurant anymore.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, ok. Fine, I'll just, I'll take the hat back .

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey, so you guys, the funniest thing happened, at work...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: My songs aren't good enough for your restaurant?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok, we're still on that.

Name: Monica
Lines: I didn't say your songs were not good enough.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Then what's wrong with them? Would they not go with your tiny portions of pretentious food?

Name: Monica
Lines: Tiny portions?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah well, "excuse me, I ordered the smoked salmon appetizer, but  I can't see it, I can't see it"!

Name: Monica
Lines: Phoebe, it's not about quantity.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well...it's not about quality.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh really, you want to talk about quality? Have you heard of a key? It's what some people sing in.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well at least all my songs don't taste like garlic. Yeah, there are other ingredients Monica.

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok, so that's what we're doing. You know, when I'm in the coffee house bopping along to one of your songs, I'm wearing ear plugs.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ear plugs, or cloves of garlic?

Name: Monica
Lines: You know what? I take back what I said before. You keep playing at the restaurant, because with your music driving people inside, my bar sales are going up like crazy.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: What are people having, the garlic Martini?

Lines: Here's your copy of the bill, we hope you enjoyed your stay.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh we did, and you still have all your lamps.

Lines: Oh, I didn't factor in the room tax.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh dude, don't worry about it, I found an unattended maid's car. We're way ahead of the game.

Lines: Oh my god.

Name: Chandler
Lines: What?

Lines: There's something new in the bowl.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Look, we have enough, just walk away.

Name: Chandler
Lines: There's a forest right outside.

Name: Ross
Lines: It's not the same.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ok, go quick!

Name: Ross
Lines: Thank you for a delightful stay.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, my maple candy!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Food here at 'Javu'..will kill you..the food here at 'Javu' ...will kill you..

Name: Monica
Lines: Thank god, it's just you! I thought someone was swinging a bag of cats against the wall.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: You'd better get back in that kitchen Monica, the garlic is not gonna overuse itself.

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok, you have to stop playing now.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Why? The only person my playing is bothering is you!

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh yeah? Ok, let's settle this, come on!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Get your garlic-peelers off me!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ok, ok, how many of you enjoyed the music outside?  Ha!

Name: Monica
Lines: Alright, let me ask you this question: How many of you thought the music was fine, but not in keeping with the tone of the restaurant? .

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ok, well, who identified the tone of this restaurant as pretentious comma garlicky?

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok who thinks the food is delicious and a little pretention never hurt anyone?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ok, well, alright, who thinks the food is fine, the music was fine, but your evening was ruined by this incessant poll taking? .

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh...Who was so stupid and stubborn that she lashed out against her friend's cooking which she actually thinks is pretty great!

Name: Monica
Lines: I'm sorry...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I'm sorry too...

Name: Monica
Lines: ooohh... hey! Wanna stick around and I'll whip you up some dinner?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah! As long as it's free! Food here is ridiculously over-p...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Who's hoping the hand raising thing is still cute enough that you won't hate me?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Joey, do you have peanut butter on the back of your head?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh man! I thought I got it all!

Name: Rachel
Lines: How...how...?

Name: Joey
Lines: I was making a peanut butter smoothy, right?

Name: Rachel
Lines: uh-huh

Name: Joey
Lines: And I couldn't find this little plastic thing  that goes on top of the blender...and I thought...well... how important can that be, right...? Turns out very!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Wow...definitely just Drake...

Name: Joey
Lines: What?

Name: Rachel
Lines: What...how is it going with Drake?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh...I don't think it's going very well...

Name: Rachel
Lines: What...that scene I saw was so good!

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, I'm feeling really insecure about the one we are shooting tomorrow...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Joey, is this that thing that you do when you say you're bad so I'll give you a compliment?

Name: Joey
Lines: A little. Yeah no, I really am worried, you know, I mean I have to make it convincing that I'm in love with Olivia.

Name: Rachel
Lines: So?

Name: Joey
Lines: So...I've never played that!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ooh! Honey, it can't be that hard, I mean, you've been in love before?

Name: Joey
Lines: Uh...well...just once...with you...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok...this could be a little awkward...I'm just going to blow past it... well can't you just use that method actor thing where you use your real life memories to help you in your performance?

Name: Joey
Lines: What the hell are you talking about??

Name: Rachel
Lines: Alright, alright look, just uh... just try to remember how  you felt when you were in love, and think about that when you're playing the scene.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh! ok, yeah, I think I can do that. Yeah ok, there's this party scene coming up.. and Olivia and her husband are there and all Drake wants to do is grab her and kiss her, but he can't... And that makes me think about all those times when I wanted to grab you and kiss you, but you didn't know so I would just pretend everything was cool, but really, it was killing me.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Joey, you never..you never talked about that before...

Name: Chandler
Lines: I got you something from Vermont!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, you guys, what are you doing tomorrow night?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, let me see... I-I believe I'm... yes, falling asleep in front of the TV.

Name: Joey
Lines: Look, my agent hooked me up with six tickets to a great play.

Name: Chandler
Lines: I could fall asleep at a play.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: What is it?

Name: Joey
Lines: It's a one-woman play called "Why don't you like me: a bitter woman's journey through life".

Name: Monica
Lines: It sounds interesting!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, it does sound interesting, I mean, to listen to a woman complain for two hours, I don't think it gets bett...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I know, I know, we can drive, we can vote, we can work, what more do these broads want?

Name: Joey
Lines: You guys are gonna have a great time, I promise!

Name: Ross
Lines: What? How come that you don't have to go!

Name: Joey
Lines: I wish I could but I just found out that I have to be at work really early the next day, so I can't go, but, you know, take the extra ticket and invite whoever you want.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Uh, let's see, who do I hate?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, sorry... Oops, sorry.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, here you go.

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Do you think it's possible for two friends to fool around and... and not have it be a big deal?

Name: Monica
Lines: No, I don't think it ever works. Why?

Name: Rachel
Lines: No reason.

Name: Monica
Lines: No, no, Rachel?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah

Name: Monica
Lines: Who do you wanna fool around with?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Nobody, forget it!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Maybe.

Name: Monica
Lines: You can't!

Name: Monica
Lines: In the hall.

Name: Monica
Lines: You wanna fool around with Joey?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah! You know, ever since I had that dream about him, and can't get it out of my head! And what's the big deal, people do it all the time!

Name: Monica
Lines: Who? Who do you know that are friends that just fool around?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok, off the top of my head... Don and Janet.

Name: Monica
Lines: Who, who are they?

Name: Rachel
Lines: I know them from work.

Name: Monica
Lines: Both of them?

Name: Rachel
Lines: No, one of them...

Name: Monica
Lines: Which one?

Name: Rachel
Lines: I don't know, what were the names I just said?

Name: Monica
Lines: Rachel, things can get incredibly complicated.

Lines: What the hell are you cooking!

Lines: Hey!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey, you guys won't believe what I have to do for work today.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yes, but, Ross you chose a career of talking about dinosaurs.

Name: Monica
Lines: What's so bad about that?

Name: Ross
Lines: It's I just know they're gonna be a couple of windbags wearing tweed jackets with suede elbow patches.

Name: Monica
Lines: : Ross?

Name: Ross
Lines: These aren't suede.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Excuse me, I'm looking for someone. You don't, by any chance, know a Ross Geller?

Name: Gunther
Lines: No.

Name: Ross
Lines: Hi, hi, I'm Ross Geller.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Oh, hi. I'm professor Wealer.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, oh, that's, that's, that's nice.

Name: Charlie
Lines: It's a... It's good to meet you! Thank you so much for taking the time out to show me around.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, no, it's no big deal, I mean, if I weren't doing this I'd just, you know, be at the gym working out.

Name: Monica
Lines: Is he gonna introduce us?

Name: Chandler
Lines: No, I think we're just blurry shapes to him now.

Name: Charlie
Lines: And, by the way, I really enjoyed your paper on the connection between geographic isolation and rapid mutagenesis.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, ha, I wrote that in one minute.

Name: Monica
Lines: Twenty bucks says they're married within the month.
