Lines: Oh, ah, isn't there another professor that is supposed to come with us?

Name: Ross
Lines: I don't think so.

Name: Charlie
Lines: I'm pretty sure, professor Spafford from Cornell?

Name: Charlie
Lines: You don't think we should wait for him?

Name: Ross
Lines: You know what, he's a big boy, I'm sure he'll find us, ok?

Name: Professor Spafford
Lines: Professor Geller?

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, damn it!

Name: Jane
Lines: Hi Joey it's Jane Rogers, can't wait for your party tonight. Listen, I forgot your address, can you give me a call? Thanks, bye.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: Joey
Lines: What's happenin'?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, it's a real shame you can't make it to that one-woman show tonight.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, I'd love to, but I gotta get up so early the next day and so, you know me, work comes first

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah...

Name: Message
Lines: "Hi Joey, it's Jane Rogers can't wait for your party tonight"

Name: Joey
Lines: Stupid Jane Rogers!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: You are having a party tonight??

Name: Joey
Lines: Kinda have a... a thing for the Days Of Our Life's people.

Name: Rachel
Lines: And you weren't going to tell us? How did you think you were gonna get away with that?

Name: Joey
Lines: I do it every year.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You do that every year??

Name: Joey
Lines: I didn't have to tell you that!! I'm stupider than Jane Rogers!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, that's why you got these tickets to that play, to get rid of us??

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah...

Name: Rachel
Lines: And last year is that why you sent us to that medieval times restaurant?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah...

Name: Rachel
Lines: OH! And the year before that, when you set up that nighttime tour of that button factory?

Name: Joey
Lines: I can't believe you guys went for that one!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Joey, why wouldn't you invite us to your parties?

Name: Joey
Lines: You're fine, ok? But everyone else acts like an idiot around famous people!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, then so you just invite me...!

Name: Joey
Lines: Please, I was trying to be nice, you're the worst one!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, Joey, come on! Please, please! Let me come, I will behave, I promise! I will behave! Please, please, please...

Name: Joey
Lines: Ok, ok! Fine! You can come, but don't tell anybody else. It's up on the roof at 8.

Name: Professor Spafford
Lines: And then my wife and I went on a cruise to the Galapagos. There was a sea food buffet you wouldn't believe. There were clams, and mussels, and oysters, and cracked crab, and snow crab, and king crab. It's a pity I'm allergic to shellfish.

Name: Ross
Lines: So, where did you get your undergraduate degree?

Name: Professor Spafford
Lines: And that's not all I'm allergic to.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, it's not over!

Name: Professor Spafford
Lines: I'm also allergic to peanuts, and cashews, and almonds, and filberts...

Name: Ross
Lines: So basically all nuts?

Name: Professor Spafford
Lines: Interestingly... no.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Kinda playing fast and loose with the word "interesting".

Name: Professor Spafford
Lines: If you'll excuse me I'm going to use the restroom.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Oh my God!!

Name: Ross
Lines: I've lost the will to live.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Let's ditch him!

Name: Ross
Lines: What?

Name: Charlie
Lines: Come on, he's still in the bathroom! I'm begging you!

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh... ok, fine. But... ehm... I just have one question for you, ehm...  When we exit should we walk, or run, or prance, or stroll...

Name: Charlie
Lines: Stop it, stop it! He talks slow but he might pee fast! Ok, let's go!!

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, hey you guys! This is Charlie! Charlie, this is Phoebe and my sister, Monica.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hi!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, Charlie is gonna be joining my department.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, you're a paleonthologist, too!  Oh, ok, now, what do you think of Ranion's new theory of species' variegation in segmented arthopods?

Name: Charlie
Lines: Well, I think he's a little out there, but he does have some interesting ideas...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ah, ah.

Name: Ross
Lines: Ranion's theory of species variegation?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I saw the article on your coffee table and I memorized the title to freak you out!

Name: Monica
Lines: So, did you two have fun?

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh my God, she's great! I mean, we-we have so much in common and she's just cool, and funny...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey... Hi you guys! Listen, you know what? I'm not feeling really well. I think I can't get out for the play.

Name: Ross
Lines: Really? Wh-what's wrong?

Name: Rachel
Lines: I don't know! I think it's kind of serious! Oh, you know... I was watching this thing on TV this morning about... Newcastle disease... and I think I might have it!!

Name: Charlie
Lines: Oh, Newcastle disease is a secretion borne virus that only affects chickens and... other poultry.

Name: Rachel
Lines: ... Ok, who is this?

Name: Ross
Lines: I'm sorry, Rachel, this is Charlie Wealer, she's a collegue.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, hi! I would check your hand but... I'm sure you don't want to get my chicken disease!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey, Rachel, Can-can I see you for a sec?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Sure!  Oh...

Name: Monica
Lines: You're not sick!

Name: Rachel
Lines: What? Yes, I am!

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok, then, why are you...  all dressed up??

Name: Rachel
Lines: When you're sick, you do whatever you can to make yourself feel better!

Name: Monica

Name: Zack
Lines: No you did.

Name: Chandler
Lines: My wife and I have some boundary issues, you know, sometimes we ask inappropriate questions. We're working on it.

Name: Zack
Lines: Oh, thank you.

Name: Chandler
Lines: You wouldn't know if Jeanette's planning on keeping her baby, would ya?

Name: Part 1 written by
Lines: Shana Goldberg-Meehan & Scott Silveri  Part 2 written by: Marta Kauffman & David Crane  Directed by: Kevin S. Bright  Transcribed by: Andreina, Eleonora, Pheeboh, Sebastiano & Vanessa

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey! I'm all packed and ready to go!

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, that's right!  Daddy and uncle Joey are going on a trip today. We're going to a conference in Barbados, right?

Name: Joey
Lines: Mmh-mmh.

Name: Ross
Lines: Can you say Barbados?

Name: Joey
Lines: Barbados!

Name: Ross
Lines: Ok, I gotta say. I mean, it means so much to me that you guys are coming all the way over there to hear me do my speech! UH! And I've a surprise, uh... I had to pull some strings but I was able to get everyone passes to the entire conference! That's right!  This babies will get you into all the paleontology lectures and seminars.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Do you have anything that would... get us out of them?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah Ross, I mean... we're excited to hear the speech but the rest of the time we're gonna wanna do, you know, "island's stuff".

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I think David would probably wanna hear a few lectures.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, right, because he's a scientist!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, no, because, you know, he's been in Minsk for 8 years and if he gets too much direct sunlight, he'll die.

Name: Ross
Lines: Ok, we gotta go, yeah? So, we'll see you guys tomorrow.

Name: Joey
Lines: All right, let's do it! 5 hour flight with Charlie, have a couple of drinks, get under that blanket and do what comes naturally.

Name: Ross
Lines: It's a blanket Joe, not a cloak of invisibility!

Name: Charlie
Lines: Wow! This place is beautiful!

Name: Ross
Lines: Look at all these paleontologists!!

Name: Joey
Lines: I know, there are gonna be some pasty folks by the pool tomorrow!

Name: Woman
Lines: Oh my God, I can't believe you're here!

Name: Joey
Lines: I think I've been recognized, this happens all the time!

Name: Woman
Lines: Doctor Geller, I'm such a huge fan!

Name: Joey
Lines: That... never happens...

Name: Woman
Lines: I've been following your career for years, I-I can't wait for your keynote speech.

Name: Ross
Lines: Wow! This is very flattering, uh...

Name: Woman
Lines: I would love your autograph.

Name: Ross
Lines: Uh, uh... Sure! Uhm... "Dear..."

Name: Woman
Lines: Sarah.

Name: Ross
Lines: "... Sarah. I dig you", Uh? "Doctor Ross Geller".

Name: Sarah
Lines: Thank you so much!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, oh and Sarah... I'd like to introduce you to my colleague, uh, Professor Wheeler, a-and this is Joey Tribbiani.

Name: Sarah
Lines: Are you a paleontologist?

Name: Joey
Lines: No, God, no! No! No no, I'm an actor. You'd probably recognize me from a little show called "The Days of Our Lives".

Name: Ross
Lines: Dude, it's just "Days of Our Lives"... there's no the.

Name: Joey
Lines: Ok, Ross! It's... It's fun, yeah! No, I-I play Doctor Drake Ramoray.

Name: Sarah
Lines: I'm sorry, I don't own a TV.

Name: Joey
Lines: You don't own a TV? What's all your furniture pointed at??

Name: Monica
Lines: David, can you help me?! I'm trying to explain to Chandler how a plane stays in the air.

Name: David
Lines: Oh, certainly. That's a combination of Bernoulli's principle and Newton's third law of motion.

Name: Monica
Lines: See?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah, that's the same as "it has something to do with wind".

Name: Monica
Lines: Alright, I'm gonna go pick up a few things for the trip.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, I should go, too. Oh, now... tomorrow do you guys wanna share a cab to the airport or should Mike and I just meet you there.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Mike?? Who's Mike?

Name: David
Lines: Mike is your ex... uh... boyfriend!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: That's right! Oh, yeah... Well, I've totally forgotten about im! AH! That's-That's... a blast from the past!

Name: David
Lines: It's ok. Ho-honest mistake.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Really, it doesn't mean anything. I mean, you know, Monica refers to Chandler as Richard all the time!

Name: Chandler
Lines: She does?

Name: Monica
Lines: At least you took me down with you!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I'm sooo sorry!! I just... I keep thinking about Mike! I'm crazy about David, and we're having so much fun together. Why-Why do I miss Mike? That's-that's gonna go away, right?

Name: Monica
Lines: I guess, in time.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Monica
Lines: I mean, my feelings for Richard are certainly gone.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: You just did it again. Chandler, your feelings for Chandler are certainly gone!

Name: David
Lines: Well, Phoebe's still pretty hung up on that Mike, uh?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I wouldn't read too much into it.

Name: David
Lines: Still you know, a girl calls you by your ex-boyfriend's name, that-that's not a good thing, right?

Name: Chandler
Lines: David, let me stop you there 'cause I think I see where this is going. I'm not very good at giving advice. So if you want advice, go to Ross, Monica, or... Joey, if the thing you wanna advice about is pizza toppings or burning sensation when you pee.

Name: David
Lines: Sorry, I just... I wish there was something I could do, you know? Well, you know Phoebe...

Name: Chandler
Lines: Seriously, we're gonna do this?

Name: David
Lines: I'm sorry, uh... I just wish I could make her forget about Mike already, you know... Why did Phoebe and Mike break up?

Name: David
Lines: That's great! That's great! I-I'll propose to her!

Name: Chandler
Lines: What?

Name: David
Lines: Well, I was probably going to do it at some point.

Name: Chandler
Lines: I didn't mean now...

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, you're welcome! Glad I could help.

Name: David
Lines: How do you think I should propose?

Name: Chandler
Lines: David, I'm pretending to read here!!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah! How you doin'? Yeah alright!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, hey! You said you're gonna wear a thong, where's the thong?

Name: Charlie
Lines: I didn't mean a thong... I meant thongs...

Name: Joey
Lines: You really should have been more clear about that!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: Ross
Lines: You're never going to guess who I just saw downstairs!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh! ah! eh... Britney Spears!?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, she never misses these conferences!  No, I just saw Dr. Kenneth Schwartz!

Name: Charlie
Lines: Oh my God! Did you talk to him?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah... what am I going to say to Kenneth Schwartz?

Name: Joey
Lines: You could say: "Hey Kenny, how come you're not Britney Spears?"

Name: Ross
Lines: Ready to go?

Name: Charlie
Lines: Yeah!

Name: Joey
Lines: Wha...? You're gonna go now? I thought we could hang out?

Name: Charlie
Lines: Oh I can't... I have seminars all day and I promised Ross I would look at his speech.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Charlie
Lines: But maybe we can have dinner later? On the balcony? Will be romantic.

Name: Joey
Lines: Will you wear a thong?

Name: Charlie
Lines: I will if you will.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh... you got yourself a very weird deal!

Name: Charlie
Lines: So you'll be ok?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, yeah. I've got tons of stuff I could do. I'm gonna hit the beach, go swimming...

Name: Ross
Lines: Uh, Joe, have you looked outside?

Name: Joey
Lines: No, why?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh man!

Name: Charlie
Lines: There's an indoor pool, you can swim there!

Name: Joey
Lines: I wasn't gonna swim, I was gonna dig a hole!

Name: Monica
Lines: Wow! That Mike thing was interesting! I don't know what's gonna happen with Phoebe and David.

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok, I'm sensing that this is some kind of word play, because you are pink with barely controlled glee.

Name: Chandler
Lines: David is going to propose to Phoebe.

Name: Monica
Lines: What?  Why?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Be-cause, we were talking about ways that he could beat Mike and I told him that Phoebe wanted to get married.

Name: Monica
Lines: Chandler, we have talked about this. You are not supposed to give people advice! Now couldn't you just have made some sort of inappropriate joke?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I did! A penis one! Look, just so I know, what was so wrong about what I said?

Name: Monica
Lines: They've only been going out for a few weeks and Phoebe is completely hung up on Mike! She'll say "No", David's heart will be broken, it will be too hard for them to recover from and then Phoebe will end up alone again.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Man, that's some bad advice!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh! Hey! Thank God you guys are here!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey! Hey what's going on?

Name: Joey
Lines: Everything is upside down here! It rains all day long, nobody watches tv and Ross is famous!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Alright, I don't wanna alarm anybody, but Monica's hair is twice as big as it was when we landed!

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok! When I go places with high humidity, it gets a little extra body, ok?!

Name: Chandler
Lines: That's why our honeymoon photos look like me and Diana Ross!

Name: Joey
Lines: Come on, I'll show you guys where to check in

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, honey, can you make sure we get a King size bed!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh! David, get one for us too! Oh, oh, and see if they have a heart-shaped one! And with mirrors on the ceiling!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ooh! You guys are so lucky you are here with people, you known it's such a romantic place. That's all, I just wish I could  share that with a guy.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Not Joey.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Not Joey, no, I was just lusting after Chandler.

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, right!

Name: David
Lines: So, ehm... I'm proposing to Pheobe tonight.

Name: David
Lines: Yeah, well, being a failed scientist doesn't pay quite as well as you might think. That's uhm... one seventieth of a karat. And the clarity is uhm... is quite poor.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Monica, can I talk to you for a sec?

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok!

Name: Chandler
Lines: David is going to propose to Phoebe tonight!

Name: Monica
Lines: See what happens when you give people advice? I hope you told him not to?

Name: Chandler
Lines: That would be advice!!

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok fine. I'll handle this.  Phoebe?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah?

Name: Monica
Lines: I need to talk to you.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Are you leaving "The Supremes"?

Name: MOnica
Lines: Ok, my husband just gave your boyfriend some very bad advice. Look, David is going to propose to you tonight.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Wow? Really? That's fantastic!

Name: Monica
Lines: What are you serious? You wanna marry him? Wha... What about Mike?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, ok, you want me to marry Mike? Alright, well, let's just gag him and handcuff him and force him down the aisle. I can just see it: "Mike, do you take Phoebe..."  You know, it's every girl's dream!

Name: Monica
Lines: Do you really think marrying someone else is the right answer?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Sure! Look, ok, bottom line: I love Mike... David! David. I love David. Don't look at me that way, Roseanne Rosannadanna!

Name: Ross
Lines: By using CT scans and computer imaging we can in a very real way, bring the Mesozoic era into the 21st century.

Name: Charlie
Lines: It's great. You're gonna be the hit of the conference.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh and you know what, it will be even better tomorrow, because I won't be constantly interrupted by Joey checking to see if they put chocolates on my pillow yet. .

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey guys!

Name: Ross
Lines: The chocolates aren't here yet.

Name: Joey
Lines: Damnit!

Name: Charlie
Lines: Ross just read me his speech. It's fantastic!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, is it on the computer, cuz I'd love to give it a read...?

Name: Ross
Lines: If you want to check your email, just ask!

Name: Rachel
Lines: What's with the rain, Geller? I mean, when I signed up for Dino Week, nobody said anything about it being monsoon season.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Actually the wet season is June to December.

Name: Rachel
Lines: It's not the time Charlie.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, no, no, no dear God, no!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh what, did someone outbid you for the teapot?  Oh! Secret teapot?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Your computer, I don't know wha... everything's gone!

Name: Ross
Lines: Wha... what do you mean?

Name: Chandler
Lines: It must be a virus. I think it erased your hard drive.

Name: Ross
Lines: What, oh my God. What did you do?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Someone I don't know sent me an e-mail and I opened it.

Name: Ross
Lines: Why, why would you open it?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, it didn't say "This is a virus"!!

Name: Ross
Lines: What did it say?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Nude... ... pictures of Anna Kournikova. I'm so sorry.

Name: Ross
Lines: What... what am I gonna do? My speech is gone, Chandler!

Name: Chandler
Lines: It's not gone! I mean, I'm sure you printed out a copy. You have a hard copy, right?

Name: Ross
Lines: NO! I don't!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, you must be pretty mad at yourself right now...!

Name: Joey
Lines: It's really gone?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yep! I'd like to thank you guys for coming down here to complain about the rain and ruin my career!

Name: Chandler
Lines: I just feel awful.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, well you should! I mean, nude pictures of Anna Kournikova? I mean, she's never even won a major tournament!

Name: Ross
Lines: Get out!

Name: Rachel
Lines: You know, this happens all the time to my computer at work.

Name: Ross
Lines: Well, what do you do?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, I usually go... play Tetris on somebody else's computer.

Name: Ross
Lines: I can't believe this. I can't believe this is happening. I have to give the keynote speech tomorrow! Ok? I have to stand up in front of all these people. What am I gonna say?

Name: Joey
Lines: I could teach you a speech that I memorized for auditions.

Name: Ross
Lines: I don't think that your monologue from Star Wars is gonna help me right now, Joe!

Name: Charlie
Lines: Ross, we can solve this. I just heard your speech. We can recreate it! We've got all night!

Name: Ross
Lines: Wha... what you really think we can do that?

Name: Charlie
Lines: Oh wait, Joey and I are supposed to have dinner .

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey don't worry about that! I mean, Ross needs you! And Rachel and I will stay and help anyway we can.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ugh.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, oh! Any chance any of this happened in a "Galaxy far, far away"? .

Name: Mike
Lines: Hello?

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok, Mike, enough is enough, now you love Phoebe and she loves you, so you need to get over your whole "I never want to get married" thing and step up!

Name: Mike
Lines: Who is this?

Name: Monica
Lines: This is Monica! I'm Phoebe's friend. Listen, Phoebe is back with David and he's going to propose to her, and she is going to say "yes" but I know she really wants to be with you!

Name: Mike
Lines: He... he's gonna propose?

Name: Monica
Lines: I... I'm sorry, did you say something? I can't hear through all this damned hair!

Name: Mike
Lines: Look, if Phoebe wants to marry David, she should, I'm not gonna stand in the way of that and neither should you.

Name: Monica
Lines: You don't tell me what to do! I tell you what to do! Just call her. She's at the Paradise Hotel in Barbados. And while I've got you, you've got curly hair. What do you do in humidity?  Damnit!

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, I hope you're happy!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oooh! I hope you're happy too, honey!

Name: Monica
Lines: Phoebe is going to say "Yes" to David. See, that's what happens when you meddle in people's lives!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Phoebe is going to say "yes"? That's, that's great!

Name: Monica
Lines: No it's not, b'cause she's still in love with Mike!

Name: Chandler
Lines: And there's not chance that will work?

Name: Monica
Lines: No, I called him. It's not gonna happen.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oooooooh! Meddler! Meddler!

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, if you hadn't meddled to start with, I wouldn't have had to go in there and meddle myself. Now, no matter how much we meddle, we will never be able to un-meddle the thing that you meddled up - in the first place!

Name: Chandler
Lines: This vacation sucks!!

Name: Joey
Lines: I'm so bored! Stupid rain, we... we can't do anything.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, I've brought some books. We could read.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, it hasn't come to that yet.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey hey hey! Don't mind if I do!

Name: Waiter
Lines: I'm sorry sir, these are for the pharmaceutical convention

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey Rach, do you feel like going to a convention?

Name: Rachel
Lines: We can't. We're not pharmacists!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Kate Miller?

Name: Joey
Lines: Kate Miller it is.

Name: Rachel
Lines: And... that's the most sex I'm gonna have this weekend.

Name: Joey
Lines: In that case should I make sure it's on real good?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Thank you.

Name: Charlie
Lines: And then, and then you said that thing about, about bringing the Mesozoic era in the 21st century.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, that's it?

Name: Charlie
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh my God, we did it!

Name: Charlie
Lines: Actually I did it Ross. You remembered shockingly little of your own speech.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yes, but I did make a pyramid out of the bath products. This is amazing, thank you, thank you so much.  That's a pretty necklace.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Thank you.

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey, what do you say we celebrate? Champagne?

Name: Charlie
Lines: Oh yeah! Hey, save the cork and then we can fill the bottle with water and put it back so they don't charge you.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh my God, I love you.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Oh, this is such a cute picture of Emma. And is this your son... or just some kid whose picture you bring on vacation?

Name: Ross
Lines: That's Ben, my son from my first marriage.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Your first marriage?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Charlie
Lines: You're married more than once?

Name: Ross
Lines: No.

Name: Charlie
Lines: So, why did you break up?

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, it was... it's complicated, you know? She... she was... eh... gay.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Oh my God, this is so cool!

Name: Ross
Lines: Ok, odd thing to get excited about!

Name: Charlie
Lines: No, it's just... I was enganged to a guy who turned out to be gay!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey! High-five!

Name: Charlie
Lines: Didn't you feel so stupid that you didn't see the signs? My fianc was always going away on these long weekends with his tennis partner.

Name: Ross
Lines: My wife had a workout friend she went to the gym with everyday for a year. She didn't get any fitter.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Right and then everybody finds out and they're like: "Oh, I knew all along"

Name: Ross
Lines: I know! It's like, if you knew, why didn't you tell me, you know? I mean, call, or leave a note: "Hi, I just dropped by to say your wife's gay"

Name: Charlie
Lines: I know!

Name: Ross
Lines: And then, you try to make the best of a bad situation, so you float the idea of a threesome?

Name: Charlie
Lines: I didn't do that.

Name: Ross
Lines: Me neither.

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, who knew? Pharmacists are fun.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I know, that old lady at the end was ready to take you home.

Name: Joey
Lines: Not enough pills in the world, Rach. What about you, you're the single one, seen anybody in there you like?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, let's see. There was a really big guy that I was talking to, with the really nice breasts...

Name: Joey
Lines: But what about back home, anything going on there? Anybody you like?

Name: Rachel
Lines: No.

Name: Joey
Lines: There it is, you're blushing!

Name: Rachel
Lines: No, I'm not blushing, I'm sunburnt! From, you know, the rain.

Name: Joey
Lines: You like someone. Tell me who it is. Who is it?

Name: Rachel
Lines: No.

Name: Joey
Lines: Tell me who it is.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Joey!

Name: Joey
Lines: Come on who? Who do you like? Tell me. You're not getting away that easy. Who do you like, who?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Joey, come on! It doesn't matter, you know, it's not like anything's gonna happen.

Name: Joey
Lines: What? Why not? Rach, who can you not get?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh!  Ok. Ok, you really wanna know who it is?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, who is that?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Do ya?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Ross and Charlie
Lines: Hey!

Name: Charlie
Lines: I just left you a message! Ross and I were gonna go grab a bite, but now that you're here, maybe we can go have that dinner.

Name: Joey
Lines: Right, of course. Hey, did you guys finish the speech?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yep, we got it, we got it.  Thank you so much.

Name: Charlie
Lines: I had a great time.

Name: Joey
Lines: Alright, hey look, and this isn't over, because I really wanna know who...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Later! La...

Name: Charlie
Lines: So, shall we?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok. See you, bye.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Bye.

Name: Ross
Lines: Good night.

Name: Joey
Lines: Night.

Name: Ross and Rachel
Lines: Ok, good night!

Name: Monica
Lines: I can't believe she's gonna say yes to David. She's clearly in love with Mike.

Name: Chandler
Lines: You know, it's very hard to take you seriously when you look like that.

Name: David
Lines: Uh, Phoebe, uh, I have... something I wanna say.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh my God, he's gonna do it now. Please, I cannot watch this, let's go.

Name: Chandler
Lines: I think we have some time. Have you ever heard him talk?  "Uh, Phoebe, uh, I would be honoured, uh..." Spit it out, David!

Name: David
Lines: Uh, Phoebe, uh...  you're an amazing woman, and the time we spent apart was, was unbearable. Of course the sanitation strikes in Minsk didn't help!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Sure, ok, yeah.

Name: David
Lines: But well, now that we're together again, I don't ever want to be apart. So, to that end...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh my God, Mike!

Name: David
Lines: It's David, actually!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, Mike's here.

Name: David
Lines: Hi Mike!

Name: Mike
Lines: Hi David. Chandler. Monica...  Oh!

Name: Monica
Lines: IT'S THE HUMIDITY!

Name: Mike
Lines: Hi Phoebe.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: What are you, what are you doing here?

Name: Mike
Lines: I have a question I need to ask you.

Name: David
Lines: I have a question I was kinda gonna ask her myself.

Name: Mike
Lines: Yeah, I understand, but before you do, she really needs to hear this.

Name: David
Lines: Ok, would you care for my seat as well?

Name: Mike
Lines: Actually yeah, that'll be great.

Name: David
Lines: That's fair, you've had a long trip.

Name: Mike
Lines: Phoebe, I love you. I mean, I missed you so much these last few months and I thought we were apart for a good reason, but then I suddenly realized that there was no reason good enough to keep me from spending the rest of my life with you.

Name: David
Lines: Kinda stepped on the toes of what I was going to say.

Name: Mike
Lines: Sorry David, but she really has to know this.

Name: David
Lines: Alright, but after this I want to see you outside. If the rain stops.

Name: Monica
Lines: You're the most incredible woman I've ever met. How can I lose you?  Now, I don't actually have a ring...

Name: David
Lines: I have a ring.

Name: Chandler
Lines: I wouldn't brag too much about that thing, big guy.

Name: David
Lines: Phoebe, will you marry me?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No!

Name: David
Lines: Uhm... Ha ha!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I love you. But I never needed a proposal from you. I just needed to know that we were headed somewhere, you know, that we had a future.

Name: Mike
Lines: We can have any future you want.

Name: David
Lines: Ok, I'm gonna take off.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: David, I'm so sorry, I'm sorry.

Name: David
Lines: Just so I know, if I had asked first...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I might have said yes, but that would have been wrong.

Name: David
Lines: Please, you don't have to explain. I mean, perhaps if I hadn't gone to Minsk things would have worked out for us. And I wouldn't have ruined my career, or lost that toe to frostbite. It was a good trip!

Name: Mike
Lines: Is it ok if I hug you now?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yes!

Name: Monica
Lines: BECAUSE OF OUR MEDDLING! Alright?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, ain't this nice? It's so quiet, I could just lie here all day.

Name: Monica
Lines: I know

Name: Rachel
Lines: Open your drapes! Open your drapes!

Name: Chandler
Lines: I'm so glad we've got adjoining rooms!

Name: Monica
Lines: The sun is out!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey! Remember when I had corneas?

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok listen, you go down to the pool and reserve the chairs, and I'll get the magazines and the lotion.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ladies? Ross's speech is in 45 minutes.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Nooo!

Name: Monica
Lines: Damn it!

Name: Ross
Lines: Walls are pretty thin, guys!

Name: Ross
Lines: Then we have to await the data from recent MRI scans and DNA testing which call into question information gathered from years of simple carbon dating.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Look at that woman sitting by the pool getting tan... so leathery and wrinkled, I'm so jealous!

Name: Ross
Lines: Finally, factoring the profusion of new species recently discovered: Gigantosaurus, Argentinasaurus...

Name: Chandler
Lines: Not to mention the cold sores.

Name: Ross
Lines: And that's just the herbivores. I'm not even gonna discuss the carnivores, their heads are already too big. Which is ironic considering their stunted cerebral development.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Really?

Name: Charlie
Lines: What?

Name: Joey
Lines: He said "erectus"!

Name: Charlie

Lines: Oh my God, oh my God, that letter is gonna go in our file! We're never gonna get a kid. No, we're gonna be one of those old couples that collects orchids or has a lot of birds!

Lines: Oh, I'm so excited, I mean, apparently I beat out hundreds of other applicants, included five guys I went to graduate school with. Not   that I'm keeping score or anything... five!

Lines: Well, ok, it's for 25 thousand dollars. And if I get it, I'll finally be able to complete my field research! And there will be  an article about me in the "Paleontology Review"! Yeah! That'll be  the first time my name is in there, without people raising serious questions about my work!

Name: Benjamin
Lines: Oh, well, likewise. Actually, not likewise. I've never heard of you until this morning, but, it's nice to be nice!

Name: Charlie

Lines: The selection committee has chosen the three of you as our finalists today. The ultimate decision will be based upon the answers you give to the questions I ask here. I'm gonna start with Dr. Li. Dr. Li, you claim the field is too reliant on the Linnaean taxonomic system. How do you propose to correct this problem?

Lines: Well, I believe that the answers lie in the osteological evidence. I plan to begin there.

Lines: Interesting.

Lines: Primarily in the Pierre Shale region of South Dakota.
