Lines: Certainly. Very well. And Dr. Geller, when is my birthday?

Name: Benjamin
Lines: Care to venture a guess?

Name: Ross
Lines: May 12th?

Name: Dr. Li
Lines: Half a dozen.

Name: Benjamin
Lines: I see, and Dr. Biely?

Name: Dr. Biely
Lines: Three for excavation and two for analysis.

Name: Benjamin
Lines: Certainly. Dr. Geller, which 1965 Shirelles hit was later covered by a popular British invasion band?

Name: Ross
Lines: Wha..? I need 6 graduate students.

Name: Benjamin
Lines: No! I'm sorry, we were looking for "Baby It's You". Baby It's You.

Name: Ross
Lines: Wha...? Wait, wait, wait, just a minute. None of my questions have anything to do with Paleontology.

Name: Benjamin
Lines: You're right, I apologize. Scratch the last question. Spell "Boscodictiasaur".

Name: Ross
Lines: um... I've never heard of a "Boscodictiasaur".

Name: Benjamin
Lines: Yeah, I just made it up. Spell it.

Name: Benjamin
Lines: No, it starts with a silent "M".

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh come on!!

Name: Chandler
Lines: I can't believe Joey. I hate being called a liar!

Name: Rachel
Lines: But you are a liar.

Name: Chandler
Lines: What did I just say?

Name: Joey
Lines: You still here?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yes, and I have to say, I am not just hurt. I am insulted. When I tell somebody I did something...

Name: Chandler
Lines: Why are you so sure I didn't watch this tape?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, this is going well.

Name: Chandler
Lines: He really is a chameleon.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, my!

Name: Monica
Lines: I haven't really settled on a spot yet!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, hey! How about right above the TV? . That way, it will be the first thing that you see when you walk in the door!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, yeah! And you can get rid of that French poster.

Name: Monica
Lines: I like that poster!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Really? It doesn't have anything coming out of it. Or maybe there is some place for her in your bedroom?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh! There's nothing above your bed!!

Name: Monica
Lines: Are you still here?

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh hi! Hello! Uh, have you come to ask me some more paleontology related questions? Uhm... your grandmother's nickname, perhaps?  Aunt Margaret's pants size?

Name: Benjamin
Lines: I've come here to apologize. I think I may have let my feelings for Charlie interfere with the interview process.

Name: Ross
Lines: No! Stop!

Name: Benjamin
Lines: Anyway, I've decided to offer you the grant.

Name: Ross
Lines: Really?

Name: Benjamin
Lines: Well... there is just one small... stipulation...

Name: Ross
Lines: I have to break up with Charlie?

Name: Benjamin
Lines: Hey, you got one right!

Name: Ross
Lines: You're crazy.

Name: Benjamin
Lines: Crazy, or... romantic?

Name: Ross
Lines: Crazy!

Name: Benjamin
Lines: Ooor...

Name: Rachel
Lines: O-oh my God!

Name: Joey
Lines: What?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Joey, what... is... this...thing... doing here?

Name: Joey
Lines: I got it from Monica. She sold it to me for a very reasonable price.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Joey, we're not keeping this!

Name: Joey
Lines: But it's an original Buffay...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Alright, fine. You can keep it. As long as you don't mind that she's haunted.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey? what? what? wey! whoo! what? what!?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, legend has it Joey, that... she comes alive when you're asleep.

Name: Rachel
Lines: She climbs out of the frame, and then drags her half-a-body across the floor, just looking for legs to steal.  And then with her one good hand, she slo-o-owly re-e-a-aches up and turns your doorknob.

Name: Joey
Lines: GET THAT LEGLESS WITCH OUT OF HERE!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey! I sold that to Joey.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, why I told him it's haunted. Two can play at this game.

Name: Monica
Lines: No, too late. You can't give it back!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yes I can!

Name: Monica
Lines: No you can't. She's yours!

Name: Rachel
Lines: She's yours!

Name: Monica
Lines: SHE'S YOURS!

Name: Rachel
Lines: She's yours!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: Rachel
Lines: She's mine!

Name: Monica
Lines: She's m-i-i-ne!

Name: Rachel
Lines: She's mine!

Name: Monica
Lines: She's mine!

Name: Rachel
Lines: I want Gladys!

Name: Monica
Lines: She's mine!

Name: Rachel
Lines: She's mine!

Name: Monica
Lines: She's mine!

Name: Rachel
Lines: She's mine!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Look, I'm sorry I didn't give them your tape. And I promise, next time to submit you whether I think you are right for the part or not.

Name: Joey
Lines: That's not the point Chandler. The point is that you lied.

Name: Chandler
Lines: I know. You're right. What's it gonna take for you to forgive me?

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Excellent!

Name: Joey
Lines: Now, what do you say?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Lying is wrong!

Name: Joey
Lines: And?... AND?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I'm a pretty little girl.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I knew it!

Name: Ross
Lines: Your ex-boyfriend is insane.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Did you get the grant?

Name: Ross
Lines: No I didn't, and you want to know why? Because your ex-boyfriend is still in love with you.

Name: Charlie
Lines: What?

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah. He wouldn't give me the grant, because I wouldn't give you up.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Benji isn't in love with me. I mean, he broke up with me. And besides, he's a very ethical man.

Name: Ross
Lines: Really? Is it ethical to ask someone in a grant review, who was the voice of "Underdog"?

Name: Charlie
Lines: I'm sure he was just joking, Ross.

Name: Ross
Lines: If you don't believe me, let's go talk to him, okay? I'm telling you, he didn't ask me one paleontological question.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Seriously?

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, I'm sorry, no. He did ask me one. Uhm... How do you spell Mboscodictiosaur?

Name: Charlie
Lines: Well, if it's like the lake Mbosco in Congo, then M-B-O...

Name: Ross
Lines: Damnit!

Name: Benjamin
Lines: Dr. Geller...? Charlie... What are you... what are you doing here?

Name: Ross
Lines: I want you to tell her everything. About the deal you tried to make with me, about the crazy questions you... Wally Cox! That's the voice of Underdog!

Name: Benjamin
Lines: Like I tried to tell you in the interview Ross, this grant is not based on your knowledge of pretty useless trivia.

Name: Ross
Lines: No, no, no. Don't do that! I want you to look her in the eyes, and tell her the truth.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Benji?

Name: Benjamin
Lines: Alright, it's true. I behaved horribly. But it's only because I still love you. And I would do anything to have you back in my life.

Name: Ross
Lines: Too little, too late, Benji!

Name: Charlie
Lines: I can't believe this.

Name: Benjamin
Lines: I never should have broken up with you. I think about you all the time. I mean, do you ever still think about me?

Name: Ross
Lines: No!

Name: Charlie
Lines: Yes!

Name: Ross
Lines: What?

Name: Charlie
Lines: I don't know what to say, Benji. This is all so.... romantic.

Name: Ross
Lines: or...

Name: Benjamin
Lines: Listen, I know, I may be way out of bounds here, but is there any chance you will take me back?

Name: Charlie
Lines: Maybe...

Name: Ross
Lines: Sweetie, this conversation is starting to make me a little uncomfortable.

Name: Charlie
Lines: Oh God! I am so sorry, but...  I mean it's... there's so much history between us, you know...

Name: Benjamin
Lines: I'm sorry too...

Name: Benjamin
Lines: I love you!

Name: Charlie
Lines: I love you too!

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay, that's it. WE ARE SEEING OTHER PEOPLE!

Name: Joey
Lines: Gladys?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ha ha ha, third time this week. Man, this does not get old.

Name: Joey
Lines: You're mean!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, don't be such a baby!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey you guys!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey, what are you doing?

Name: Mike
Lines: Oh, figuring out our wedding plans.

Name: Chandler
Lines: That's funny, we were doing the same thing!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: It's really crazy! The hall, the dress, the food... I-I had no idea how expensive this stuff was!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah it is really pricey. I mean, I freaked when I first heard the numbers.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So what did you two do about it?

Name: Chandler
Lines: It was pretty simple actually, I came up with a couple of cost-cutting solutions, wrote out a list and Monica told me to go to hell.

Name: Ross
Lines: There's no way around it Pheebs, you just gonna have to accept the fact that this is gonna cost you a lot of money.

Name: Mike
Lines: I heard that weddings are like a 40 billion dollar a year industry.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, and I'm responsible for just like half of that.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: But really, it does seem like this money could be put to better use?

Name: Mike
Lines: Are you serious?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah! Now, how would you feel if we gave all the wedding money to charity and we just got married at City Hall?

Name: Mike
Lines: I think it would make me wanna marry you even more.

Name: Ross
Lines: I've got to say you guys, that's an incredible gesture!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Maybe you do that next time you get married!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: Joey
Lines: What's going on?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Our adoption social worker is coming by today so we are cleaning the apartment.

Name: Monica
Lines: We?

Name: Chandler
Lines: You know you don't want me to help. You can't have it both ways!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, is this person who decides whether or not you... get a baby?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Kind of. She's coming by to interview us and see where we live.

Name: Monica
Lines: And it has to go perfectly, because if she doesn't like something about us she can keep us off every adoption list in the state.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey, maybe I should stop by! She could be a soap opera fan! It's very impressive when the little people know a celebrity.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Little people?

Name: Joey
Lines: Celebrity.

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok, so I think I'm just about done here, unless you have any bad stuff hidden somewhere, like... porn or cigarettes?

Name: Chandler
Lines: What...? NO!

Name: Monica
Lines: Chandler?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I don't, and I'm offended by the insinuation!

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok, so there's not a magazine under the couch, or a pack of cigarettes taped to the back of the toilet tank, or a filthy video in the VCR?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I'll admit to the cigarettes and the magazine, but that tape is not mine.

Name: Monica
Lines: It isn't mine!

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, I guess we'll never know whose it is!

Name: Charity guy
Lines: May I help you?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yes. We're here to make a rather sizeable donation to the children.

Name: Charity guy
Lines: Well, any contribution, large or small, is always appreciated.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, I think you're gonna appreciate it the crap out of this one

Name: Charity guy
Lines: Well, this is very generous!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: And we don't want any recognition. This is completely anonymous.

Name: Mike
Lines: Completely anonymous. From two kind strangers.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Mr. X and Phoebe Buffay.

Name: Charity guy
Lines: Well if you like, we can include your names in our newsletter.

Name: Mike
Lines: Not necessary.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Buffay is spelled B-U-F-F-A-Y.

Name: Mike
Lines: And "X" is spelled uhm... "Mike Hannigan".

Name: Charity guy
Lines: Right. Well, on behalf of the children: thank you both very much.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Sure, I so glad we did this. It feels so good!

Name: Mike
Lines: It does. It feels really good!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, look! And we get these free t-shirts!

Name: Charity guy
Lines: Oh, actually, that's the shirt I wore to the gym.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Mhm... it's moist.

Name: Ross
Lines: Hi!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi! Emma will be up in a minute!

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, good!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh hey Ross... Listen, I heard about you and Charlie. I'm really sorry.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, that's OK. I'm sure there are tons of other beautiful paleontologists out there.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Absolutely.

Name: Ross
Lines: There was one! She's it! All the rest look like they should live under a bridge!

Name: Rachel
Lines: So, uhm... what are you gonna do today?

Name: Ross
Lines: Well, I was thinking of taking Emma to the playground!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh my God, what!?

Name: Ross
Lines: Like I said I was thinking of taking Emma to the museum of knives and fire!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok, look, Ross. I do not want Emma going to the playground.

Name: Ross
Lines: Be-caaauuuse...

Name: Rachel
Lines: All right, well, if you must know... I had a traumatic... swing incident... when I was little.

Name: Ross
Lines: Seriously?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yes, I was 4 years old and I was on the swing and then all of a sudden my hair got tangled in the chain. And to get me out my mom had to-had to cut a big chunk of my hair!  And it was uneven for weeks!

Name: Ross
Lines: And you made it through that? I wonder who's gonna play you in the movie!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok, fine! You can make fun of me. I do not want Emma going there. And I was thinking Claire Danes.

Name: Ross
Lines: Look, I'm sorry to hear about your tragedy, ok? But the swings are perfectly safe, and besides Emma loves them. You know what, you should come with us and you'll see!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ross, those things go like 40 miles an hour! Ok? When you're... and there is that moment when you are at the top, when you just don't know if you're gonna return back to earth!

Name: Ross
Lines: Space is filled with orbiting children.  Look, please, just come on, you know, when youll see the look on Emmas face, I swear you wont regret it.

Name: Rachel
Lines: All right!

Name: Ross
Lines: Good, you dont want to be one of those mothers who pass on their irrational fears on their children, do you?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Irrational, huh? All right, well, Ill remember that the next time you freak out about a spider in your apartment!

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, yeah, thats the same, I am sure there are thirty different species of poisonous swings!

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh my God, the adoption lady is early!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ok, ok, here we go.

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hello, is this the creepy residence?

Name: Monica
Lines: Were waiting for the adoption lady, but, hey, Im glad youre here. I was cleaning this morning and I found this . I dont know if you wanna use it, but

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Awe, this is so sweet of you! But you know what? I wont be needing a veil, I actually wont be wearing a dress at all!

Name: Monica
Lines: I told you! I am not coming to a naked wedding!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, no, no, were not having a big reception, we took the money we were gonna spend on a wedding and we donate them to the children charity.

Name: Monica
Lines: Thats crazy! . I am sorry. I just cant imagine giving up my one wedding day like that!

Name: Monica
Lines: Thats right. Youre making a commitment and thats the same, whether you do that at the Plaza or, where are you gonna do it?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: City Hall.

Name: Monica
Lines: Ow!  Oh, that sounds nice! I am just there for jury duty. They really spruce that place up!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Its ok, its ok. I made my decision. What I really want is a great big wedding

Name: Monica
Lines: Yay!

Name: Chandler
Lines: But you already gave all your money to charity!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, Ill just ask for it back!

Name: Chandler
Lines: I dont think you can do that!

Name: Monica
Lines: Why not! This is her wedding day, this is way more important than some stupid kids!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Thats sweet, honey, but save something for the adoption Lady.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok, careful.

Name: Ross
Lines: Ok.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Careful, watch her hair. WATCH HER HAIR!

Name: Ross
Lines: Rach, shes got like three hairs!

Name: Rachel
Lines: I know  but theyre just so beautiful! Oh, my God, I just pulled one out.

Name: Ross
Lines: I promise you shes safe! No watch how much she loves this.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok.

Name: Ross
Lines: Ready sweety?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok.

Name: Ross
Lines: Here we go!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok, careful, ok.  Oh, shes smiling! Oh my God, she does like it!

Name: Ross
Lines: See, I told you!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Awe!  Oh my God! Looks, shes a little dare-devil! Oh, let me push, can I push?

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, absolutely!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok. Oh God.  Get the camera, its in the diaper bag.

Name: Mike
Lines: Were seriously asking for our money back?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Its for our wedding day! Right, now, is this guy gay or straight, because one of us gonna have to start flirting.

Name: Charity guy
Lines: Wow! Are you here to make another donation the same day? I dont think that thats ever happened before.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Gay, go.

Name: Mike
Lines: Oh my God, I love your shirt!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: The donation we made earlier, we k, we w, we want it back.

Name: Charity guy
Lines: Excuse me?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah. See, that money was for a big wedding, that we thought we didnt want, but it turns out we do.

Name: Charity guy
Lines: So youre asking us to refund your donation to the children?

Name: Mike
Lines: Yeah! This feels really good.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I am sorry. I am, but this wedding is just really important to me.

Name: Charity guy
Lines: Hey, its not my business,  besides its probably a good thing. We really would have been spoiling the children, all those food, and warm clothing

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey, thats not fair! A persons wedding is important! And especially to me! Ok? I didnt have a graduation party! And I didnt go to Prom. And I spent my sweet sixteen being chased round a tire yard by an escaped mental patient who is his own words wanted to kill me or whatever. So I deserve a real celebration and I am not gonna let some sweaty little man make me feel badly about it.

Name: Mike
Lines: She could have been talking about either one of us.

Name: Laura
Lines: Hi, I am Laura, I am here for your adoption interview.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hi, I am Monica and this is Chandler. Please come in.

Name: Laura
Lines: Thank you!

Name: Monica
Lines: Would you like something to drink?

Name: Laura
Lines: Oh, water would be fine.

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok. Great. I am so glad that you are here. Were really excited about getting this process started.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, because we love kids. Love em to death.Well, not actually to death, that's just a figure of speech - we love kids the appropriate amount... as allowed by law.

Name: Laura
Lines: Your place is just lovely.

Name: Monica
Lines: Ah, thank you. This building does have a wholesome family feel to it.

Name: Laura
Lines: You know, I... I feel like I've been here before. Are any other couples in the building adopting?

Name: Monica
Lines: Is that that couple on the first floor? Because we should get a baby before them. Yeah! That guy tried to sell me drugs.

Name: Chandler
Lines: But other than that... wholesome, wholesome building.

Name: Laura
Lines: Oh...

Name: Chandler
Lines: What?

Name: Laura
Lines: I just realized why I remember this place.

Name: Monica
Lines: Really? What is it?

Name: Laura
Lines: Oh, it's nothing. I went on a date with a guy who lived in this building and it didn't end very well.

Name: Monica
Lines: Ohh... that wouldn't by any chance be... Joey Tribbiani?

Name: Laura
Lines: Yes!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Of course it was!

Name: Laura
Lines: Yeah, we had a really great night and in the morning he promised he would call me and he didn't.

Name: Chandler
Lines: RAT BASTARD!

Name: Laura
Lines: So you're not friends with him?

Name: Monica and Chandler
Lines: OH GOD NO! Nope, no, no, no. No! No, no. Nope! No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no. NO!  No!

Name: Laura
Lines: Well, I'm sorry I brought it up. So, are either one of you planning on staying at home with your child...

Name: Laura
Lines: What was that?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, it's just some crazy guy who roams the halls here. He's great with kids though.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, oh Ross, oh my God, are you okay?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ross, see! I told you, those swings are evil! Alright, that is it. That is the last time Emma is getting on one of those things for her entire life.

Name: Ross
Lines: No! No, no, no, no, okay, it wasn't the swing's fault. It was my fault and kind of that  kids fault. Who is still laughing. Nice.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ross, c'mon, please. Can we just get out of here, before somebody else gets hurt?

Name: Ross
Lines: No wait, okay, okay, I have an idea. I want you to get on the swing, okay? And you'll see that there's nothing to be afraid of.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I know what this is all about... You've always been jealous of my hair.

Name: Ross
Lines: Look, I just think you're an adult, okay? And you should get over your silly fears.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Alright fine. I'll do it.

Name: Ross
Lines: Good.

Name: Rachel
Lines: If you hold a spider.

Name: Ross
Lines: WHAT? WHERE? WHERE?

Name: Rachel
Lines: IF you hold a spider.

Name: Ross
Lines: I know.

Name: Joey
Lines: Guys? Everything ok? It's me, Joe...

Name: Chandler
Lines: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA......AAAaaa-doption!!

Name: Laura
Lines: What's going on?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, just like I said. That crazy... Bert... roaming the halls.

Name: Joey
Lines: Guys!?

Name: Monica
Lines: Keep on roaming Bert! We don't want any crazy today!

Name: Joey
Lines: What's going on?

Name: Chandler
Lines: WE'LL TALK TO YOU LATER, BERT. EVERYTHNG'S FINE!!

Name: Joey
Lines: Everything doesn't sound fine!

Name: Laura
Lines: Is he alright out there by himself?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh yeah! He has a caretaker. His older brother... Ernie.

Name: Laura
Lines: Bert and Ernie!

Name: Chandler
Lines: You can't make this stuff up!

Name: Mike
Lines: You never told me about that guy on your sweet sixteen. Oh, ugh. I'm sorry about that.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh! It ended okay. One of my friends shot him.

Name: Mike
Lines: Well, hey, at least you're getting a proper wedding. I mean, you really deserve that.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I really do. You know, I had nothing growing up.  Just like the kids I took the money from.

Name: Mike
Lines: No! No, no. I see where this is going. Don't make me go back there.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Look, I can't have a wedding with this money now. It's tainted.

Name: Mike
Lines: Alright, fine. We'll give the money back.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: And if that guy at the charity gives us a hard time, my friend hasn't shot anyone in a really long time.

Name: [Scene
Lines: Monica and Chandler's. They are preparing to show Laura around. Laura is standing with her back to the window, Chandler and Monica are standing on either side of her, facing each other.

Name: Laura
Lines: Well, I must say, this seems like a lovely environment to raise a child in.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, by the way, you are more than welcome to look under any of the furniture, because, believe me, you won't find any porn or cigarettes under there!

Name: Laura
Lines: Oh! Well, actually, before we look around, let me make sure I have everything I need up to here...

Name: Monica
Lines: Why don't I show you the baby's room?

Name: Chandler
Lines: What the hell are you doing?

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, you wouldn't let me in, so I thought you were in trouble.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, we're not.

Name: Joey
Lines: But you called me 'Bert'!? That's our code word for danger!

Name: Chandler
Lines: We don't have a code word.

Name: Joey
Lines: We don't? We really should. From now on, 'Bert' will be our code word for danger.

Name: Monica
Lines: So that was the baby's room.

Name: Monica
Lines: What room should we see next?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Any room that isn't behind this couch!

Name: Joey
Lines: I did not care for that!

Name: Chandler
Lines: You have to get out of here. You slept with our social worker and you never called her back and she is still pissed, so she can't see you.

Name: Joey
Lines: Ok, ok!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ok!

Name: Chandler
Lines: What?

Name: Joey
Lines: I forgot my bat.

Name: Laura
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: Chandler
Lines: And for the last time, we do not want to be friends with you! And we don't want to buy your bat!

Name: Laura
Lines: What are you doing here?

Name: Joey
Lines: Bert! Bert! Bert! Bert!

Name: Laura
Lines: Are you friends with him?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I can explain... Joey...

Name: Joey
Lines: Uhm... ok... uhm... Well, yeah... You have got some nerve, coming back here. I can't believe you never called me.

Name: Laura
Lines: Excuse me?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh... yeah... Probably you don't even remember my name. It's Joey, by the way. And don't bother telling me yours, because I totally remember it... lady. Yeah! I waited weeks for you to call me.

Name: Laura
Lines: I gave you my number, you never called me.

Name: Joey
Lines: No, no! Don't try to turn this around on me, ok? I'm not some kind of... social work, ok, that you can just... do.

Name: Laura
Lines: Well, I'm pretty sure I gave you my number.

Name: Joey
Lines: Really? Think about it. Come on! You're a beautiful woman, smart, funny, we had a really good time, huh? If I had your number, why wouldn't I call you?

Name: Laura
Lines: I don't know... Well, maybe I'm wrong... I'm sorry...

Name: Joey
Lines: No, no, hey, no! Too late for apologies... ok? You broke my heart. You know how many women I had to sleep with to get over you?

Name: Laura
Lines: Joey, wait!

Name: Laura
Lines: I'm sorry that you had to see that. I'm so embarrassed...

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, that's really ok.

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, that we totally understand. Dating is hard.

Name: Laura
Lines: Boy, you people are nice... And I've got to say... I think you're going to make excellent parents.

Name: Joey
Lines: LAURA!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: We're back!

Name: Charity guy
Lines: Are you here to take more money? Because, I think what you're looking for is an ATM.

Name: Mike
Lines: No, no, we're here to give the money back.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, because you know what, it's... it's all about the children.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Although... it's also about the wedding... Ugh, alright... here.  No... Oh God... Oh!

Name: Charity guy
Lines: If I haven't said so already sir,  congratulations!

Name: Charity guy
Lines: You know what? It's not your decision anymore.

Name: Mike
Lines: What?

Name: Charity guy
Lines: On behalf of the Children of New York, I reject your money.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: But... but... but we're giving you this!

Name: Charity guy
Lines: Yeah... And I'm giving it back to you... Come on! Consider it a contribution.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, this is very generous!

Name: Charity guy
Lines: Please, take the check, go have a great wedding and a wonderful life together.

Name: Mike
Lines: Well, I mean... It sounds good to me. And that way we can save up, come back in a few years and make an even bigger donation.

Name: Charity guy
Lines: Absolutely! And when you do, make sure you ask for Brian.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, is that you?

Name: Charity guy
Lines: No!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hello...? Oh hi... Oh my God...! Really...? I can't wait to tell Chandler... Ok, goodbye.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Wrong number?

Name: Monica
Lines: It was Laura... She gave us a great report and we are officially on the waiting list.

Name: Chandler
Lines: That's great!

Name: Monica
Lines: Now we just have to wait for a call and... and someone tells us there's a baby waiting for us. Oh...

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hello...? Have you seen Joey's bat?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok... I got a spider. There were two, I picked the bigger one.

Name: Ross
Lines: Ok...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok...

Name: Ross
Lines: This feels perfectly normal. Ok, get on the swing!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ok...

Name: Rachel
Lines: whoo... ok... wow... ok... OH!

Name: Ross
Lines: See?

Name: Rachel
Lines: A-alright! I can do this.

Name: Ross
Lines: There you go! Good for you! And you know what, I'm actually getting used to this little guy. I don't really even feel him in here anymore.

Name: Rachel
Lines: That's because he's on your neck.

Name: Ross
Lines: Well...  Whaa... aaah... aaahhh...

Name: Rachel
Lines: ROSS!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey guys!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: Monica
Lines: We need to talk to you about something.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah. We don't feel like we can host Thanksgiving this year.

Name: All
Lines: What?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: Ross
Lines: Are you kidding?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, it's just with uhm, work and the stress of adoption, we just don't feel like we have the energy. Plus, we don't think it's fair that every year the burden falls on us.

Name: Ross
Lines: That doesn't sound like you... That's Monica talking!

Name: Chandler
Lines: No, no! We made this decision together.

Name: Ross
Lines: She's putting words in your mouth!

Name: Joey
Lines: Don't you put words in people's mouths, you put turkey in people's mouths!

Name: Rachel
Lines: I can't believe this! This is Emma's first Thanksgiving!

Name: Monica
Lines: No, it's not!

Name: Rachel
Lines: It's not?  When was she born?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, personally I think it's great you're giving yourself a break.

Name: Monica
Lines: Thank you, Pheebs!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Sure. It's just as well... I mean, last year wasn't very good. I think she's losing her touch.

Name: Monica
Lines: What? You are way off, lady!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Am I? Really? Am I? Well, why don't you cook Thanksgiving dinner and prove me wrong! Well, think about it, think about it, you'll be trying to top than you did last year. You'd be in competition... with yourself.

Name: Monica
Lines: That's my favourite kind! Okay, we are doing this!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Don't let yourself get manipulated this way!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey, stay out of this, Chandler! This is between me... and ME!

Name: Chandler
Lines: We are supposed to make these decisions together! Did you not watch the Doctor Phil I taped for you?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hi! Happy Thanksgiving!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, yeah, happy needless-turkey-murder day.

Name: Monica
Lines: You guys, I ordered some chocolate pies from that bakery on Bleecker. Could you pick them up for me?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: You're not making the pies yourself?

Name: Monica
Lines: No, no, no, I don't make chocolate pies. When I was younger I-I enter in this pie-eating contest. I ate so many that just the thought of them made me sick.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Did you at least win the contest?

Name: Monica
Lines: 2 minutes, 12 pies and a part of one tin! Okay, I see you guys at 4.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Can't wait!

Name: Monica
Lines: This dinner is gonna be so great! In your face, last year "me"!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey Rach.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: What's Emma doing today?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, let's see... uh... I know that she has a meeting with her lawyer and then she has to make a very big poop. Why?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, I wanna enter her in a baby beauty pageant.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh my God! That's the creepiest thing I've ever heard!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, but, well, before you say no, my friend Susanne is entering her kid and compared to Emma she's a real dog!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh! Phoebe, all babies are beautiful!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh... okay.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Phoebe, just the idea of pitting one baby against another, I mean, you know, and judging who's cuter just for a trophy...

Name: Rachel
Lines: And a thousand dollars.

Name: Rachel
Lines: ...is something I'm very interested in! Oh please, do not tell Ross. He still believes that  what's in the inside is important...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, oh, and Emma needs a cowgirl outfit for the competition.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Where am I gonna get a cowgirl outfit on Thanksgiving?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, I was thinking...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, take the clothes of Joey's Cabbage Patch Kid.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah!

Name: Monica
Lines: Did someone drop the baton again?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Why come all the way from Kansas to do that?

Name: Monica
Lines: I don't get older. I just get better!

Name: Chandler
Lines: You know what just occurred to me? This could be our last Thanksgiving just the two of us. I mean, we could be getting a baby soon!

Name: Monica
Lines: You don't know that.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Somebody is gonna pick us.

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, but we haven't heard a thing from the adoption agency and it has been weeks!

Name: Chandler
Lines: I'm telling ya! It's gonna happen. Next year it's gonna be you, me and the little Hemingway Bing.  What, he's my favourite author!

Name: Monica
Lines: Name one of his books.

Name: Chandler
Lines: "The Firm"?

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok, let's see... uhm, okay, the turkey is in the oven, the stuffing is ready...

Name: Chandler
Lines: You know, you always cook this meal all by yourself. Let me help this year.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, Chandler, that's sweet. But you don't have to do everything Doctor Phil tells you to do.

Name: Chandler
Lines: I'm serious, let me do something, just not the turkey or the stuffing, nothing "high profile".

Name: Monica
Lines: Ok, let's see... Oh, the cranberry sauce, it is easy to make and no-one really cares about it.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Tell me more.

Name: Chandler
Lines: You obviously haven't tasted my Palmolive potatoes!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey! Hey, guess what Joey has!

Name: Joey
Lines: Three tickets to today's Rangers game!!

Name: Ross
Lines: Dude, I wanted him to guess.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, they're great seats too!

Name: Ross
Lines: Guess where they are?

Name: Joey
Lines: Center ice.

Name: Ross
Lines: Did I do something to you?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hmm, the game's at one.

Name: Ross
Lines: So?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Dinner is at four, we'll never gonna make it back.

Name: Joey
Lines: So we'll leave before it's over, we'll be back in time.

Name: Chandler
Lines: You say that now, but it could take us a long time to get back home. Plus Joey could get lost and and they could have to page us to go pick him up.

Name: Joey
Lines: Dude, two times that happened!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Look, Monica has been working hard all day, she didn't wanna host this thing in the first place, we shouldn't go!

Name: Ross
Lines: He's right, man.

Name: Joey
Lines: Right, I guess. Alright, so see you at four.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay.  And get ready to taste my very special cranberries. Or should I say... chanberries!

Name: Joey
Lines: That's some gentle comedy, dude.

Name: Ross
Lines: We're still going at the game, right?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Host
Lines: This is contestant number sixteen, Rebecca...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh Phoebe, listen. Well, I think we gotta go. This place is really freaking me out. I've been watching this guy over there, I don't think he came with a kid!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: We can't leave now! There was this one baby, Haley, who was favourite to win and she got croup, so she had to stay home! This competition just blew wide open, folks!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Phoebe, I think... It's just too weird, I just saw a one year old running around with pantyhose on!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, I know, we should have been more prepared.  It's okay. Now, the way I see it, our real competition now is Cameron. Oh my God, they just took her sweater off. Look at those arms! Hello Michelin Man.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, Phoebe! Come on! You know what, it's already three o'clock and they haven't even gotten to Emma's group yet. We gotta go, we got dinner!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: But Emma's got what it takes, she could go all the way!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Phoebe, you have to calm down.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay. Rachel, the hottest babies in the Tri-State Area are in this room right now! I overheard one of the judges say that not one of them holds a candle to Emma!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Really?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah!

Name: Rachel
Lines: You heard them say that?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah!

Name: Rachel
Lines: All right, okay. Alright, let's give to these babies something to cry about!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Good! Oh yay! Let's get down to business! Emma needs some makeup!

Name: Rachel
Lines: No, what?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, she's gonna look all washed out next to the other contestants!

Name: Rachel
Lines: No Phoebe, I am not letting you put makeup on my baby!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Why not!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Because I already did!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, Bob, get off the guy!

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh! What a game, huh?

Name: Joey
Lines: I know, yeah.

Name: Ross
Lines: I can't believe Chandler is missing this!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah. I am sorry he's not here too, but I got to say,  I am really enjoying Nacho Chair.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, I'd probably enjoy it more if you didn't keep batting my hand away.

Name: Joey
Lines: Ohhhh! These seats are great!

Name: Ross
Lines: I know, I know! When I was here for Holidays on Ice  I was sitting so far away Michelle Kwan couldn't read my banner!

Name: Joey
Lines: Wow, hey, we'd better get going. If we don't leave right now, we'll be late for dinner.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh, but it's a kind game! So we're a little late, you know, the girls will be there, let's stay just for one more goal.

Name: Joey
Lines: I don't know...

Name: Ross
Lines: One more fight!

Name: Joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay.

Name: Monica
Lines: Where is everybody? They're forty-five minutes late!

Name: Chandler
Lines: I can't believe they are not here! I slave and I slave for what? They've ruined cranberry day!

Name: Joey
Lines: How late are we?

Name: Ross
Lines: Forty-five minutes.

Name: Joey
Lines: Wow

Name: Ross
Lines: Here!

Name: Joey
Lines: Okay. Rachel and Phoebe are already there, okay? So they probably started without us. We could just slip in and no-one needs to know where we were!

Name: Ross
Lines: You may want to lose the foam finger!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, no, no, no, no, no. You just want to put it on your hand!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh!

Name: Joey
Lines: You are not at Thanksgiving?

Name: Rachel
Lines: No...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, we're late!

Name: Rachel
Lines: What are you doing here!

Name: Ross
Lines: We're late too!

Name: Joey
Lines: We figured we could be late because you guys were gonna be on time

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Don't point that thing at me, Tribbiani!

Name: Ross
Lines: So, nobody's here? Monica's gonna kill us!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, where were you!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah, yeah, what's with the trophy!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Uh, we were at the Spelling Bee!

Name: Rachel
Lines: And I won!

Name: Ross
Lines: You won an adult Thanksgiving day spelling bee.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yes!  Y-E-S. Yes!

Name: Ross
Lines: Let me see this...  Grand Supreme Little Darling, New York Division.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah. That's me!

Name: Ross
Lines: You entered Emma into a Beauty Pageant?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: And it looks like she put makeup on her!

Name: Joey
Lines: Wait a second, wait a second, where have I seen that cowgirl outfit before...

Name: Ross
Lines: I can't believe this, she's our daughter! That you would treat her like some kind of showdog is inexcusable!

Name: Rachel
Lines: She won a thousand dollars!

Name: Ross
Lines: So this is an annual thing?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh! That's Alicia Mae Emory's outfit!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: You guys, there are people in there who are not getting any happier!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah. What are we gonna do?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well, I don't know, you guys figure it out, I got to put Emma down for a nap.

Name: Joey
Lines: All right. Hey Rach, while you're in there, throw something on Alicia Mae.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Alright, what are we gonna say?

Name: Ross
Lines: Ooh, we'll say that we were mugged! You can't get mad at someone who's been mugged!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, good, that's good, but you don't look like you were mugged!

Name: Joey
Lines: No. Here

Name: Ross
Lines: HEY!

Name: Monica
Lines: Do you hear something?

Name: Chandler
Lines: They're out there!

Name: Monica
Lines: Ohhh! Let me see! Oh God, I can't believe this! They're an hour late and they're just staying out there, talking!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Everything is so distorted! Looks like Joey has a giant hand! Which says "Rangers" on it. They went to the game!

Name: Monica
Lines: Oooh! They are in for a world of pain!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Ross' shirt is torn.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh! They're late and they're sloppy!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Alright, Emma is napping...  what happened to your shirt?

Name: Ross
Lines: I got mugged. And they stole my pocket.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: We're just... we're trying to figure out an excuse. Hey! Ooh! How about this: We can say that Monica told us 5 o'clock, not 4 o'clock. That way we're right on time!  OR... or, we can plant PCP in the apartment and call the cops on her.

Name: Ross
Lines: That would be a good way to get rid of all the PCP we have lying around.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You know what, we just say that she said it was 5 o'clock. We'll just act casual. We're not late, we're right on time.

Name: Joey
Lines: Who do you think its from?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, God. This is bad. This is so bad.

Name: Ross
Lines: Well, let's just go in there and face them.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, I'm not going in first. I bet that vein on Monica's forehead is popping like crazy.

Name: Joey
Lines: I hate that thing, it's like a... bolt of lightning.

Name: Joey
Lines: Ah-haah! I win!!

Name: Ross
Lines: What is that?

Name: Joey
Lines: That's fire. Beats everything.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, really? Does it beat water balloon? .

Name: Joey
Lines: Ooh! Well played, Phoebe Buffay, well played.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Alright, enough, enough, come on. Let's just all go in at the same time.

Name: All
Lines: Alright, okay.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: It's locked.

Name: Ross
Lines: Wha...? Oh sure, now they lock it, but when they're having sex on the couch, its like: "Come on in, my butt is surprisingly hairy".

Name: Rachel
Lines: Alright, come on...  Alright, you guys. We're so sorry we're late. Please let us in, so we can have dinner together.

Name: Monica
Lines: No! Everything's cold. The turkey's dried out and the... the stuffing is all soggy.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah, and there's a bowl of cranberry sauce that...  what happens to cranberry sauce?

Name: Monica
Lines: Nothing. It's fine.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh thank God!

Name: Ross
Lines: Come on you guys, we're sorry, alri...? Our subway broke down.

Name: Chandler
Lines: That's a lie, you went to the game, I can see Joey's hand.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You guys, come on, it doesn't matter why we're late. We're all here now, please let us in so we can have some of your delicious turkey.

Name: Joey
Lines: I had a dream once about a fax machine that did that.

Name: Monica
Lines: That's all the turkey you're gonna get.

Name: Ross
Lines: How are we gonna decide who gets this?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: What are we gonna do? I'm starving.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, I just remembered. We do have something to eat. Monica put something in our oven this morning.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh yeah!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey, you touch that and you will be sorry.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Guys, I'd listen to her. The vein is bigger than I've ever seen it.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Huh... OH MY GOD IT'S BRUSSELS SPROUTS.

Name: Ross
Lines: That's worse than no food.

Name: Chandler
Lines: HA-HA! All you got was Monica's stinky Brussels sprouts!

Name: Monica
Lines: Stinky?!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Please let me stay on this side of the door.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, I know... I still have my old key!  We can just unlock the door.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, I don't know if that's such a good idea. They clearly don't want to be with us.

Name: Rachel
Lines: You know what? I don't want to be with them either, but it's Thanksgiving and we should not want to be together, together.

Name: Joey
Lines: Just get in there and make a face to face apology, you know? Look them in the eye. I know I can get them to forgive us.

Name: Ross
Lines: I don't know...

Name: Joey
Lines: I'm telling ya...  I can do it.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh! It all looks so beautiful: the turkey, the stuffing...

Name: Chandler
Lines: The cranberries...?

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh! Enough! A monkey could have made 'em!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey listen guys, we feel really terrible.

Name: Chandler
Lines: He's doing that weird eye contact thing. Don't look at him, don't look at him!

Name: Ross
Lines: I feel terrible.

Name: Phoebe and Rachel
Lines: So, so sorry.

Name: Joey
Lines: Now let's not ruin this day. You worked so hard. Let's move past this and try to have a nice meal all together, huh?

Name: Chandler
Lines: The floating heads do make a good point.

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, they do seem to feel pretty bad.

Name: Rachel
Lines: So bad.

Name: Ross
Lines: So bad.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So bad.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Dessert?

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, I asked you and Phoebe to pick up the pies. You did remember, right?

Name: Monica
Lines: Grand Supreme Little Darling?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Congratulatioooons!

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh my God! YOU FORGOT THE PIES? Well, I cannot believe this. You force me to make dinner, then you're an hour late and you forget the one little thing that I asked you to do.

Name: Ross
Lines: Really girls, not cool.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, you manheads aren't any better. You lied about going to the game. You knew it would make you late, and you still went anyway.

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey! I'm getting a little tired of this okay? We said we're sorry. It's Thanksgiving for Pete's sakes! A day of forgiveness!

Name: Ross
Lines: It's a day to be thankful.

Name: Joey
Lines: Don't make me come up there!

Name: Monica
Lines: It's too late for apologies.

Name: Joey
Lines: Fine! Let's just go. I don't need your stupid dinner.

Name: Chandler
Lines: That would be a lot more convincing if you weren't drooling.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ewww, is that what that is?

Name: Joey
Lines: Sorry!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Come on you guys, let's just do our own Thanksgiving.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah! I'll cook!

Name: Ross
Lines: Yeah! Let's go out.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah! You three have a nice Thanksgiving.

Name: Monica
Lines: The three of us?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah! You, Chan, and the vein!

Name: Joey
Lines: Ha!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh-oh! I'm stuck!

Name: Monica
Lines: Joey, that is not gonna work.

Name: Joey
Lines: No seriously... I'm really wedged in here.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I'll pull you through.

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay.

Name: Joey
Lines: aaw-ahhh-aaahhh STOP! STOP! I'm worried about damaging my head.

Name: Chandler
Lines: A little late for that.

Name: Joey
Lines: Alright, hurry up, you gotta do something.

Name: Monica
Lines: Alright, well, this does not change anything.  Okay, we need to get something to grease the sides of his face.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Uhm, we've got turkey grease.

Name: Monica
Lines: Bring it.

Name: Joey
Lines: I just wanna say that I'm sorry I referred to the vein as a seperate person...

Name: Monica
Lines: Here you go!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, that smells good!

Name: Joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay, try it.

Name: Joey
Lines: It isn't working.

Name: Monica
Lines: Alright, we're gonna have to unscrew the chain.

Name: Joey
Lines: Well hurry, I can't feel my ears!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Can you ever feel your ears?

Name: Joey
Lines: Interesting...

Name: Monica
Lines: Chandler, where are your tools?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, I left them on my bulldozer... I don't have tools!

Name: Monica
Lines: I do, but Rachel borrowed them.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I lent them to Ross.

Name: Ross
Lines: I gave them to Joey.

Name: Joey
Lines: I left them at the park.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh!

Name: Ross
Lines: I'm finding it really hard not to mess with him.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I've already stuffed a bunch of Brussel sprouts down his pants.

Name: Ross
Lines: Nice!

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay, I have to get that. Now when I get back, I want you and your friends to be gone. Thanksgiving is over. The Vein has spoken.

Name: Joey
Lines: It's really starting to hurt.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, look, I'm gonna pull on the door and you guys push as hard as you can. Maybe we can get enough room to wiggle him out, okay? Okay, so PUSH!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Just a sec., we're kind in the middle of something here.

Name: Joey
Lines: Ooh! Stop putting things down my pants!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Come on guys, PUSH!

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah! Come on!

Name: Joey and Chandler
Lines: PUSH! PUSH! PUSH!

Name: Chandler
Lines: My cranberries!

Name: Joey
Lines: Man, I've got food all over me.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Argh! I can't believe what you did. Monica's gonna kill you!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Look! Look! Look what the... Look what... Look what the floating heads did!

Name: Monica
Lines: I don't care.

Name: Chandler
Lines: What's going on?

Name: Monica
Lines: That was the adoption agency...

Name: Chandler
Lines: And?

Name: Monica
Lines: WE'RE GETTING A BABY!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Are you serious?

Name: Monica
Lines: There's a pregnant woman in Ohio, and she picked us!

Name: Rachel
Lines: I'm so happy for you!

Name: Monica
Lines: This Thanksgiving kicks last Thanksgiving's ass!

Name: Rachel
Lines: To Monica and Chandler... and that knocked up girl in Ohio.

Name: Ross
Lines: I'm just so happy you guys are finally getting a kid.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I know. Have you considered pageanting?

Name: Monica
Lines: I can't believe they called, and we're actually getting a baby.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, I know how you feel...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Really?

Name: Joey
Lines: Sure. I went through the exact same thing with Alicia Mae Emory... The waiting, the wandering... Then one day... I get that call from Toys "R" Us... She was in stock!

Name: Chandler
Lines: That is the exact same thing.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hi!

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: Chandler
Lines: We're just here to say goodbye, we're off to Ohio.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Oh, right! Your adoption interview!

Name: Monica
Lines: Yep, we're gonna meet the lady who could be carrying our baby.

Name: Joey
Lines: I can't believe it. When you guys come back, you're gonna have a baby! That is so weird!

Name: Chandler
Lines: And so incorrect!

Name: Monica
Lines: She's only a couple of months pregnant. She liked our application but who knows if she's gonna like us.

Name: Ross
Lines: Come on, she's gonna love you guys!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Uhm, thank you, but we're really trying not to get our hopes up.

Lines: Oh!

Name: Chandler
Lines: It's okay, it's just an egg roll.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh..

Name: Joey
Lines: You stepped on my egg roll?

Name: Monica
Lines: I'm sorry, I didn't know to look for Chinese food on the floor.

Name: Joey
Lines: Just put it on a plate and leave.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Okay, let's find these birds.

Name: Joey
Lines: Alright.

Name: Joey
Lines: Wait, wait. Do you hear that?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh! They're in the table!

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, that can't be good!

Name: Joey
Lines: We gotta get them out of there!

Name: Chandler
Lines: How?

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh, oh! Maybe we can lure them out. You know any birdcalls?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, tons, I'm quite the woodsman.

Name: Joey
Lines: Well, maybe we can just tip the table a little.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Joey, wait! The ball!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh!

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh God! So what do we do?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I don't know. Maybe we can open this up somehow.

Name: Joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: Chandler
Lines: No... It's all glued together.

Name: Joey
Lines: Does that mean we have to bust it open?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I don't know. Maybe.

Name: Joey
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: Chandler
Lines: I know! It's.. It's the foosball table.

Name: Joey
Lines: All right, you know what? We don't have a choice. It's like I would have said in that sci-fi movie if I'd gotten the part. "Those are our men in there, we have to get them out! Even if I have to sacrifice the most important thing in my life; my time-machine."

Name: Chandler
Lines: Did that movie ever get made?

Name: Joey
Lines: It did not.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Ross, where are you going?

Name: Ross
Lines: To talk to Rachel, isn't that why we took a ride in the death-cab?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: What? What are you just gonna walk up to her at the gate? Have you never chased anyone through the airport before?

Name: Ross
Lines: Not since my cop-show got cancelled.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: You have to get a ticket to get past security.

Name: Ross
Lines: What? We're never gonna make it!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Not with that attitude! Now, haul ass!

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay, if you could all walk slower, that'd be great.

Name: Gate attendant #1
Lines: Madame, your passport please?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh my God! I was so afraid I wasn't gonna remember any of my high-school French, but I understood every word you just said!

Name: Gate attendant #1
Lines: Your boarding pass, please.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, shoot. I had it. Oh, I can't believe this.

Name: Gate attendant #1
Lines: Madame, if you don't have your boarding pass...

Name: Rachel
Lines: I have it, I have it, I have it. Oh, okay, I can't find it, but I remember that I was in seat 32C, because that's my bra-size.

Name: Gate attendant #1
Lines: Madame, you must have your boarding pass..

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay, fine! But you know what? If I was in 36D, we would not  be having this problem.

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey, I need a ticket.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Just one? I drive you all the way down here, and I don't get to see how it works out?

Name: Ross
Lines: Fine, two tickets, I need two tickets.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: We're on our honeymoon.

Name: Ticket agent
Lines: And the destination?

Name: Ross
Lines: I don't care. Whatever is the cheapest.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I'm so lucky I married you.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh! Shoot! Damn it! Where is it? Oh! Oh! I found it! I found it!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hah! I found it! I told you I would find it! In your face!  You're a different person.

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay, flight 421 to Paris. I don't see it, do you see it?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: No, did we miss it?

Name: Ross
Lines: No, no, no. That's impossible. It doesn't leave for another 20 minutes.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Maybe we have the flight-number wrong. God.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hello.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey, it's me. Here's Ross.

Name: Ross
Lines: What? Hey, hey, listen..

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh my God! Ross, you wouldn't believe the cute little noises the twins are making. Listen.

Name: Ross
Lines: Monica? Monica, Monica, Monica, Monica..?

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, I'm sorry. Shoot, they were doing it before.

Name: Ross
Lines: That's alright. Listen, listen.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, wait, wait, wait! Here they go again.

Name: Ross
Lines: Monica? Monica, Monica, Monica, Monica..?

Name: Monica
Lines: Isn't that cute?

Name: Ross
Lines: That is precious! Listen! I need Rachel's flight information.

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, okay. Alright, it's flight 421. Leaves at 8:40.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yes, that's what I have. It's not on the board.

Name: Monica
Lines: That's what it says here. Flight 421, leaves at 8:40, Newark airport.

Name: Ross
Lines: What?

Name: Monica
Lines: Newark airport. Why, where are you?

Name: Ross
Lines: JFK.

Name: Joey
Lines: Don't worry, you guys, we're gonna get you out of there.

Name: Chandler
Lines: And we're also gonna buy you tiny, bird hearing-aids.

Name: Joey
Lines: Okay. Here goes.

Name: Chandler
Lines: What's the matter?

Name: Joey
Lines: I need to say goodbye to the table first.

Name: Chandler
Lines: I understand.

Name: Joey
Lines: Okay. Table, you have given us so many great times. And you guys, Jordan, Victor, Joel... All of you guys. What can I say? You guys make us look good. You wanna say anything?

Name: Chandler
Lines: I don't know. Except that, for one last time...  Good game, good game, good game, good game, good game, good game, good game.

Name: Joey
Lines: Okay, here we go. I can't do it.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, I can't do it either.

Name: Monica
Lines: Hey! Did you find them?

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, they're stuck inside the table!

Name: Chandler
Lines: We have to bust it open, but neither of us can do it!

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, well sure. This gotta be so hard. I'll do it. Gimme!

Name: Ross
Lines: Phoebe! Wow! No, no, no!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Well, I've never gone this fast before.

Name: Ross
Lines: Phoebe, forget it, okay? Newark is - is like an hour away. There's no way we're gonna make it in time.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: She's got her cell, you could call her.

Name: Ross
Lines: I am not doing this over the phone.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: You don't have any other choice!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Hello?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Rachel? Oh, good. Hey, by the way, did you just get on the plane?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: For what it's worth, we would have caught her if we were at the right airport.

Name: Ross
Lines: Yay.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Uh, Rach, hang on.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Phoebe? Is everything okay?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Uhm, actually no. No, you've... You have to get off the plane.

Name: Rachel
Lines: What? Why?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I have this feeling that something's wrong with it. Something is wrong with the left Philange.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, honey, I'm sure there's nothing wrong with the plane.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Alright, look, I have to go. I love you, and I will call you the minute I get to Paris.

Name: Passenger #1
Lines: Uhm, what was that?

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, that was just my crazy friend. She told me I should get off the plane, because she had a feeling that there was something wrong with the left Philange.

Name: Passenger #1
Lines: Okay, that doesn't sound good.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I wouldn't worry about it. She's always coming up with stuff like this, and you know what? She's almost never right.

Name: Passenger #1
Lines: But she is sometimes.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Well...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Wait, what are you doing?

Name: Passenger #1
Lines: Well, I can't take this plane now.

Name: Air stewardess
Lines: Excuse me, sir, where are you going?

Name: Passenger #1
Lines: I have to get off this plane, okay? Her friend has a feeling something's wrong with the left Philange.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Could I get some peanuts?

Name: Passenger #2
Lines: What's wrong with the plane?

Name: Air stewardess
Lines: There's nothing wrong with the plane.

Name: Passenger #1
Lines: Yeah! The left Philange!

Name: Air stewardess
Lines: There is no Philange!

Name: Passenger #1
Lines: Oh my God. This plane doesn't even have a Philange!

Name: Passenger #2
Lines: I'm not flying on it!

Name: Air stewardess
Lines: Ma'am, please sit down!

Name: Passenger #3
Lines: What's going on?

Name: Passenger #1
Lines: We're all getting off. There is no Philange!

Name: Rachel
Lines: This is ridiculous! I...

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah, okay.

Name: Monica
Lines: Alright. My job here is done.

Name: Chandler
Lines: That was... Impressive.

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah, you didn't even use the tools for most of it!

Name: Monica
Lines: Yeah, they were just slowing me down. Alright, I have to get back to the babies. I'll see you girls later.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Sorry about the table, man.

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Chandler
Lines: You gonna buy a new one?

Name: Joey
Lines: Probably not. Nah. I don't know how much I'm gonna wanna play after you go.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Well, at least we got these little guys out.

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Aww, we were worried about you! Hm. I guess I better get used to things crapping in my hand, huh?

Name: Joey
Lines: I'm gonna miss these little guys. It was nice having birds around again.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Hey, you know what? Maybe we should keep them here with you.

Name: Joey
Lines: What?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Yeah, I mean we've got a lot going on right now. And, plus, here they'd have their own room.

Name: Joey
Lines: I could get a goose!

Name: Chandler
Lines: You know, I - I think you're set with the poultry.

Name: Joey
Lines: Thanks man. Did you hear that, you guys? You're gonna get to stay here! And, and it's good, you know, 'cause, 'cause now you have a reason to come visit.

Name: Chandler
Lines: I think there may be another reason. So, awkward hug or lame cool guy handshake?

Name: Joey
Lines: Uh, lame cool guy handshake, yeah.

Name: Gate attendant #2
Lines: Ma'am, I assure you, the plane is fine.

Name: Passenger #2
Lines: And you fixed the Philange?

Name: Gate attendant #2
Lines: Yes, the Philange is fixed. As a matter of fact, we put a whole lot of extra Philanges onboard, just in case.

Name: Ross
Lines: Where is she?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I don't see her.

Name: Ross
Lines: Rachel! Rachel Green!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: There she is!

Name: Ross
Lines: Rachel! Rachel!

Name: Gate attendant #2
Lines: Wow, excuse me, sir, do you have a boarding pass?

Name: Ross
Lines: No, no, I just have to talk to someone.

Name: Gate attendant #2
Lines: I'm sorry, you cannot go any further without a boarding pass.

Name: Ross
Lines: No, no, no, but...

Name: Phoebe
Lines: RACHEL!!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh my God... What.. What are you guys doing here?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Okay, you're on.

Name: Rachel
Lines: What? What? Ross, you're scaring me. What's going on?

Name: Ross
Lines: Okay, the thing is..

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yeah?

Name: Ross
Lines: Don't go.

Name: Rachel
Lines: What?

Name: Ross
Lines: Please, please stay with me. I am so in love with you. Please, don't go.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh my God.

Name: Ross
Lines: I know, I know. I shouldn't have waited 'till now to say it, but I'm.. That was stupid, okay? I'm sorry, but I'm telling you now. I love you. Do not get on this plane.

Name: Gate attendant #2
Lines: Miss? Are you boarding the plane?

Name: Ross
Lines: Hey, hey. I know you love me. I know you do.

Name: Gate attendant #2
Lines: Miss?

Name: Rachel
Lines: I - I have to get on the plane.

Name: Ross
Lines: No, you don't.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Yes, I do.

Name: Ross
Lines: No, you don't.

Name: Rachel
Lines: They're waiting for me, Ross. I can't do this right now, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.

Name: Ross
Lines: Rachel?

Name: Rachel
Lines: I'm so sorry.

Name: Ross
Lines: I really thought she'd stay.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: I'm sorry.

Name: Monica
Lines: Well, that's it. Everything's packed.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Wow, this is weird.

Name: Monica
Lines: I know.

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah. Uh, does this mean there's nothing to eat?

Name: Monica
Lines: I put three lasagnas in your freezer.

Name: Joey
Lines: I love you!

Name: Joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: Joey
Lines: So did you guys make it in time?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Yeah, yeah, he talked to her, but she got on the plane anyway.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Where's Ross?

Name: Phoebe
Lines: He went home. He didn't want to see anybody.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Ross, hi. It's me. I just got back on the plane. And I just feel awful. That is so not how I wanted things to end with us. It's just that I wasn't expecting to see you, and all of a sudden you're there and saying these things... And... And now I'm just sitting here and thinking of all the stuff I should have said, and I didn't. I mean, I didn't even get to tell you that I love you too. Because of course I do. I love you. I love you. I love you. What am I doing? I love you! Oh, I've gotta see you. I've gotta get off this plane.

Name: Ross
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Excuse me?

Name: Air stewardess
Lines: Miss? Please, sit down!

Name: Rachel
Lines: I'm sorry. I'm really sorry, but I need to get off the plane, okay? I need to tell someone that I love love them.

Name: Air stewardess
Lines: Miss, I can't let you off the plane.

Name: Ross
Lines: Let her off the plane!

Name: Air stewardess
Lines: I am afraid you are gonna have to take a seat.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, please, miss, you don't understand!

Name: Ross
Lines: Try to understand!

Name: Rachel
Lines: Oh, come on, miss, isn't there any way that you can just let me off...

Name: Ross
Lines: No! No! Oh my God. Did she get off the plane? Did she get off the plane?

Name: Rachel
Lines: I got off the plane.

Name: Ross
Lines: You got off the plane.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I do love you.

Name: Ross
Lines: I love you too, and I'm never letting you go again.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay. 'Cause this is where I wanna be, okay? No more messing around. I don't wanna mess this up again.

Name: Ross
Lines: Me neither, okay? We are - we're done being stupid.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay. You and me, alright? This is it.

Name: Ross
Lines: This is it. Unless we're on a break.

Name: Ross
Lines: Don't make jokes now.

Name: Monica
Lines: Okay, please be careful with that. It was my grandmother's. Be careful.

Name: Monica
Lines: If that falls off the truck, it wouldn't be the worst thing.

Name: Ross
Lines: Wow.

Name: Rachel
Lines: I know. It seems smaller somehow.

Name: Joey
Lines: Has it always been purple?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Look around, you guys. This was your first home. And it was a happy place, filled with love and laughter. But more important, because of rent control, it was a friggin' steal!

Name: Phoebe
Lines: Hey, do you realise that at one time or another we all lived in this apartment?

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, yeah, that's true.

Name: Ross
Lines: Uh, I haven't.

Name: Monica
Lines: Wait a minute. What about that summer during college that you lived with grandma, and you tried to make it as a dancer?

Name: Ross
Lines: Do you realise we almost made it ten years without that coming up?

Name: Monica
Lines: Oh, honey, I forgot. I promised Treeger that we'd leave our keys.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, okay.

Name: Phoebe
Lines: So, I guess this is it.

Name: Joey
Lines: Yeah. I guess so.

Name: Monica
Lines: This is harder than I thought it would be.

Name: Chandler
Lines: Oh, it's gonna be okay.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Do you guys have to go to the new house right away, or do you have some time?

Name: Monica
Lines: We got some time.

Name: Rachel
Lines: Okay, should we get some coffee?

Name: Chandler
Lines: Sure. Where?
